original: Bhg_01.001 dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca
analyzed: dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ uvāca

original: Bhg_01.001a dharmakṣetre kurukṣetre samavetā yuyutsavaḥ
analyzed: dharma kṣetre kurukṣetre samavetāḥ yuyutsavaḥ

original: Bhg_01.001c māmakāḥ pāṇḍavāś caiva kim akurvata saṃjaya
analyzed: māmakāḥ pāṇḍavāḥ ca eva kim akurvata saṃjaya

original: Bhg_01.002 saṃjaya uvāca
analyzed: saṃjayaḥ uvāca

original: Bhg_01.002a dṛṣṭvā tu pāṇḍavānīkaṃ vyūḍhaṃ duryodhanas tadā
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā tu pāṇḍava anīkam vyūḍham duryodhanaḥ tadā

original: Bhg_01.002c ācāryam upasaṃgamya rājā vacanam abravīt
analyzed: ācāryam upasaṃgamya rājā vacanam abravīt

original: Bhg_01.003a paśyaitāṃ pāṇḍuputrāṇām ācārya mahatīṃ camūm
analyzed: paśya etām pāṇḍu putrāṇām ācārya mahatīm camūm

original: Bhg_01.003c vyūḍhāṃ drupadaputreṇa tava śiṣyeṇa dhīmatā
analyzed: vyūḍhām drupada putreṇa tava śiṣyeṇa dhīmatā

original: Bhg_01.004a atra śūrā maheṣvāsā bhīmārjunasamā yudhi
analyzed: atra śūrāḥ mahā iṣvāsāḥ bhīma arjuna samāḥ yudhi

original: Bhg_01.004c yuyudhāno virāṭaś ca drupadaś ca mahārathaḥ
analyzed: yuyudhānaḥ virāṭaḥ ca drupadaḥ ca mahā rathaḥ

original: Bhg_01.005a dhṛṣṭaketuś cekitānaḥ kāśirājaś ca vīryavān
analyzed: dhṛṣṭaketuḥ cekitānaḥ kāśi rājaḥ ca vīryavān

original: Bhg_01.005c purujit kuntibhojaś ca śaibyaś ca narapuṃgavaḥ
analyzed: purujit kuntibhojaḥ ca śaibyaḥ ca nara puṃgavaḥ

original: Bhg_01.006a yudhāmanyuś ca vikrānta uttamaujāś ca vīryavān
analyzed: yudhāmanyuḥ ca vikrāntaḥ uttamaujāḥ ca vīryavān

original: Bhg_01.006c saubhadro draupadeyāś ca sarva eva mahārathāḥ
analyzed: saubhadraḥ draupadeyāḥ ca sarve eva mahā rathāḥ

original: Bhg_01.007a asmākaṃ tu viśiṣṭā ye tān nibodha dvijottama
analyzed: asmākam tu viśiṣṭāḥ ye tān nibodha dvijottama

original: Bhg_01.007c nāyakā mama sainyasya saṃjñārthaṃ tān bravīmi te
analyzed: nāyakāḥ mama sainyasya saṃjñā artham tān bravīmi te

original: Bhg_01.008a bhavān bhīṣmaś ca karṇaś ca kṛpaś ca samitiṃjayaḥ
analyzed: bhavān bhīṣmaḥ ca karṇaḥ ca kṛpaḥ ca samitiṃjayaḥ

original: Bhg_01.008c aśvatthāmā vikarṇaś ca saumadattis tathaiva ca
analyzed: aśvatthāmā vikarṇaḥ ca saumadattiḥ tathā eva ca

original: Bhg_01.009a anye ca bahavaḥ śūrā madarthe tyaktajīvitāḥ
analyzed: anye ca bahavaḥ śūrāḥ mad arthe tyakta jīvitāḥ

original: Bhg_01.009c nānāśastrapraharaṇāḥ sarve yuddhaviśāradāḥ
analyzed: nānā śastra praharaṇāḥ sarve yuddha viśāradāḥ

original: Bhg_01.010a aparyāptaṃ tad asmākaṃ balaṃ bhīṣmābhirakṣitam
analyzed: a paryāptam tat asmākam balam bhīṣma abhirakṣitam

original: Bhg_01.010c paryāptaṃ tv idam eteṣāṃ balaṃ bhīmābhirakṣitam
analyzed: paryāptam tu idam eteṣām balam bhīma abhirakṣitam

original: Bhg_01.011a ayaneṣu ca sarveṣu yathābhāgam avasthitāḥ
analyzed: ayaneṣu ca sarveṣu yathābhāgam avasthitāḥ

original: Bhg_01.011c bhīṣmam evābhirakṣantu bhavantaḥ sarva eva hi
analyzed: bhīṣmam eva abhirakṣantu bhavantaḥ sarve eva hi

original: Bhg_01.012a tasya saṃjanayan harṣaṃ kuruvṛddhaḥ pitāmahaḥ
analyzed: tasya saṃjanayan harṣam kuruvṛddhaḥ pitāmahaḥ

original: Bhg_01.012c siṃhanādaṃ vinadyoccaiḥ śaṅkhaṃ dadhmau pratāpavān
analyzed: siṃhanādam vinadya uccais śaṅkham dadhmau pratāpavān

original: Bhg_01.013a tataḥ śaṅkhāś ca bheryaś ca paṇavānakagomukhāḥ
analyzed: tatas śaṅkhāḥ ca bheryaḥ ca paṇava ānaka gomukhāḥ

original: Bhg_01.013c sahasaivābhyahanyanta sa śabdas tumulo 'bhavat
analyzed: sahasā eva abhyahanyanta sa śabdaḥ tumulaḥ bhavat

original: Bhg_01.014a tataḥ śvetair hayair yukte mahati syandane sthitau
analyzed: tatas śvetaiḥ hayaiḥ yukte mahati syandane sthitau

original: Bhg_01.014c mādhavaḥ pāṇḍavaś caiva divyau śaṅkhau pradadhmatuḥ
analyzed: mādhavaḥ pāṇḍavaḥ ca eva divyau śaṅkhau pradadhmatuḥ

original: Bhg_01.015a pāñcajanyaṃ hṛṣīkeśo devadattaṃ dhanaṃjayaḥ
analyzed: pāñcajanyam hṛṣīkeśaḥ devadattam dhanaṃjayaḥ

original: Bhg_01.015c pauṇḍraṃ dadhmau mahāśaṅkhaṃ bhīmakarmā vṛkodaraḥ
analyzed: pauṇḍram dadhmau mahā śaṅkham bhīma karmā vṛkodaraḥ

original: Bhg_01.016a anantavijayaṃ rājā kuntīputro yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
analyzed: anantavijayam rājā kuntī putraḥ yudhiṣṭhiraḥ

original: Bhg_01.016c nakulaḥ sahadevaś ca sughoṣamaṇipuṣpakau
analyzed: nakulaḥ sahadevaḥ ca sughoṣa maṇipuṣpakau

original: Bhg_01.017a kāśyaś ca parameṣvāsaḥ śikhaṇḍī ca mahārathaḥ
analyzed: kāśyaḥ ca parama iṣvāsaḥ śikhaṇḍī ca mahā rathaḥ

original: Bhg_01.017c dhṛṣṭadyumno virāṭaś ca sātyakiś cāparājitaḥ
analyzed: dhṛṣṭadyumnaḥ virāṭaḥ ca sātyakiḥ ca aparājitaḥ

original: Bhg_01.018a drupado draupadeyāś ca sarvaśaḥ pṛthivīpate
analyzed: drupadaḥ draupadeyāḥ ca sarvaśas pṛthivīpate

original: Bhg_01.018c saubhadraś ca mahābāhuḥ śaṅkhān dadhmuḥ pṛthak pṛthak
analyzed: saubhadraḥ ca mahā bāhuḥ śaṅkhān dadhmuḥ pṛthak pṛthak

original: Bhg_01.019a sa ghoṣo dhārtarāṣṭrāṇāṃ hṛdayāni vyadārayat
analyzed: sa ghoṣaḥ dhārtarāṣṭrāṇām hṛdayāni vyadārayat

original: Bhg_01.019c nabhaś ca pṛthivīṃ caiva tumulo vyanunādayan
analyzed: nabhaḥ ca pṛthivīm ca eva tumulaḥ vyanunādayan

original: Bhg_01.020a atha vyavasthitān dṛṣṭvā dhārtarāṣṭrān kapidhvajaḥ
analyzed: atha vyavasthitān dṛṣṭvā dhārtarāṣṭrān kapidhvajaḥ

original: Bhg_01.020c pravṛtte śastrasaṃpāte dhanur udyamya pāṇḍavaḥ
analyzed: pravṛtte śastra saṃpāte dhanuḥ udyamya pāṇḍavaḥ

original: Bhg_01.021a hṛṣīkeśaṃ tadā vākyam idam āha mahīpate
analyzed: hṛṣīkeśam tadā vākyam idam āha mahīpate

original: Bhg_01.021c senayor ubhayor madhye rathaṃ sthāpaya me 'cyuta
analyzed: senayoḥ ubhayoḥ madhye ratham sthāpaya me cyuta

original: Bhg_01.022a yāvad etān nirīkṣe 'haṃ yoddhukāmān avasthitān
analyzed: yāvat etān nirīkṣe ham yoddhu kāmān avasthitān

original: Bhg_01.022c kair mayā saha yoddhavyam asmin raṇasamudyame
analyzed: kaiḥ mayā saha yoddhavyam asmin raṇa samudyame

original: Bhg_01.023a yotsyamānān avekṣe 'haṃ ya ete 'tra samāgatāḥ
analyzed: yotsyamānān avekṣe ham ye ete samāgatāḥ

original: Bhg_01.023c dhārtarāṣṭrasya durbuddher yuddhe priyacikīrṣavaḥ
analyzed: dhārtarāṣṭrasya durbuddheḥ yuddhe priya cikīrṣavaḥ

original: Bhg_01.024a evam ukto hṛṣīkeśo guḍākeśena bhārata
analyzed: evam uktaḥ hṛṣīkeśaḥ guḍākeśena bhārata

original: Bhg_01.024c senayor ubhayor madhye sthāpayitvā rathottamam
analyzed: senayoḥ ubhayoḥ madhye sthāpayitvā ratha uttamam

original: Bhg_01.025a bhīṣmadroṇapramukhataḥ sarveṣāṃ ca mahīkṣitām
analyzed: bhīṣma droṇa pramukhatas sarveṣām ca mahīkṣitām

original: Bhg_01.025c uvāca pārtha paśyaitān samavetān kurūn iti
analyzed: uvāca pārtha paśya etān samavetān kurūn iti

original: Bhg_01.026a tatrāpaśyat sthitān pārthaḥ pitṝn atha pitāmahān
analyzed: tatra apaśyat sthitān pārthaḥ pitṝn atha pitāmahān

original: Bhg_01.026c ācāryān mātulān bhrātṝn putrān pautrān sakhīṃs tathā
analyzed: ācāryān mātulān bhrātṝn putrān pautrān sakhīn tathā

original: Bhg_01.027a śvaśurān suhṛdaś caiva senayor ubhayor api
analyzed: śvaśurān suhṛdaḥ ca eva senayoḥ ubhayoḥ api

original: Bhg_01.027c tān samīkṣya sa kaunteyaḥ sarvān bandhūn avasthitān
analyzed: tān samīkṣya sa kaunteyaḥ sarvān bandhūn avasthitān

original: Bhg_01.028a kṛpayā parayāviṣṭo viṣīdann idam abravīt
analyzed: kṛpayā parayā āviṣṭaḥ viṣīdan idam abravīt

original: Bhg_01.028c dṛṣṭvemān svajanān kṛṣṇa yuyutsūn samavasthitān
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā imān sva janān kṛṣṇa yuyutsūn samavasthitān

original: Bhg_01.029a sīdanti mama gātrāṇi mukhaṃ ca pariśuṣyati
analyzed: sīdanti mama gātrāṇi mukham ca pariśuṣyati

original: Bhg_01.029c vepathuś ca śarīre me romaharṣaś ca jāyate
analyzed: vepathuḥ ca śarīre me romaharṣaḥ ca jāyate

original: Bhg_01.030a gāṇḍīvaṃ sraṃsate hastāt tvak caiva paridahyate
analyzed: gāṇḍīvam sraṃsate hastāt tvac ca eva paridahyate

original: Bhg_01.030c na ca śaknomy avasthātuṃ bhramatīva ca me manaḥ
analyzed: na ca śaknomi avasthātum bhramati iva ca me manaḥ

original: Bhg_01.031a nimittāni ca paśyāmi viparītāni keśava
analyzed: nimittāni ca paśyāmi viparītāni keśava

original: Bhg_01.031c na ca śreyo 'nupaśyāmi hatvā svajanam āhave
analyzed: na ca śreyaḥ nupaśyāmi hatvā sva janam āhave

original: Bhg_01.032a na kāṅkṣe vijayaṃ kṛṣṇa na ca rājyaṃ sukhāni ca
analyzed: na kāṅkṣe vijayam kṛṣṇa na ca rājyam sukhāni ca

original: Bhg_01.032c kiṃ no rājyena govinda kiṃ bhogair jīvitena vā
analyzed: kim naḥ rājyena govinda kim bhogaiḥ jīvitena vā

original: Bhg_01.033a yeṣām arthe kāṅkṣitaṃ no rājyaṃ bhogāḥ sukhāni ca
analyzed: yeṣām arthe kāṅkṣitam naḥ rājyam bhogāḥ sukhāni ca

original: Bhg_01.033c ta ime 'vasthitā yuddhe prāṇāṃs tyaktvā dhanāni ca
analyzed: te ime vasthitāḥ yuddhe prāṇān tyaktvā dhanāni ca

original: Bhg_01.034a ācāryāḥ pitaraḥ putrās tathaiva ca pitāmahāḥ
analyzed: ācāryāḥ pitaraḥ putrāḥ tathā eva ca pitāmahāḥ

original: Bhg_01.034c mātulāḥ śvaśurāḥ pautrāḥ syālāḥ saṃbandhinas tathā
analyzed: mātulāḥ śvaśurāḥ pautrāḥ syālāḥ saṃbandhinaḥ tathā

original: Bhg_01.035a etān na hantum icchāmi ghnato 'pi madhusūdana
analyzed: etān na hantum icchāmi ghnataḥ pi madhusūdana

original: Bhg_01.035c api trailokyarājyasya hetoḥ kiṃ nu mahīkṛte
analyzed: api trailokya rājyasya hetoḥ kim nu mahī kṛte

original: Bhg_01.036a nihatya dhārtarāṣṭrān naḥ kā prītiḥ syāj janārdana
analyzed: nihatya dhārtarāṣṭrān naḥ kā prītiḥ syāt janārdana

original: Bhg_01.036c pāpam evāśrayed asmān hatvaitān ātatāyinaḥ
analyzed: pāpam eva āśrayet asmān hatvā etān ātatāyinaḥ

original: Bhg_01.037a tasmān nārhā vayaṃ hantuṃ dhārtarāṣṭrān sabāndhavān
analyzed: tasmāt na arhāḥ vayam hantum dhārtarāṣṭrān sa bāndhavān

original: Bhg_01.037c svajanaṃ hi kathaṃ hatvā sukhinaḥ syāma mādhava
analyzed: sva janam hi katham hatvā sukhinaḥ syāma mādhava

original: Bhg_01.038a yady apy ete na paśyanti lobhopahatacetasaḥ
analyzed: yadi api ete na paśyanti lobha upahata cetasaḥ

original: Bhg_01.038c kulakṣayakṛtaṃ doṣaṃ mitradrohe ca pātakam
analyzed: kula kṣaya kṛtam doṣam mitra drohe ca pātakam

original: Bhg_01.039a kathaṃ na jñeyam asmābhiḥ pāpād asmān nivartitum
analyzed: katham na jñeyam asmābhiḥ pāpāt asmāt nivartitum

original: Bhg_01.039c kulakṣayakṛtaṃ doṣaṃ prapaśyadbhir janārdana
analyzed: kula kṣaya kṛtam doṣam prapaśyadbhiḥ janārdana

original: Bhg_01.040a kulakṣaye praṇaśyanti kuladharmāḥ sanātanāḥ
analyzed: kula kṣaye praṇaśyanti kula dharmāḥ sanātanāḥ

original: Bhg_01.040c dharme naṣṭe kulaṃ kṛtsnam adharmo 'bhibhavaty uta
analyzed: dharme naṣṭe kulam kṛtsnam adharmaḥ bhibhavati uta

original: Bhg_01.041a adharmābhibhavāt kṛṣṇa praduṣyanti kulastriyaḥ
analyzed: adharma abhibhavāt kṛṣṇa praduṣyanti kulastriyaḥ

original: Bhg_01.041c strīṣu duṣṭāsu vārṣṇeya jāyate varṇasaṃkaraḥ
analyzed: strīṣu duṣṭāsu vārṣṇeya jāyate varṇa saṃkaraḥ

original: Bhg_01.042a saṃkaro narakāyaiva kulaghnānāṃ kulasya ca
analyzed: saṃkaraḥ narakāya eva kula ghnānām kulasya ca

original: Bhg_01.042c patanti pitaro hy eṣāṃ luptapiṇḍodakakriyāḥ
analyzed: patanti pitaraḥ hi eṣām lupta piṇḍa udaka kriyāḥ

original: Bhg_01.043a doṣair etaiḥ kulaghnānāṃ varṇasaṃkarakārakaiḥ
analyzed: doṣaiḥ etaiḥ kula ghnānām varṇa saṃkara kārakaiḥ

original: Bhg_01.043c utsādyante jātidharmāḥ kuladharmāś ca śāśvatāḥ
analyzed: utsādyante jāti dharmāḥ kula dharmāḥ ca śāśvatāḥ

original: Bhg_01.044a utsannakuladharmāṇāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ janārdana
analyzed: utsanna kula dharmāṇām manuṣyāṇām janārdana

original: Bhg_01.044c narake niyataṃ vāso bhavatīty anuśuśruma
analyzed: narake niyatam vāsaḥ bhavati iti anuśuśruma

original: Bhg_01.045a aho bata mahat pāpaṃ kartuṃ vyavasitā vayam
analyzed: aho bata mahat pāpam kartum vyavasitāḥ vayam

original: Bhg_01.045c yad rājyasukhalobhena hantuṃ svajanam udyatāḥ
analyzed: yat rājya sukha lobhena hantum sva janam udyatāḥ

original: Bhg_01.046a yadi mām apratīkāram aśastraṃ śastrapāṇayaḥ
analyzed: yadi mām apratīkāram aśastram śastra pāṇayaḥ

original: Bhg_01.046c dhārtarāṣṭrā raṇe hanyus tan me kṣemataraṃ bhavet
analyzed: dhārtarāṣṭrāḥ raṇe hanyuḥ tat me kṣemataram bhavet

original: Bhg_01.047a evam uktvārjunaḥ saṃkhye rathopastha upāviśat
analyzed: evam uktvā arjunaḥ saṃkhye rathopasthe upāviśat

original: Bhg_01.047c visṛjya saśaraṃ cāpaṃ śokasaṃvignamānasaḥ
analyzed: visṛjya sa śaram cāpam śoka saṃvigna mānasaḥ

original: Bhg_02.001 saṃjaya uvāca
analyzed: saṃjayaḥ uvāca

original: Bhg_02.001a taṃ tathā kṛpayāviṣṭam aśrupūrṇākulekṣaṇam
analyzed: tam tathā kṛpayā āviṣṭam aśru pūrṇa ākula īkṣaṇam

original: Bhg_02.001c viṣīdantam idaṃ vākyam uvāca madhusūdanaḥ
analyzed: viṣīdantam idam vākyam uvāca madhusūdanaḥ

original: Bhg_02.002 śrībhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: Bhg_02.002a kutas tvā kaśmalam idaṃ viṣame samupasthitam
analyzed: kutas tvā kaśmalam idam viṣame samupasthitam

original: Bhg_02.002c anāryajuṣṭam asvargyam akīrtikaram arjuna
analyzed: an ārya juṣṭam asvargyam a kīrti karam arjuna

original: Bhg_02.003a klaibyaṃ mā sma gamaḥ pārtha naitat tvayy upapadyate
analyzed: klaibyam mā sma gamaḥ pārtha na etat tvayi upapadyate

original: Bhg_02.003c kṣudraṃ hṛdayadaurbalyaṃ tyaktvottiṣṭha paraṃtapa
analyzed: kṣudram hṛdaya daurbalyam tyaktvā uttiṣṭha paraṃtapa

original: Bhg_02.004 arjuna uvāca
analyzed: arjunaḥ uvāca

original: Bhg_02.004a kathaṃ bhīṣmam ahaṃ saṃkhye droṇaṃ ca madhusūdana
analyzed: katham bhīṣmam aham saṃkhye droṇam ca madhusūdana

original: Bhg_02.004c iṣubhiḥ pratiyotsyāmi pūjārhāv arisūdana
analyzed: iṣubhiḥ pratiyotsyāmi pūjā arhau ari sūdana

original: Bhg_02.005a_0 gurūn ahatvā hi mahānubhāvāñ;
analyzed: gurūn a hatvā hi mahā anubhāvān

original: Bhg_02.005a_1 śreyo bhoktuṃ bhaikṣam apīha loke
analyzed: śreyaḥ bhoktum bhaikṣam api iha loke

original: Bhg_02.005c_0 hatvārthakāmāṃs tu gurūn ihaiva;
analyzed: hatvā artha kāmān tu gurūn iha eva

original: Bhg_02.005c_1 bhuñjīya bhogān rudhirapradigdhān
analyzed: bhuñjīya bhogān rudhira pradigdhān

original: Bhg_02.006a_0 na caitad vidmaḥ kataran no garīyo;
analyzed: na ca etat vidmaḥ katarat naḥ garīyaḥ

original: Bhg_02.006a_1 yad vā jayema yadi vā no jayeyuḥ
analyzed: yat vā jayema yadi vā naḥ jayeyuḥ

original: Bhg_02.006c_0 yān eva hatvā na jijīviṣāmas;
analyzed: yān eva hatvā na jijīviṣāmas

original: Bhg_02.006c_1 te 'vasthitāḥ pramukhe dhārtarāṣṭrāḥ
analyzed: te vasthitāḥ pramukhe dhārtarāṣṭrāḥ

original: Bhg_02.007a_0 kārpaṇyadoṣopahatasvabhāvaḥ;
analyzed: kārpaṇya doṣa upahata svabhāvaḥ

original: Bhg_02.007a_1 pṛcchāmi tvāṃ dharmasaṃmūḍhacetāḥ
analyzed: pṛcchāmi tvām dharma saṃmūḍha cetāḥ

original: Bhg_02.007c_0 yac chreyaḥ syān niścitaṃ brūhi tan me;
analyzed: yat śreyaḥ syāt niścitam brūhi tat me

original: Bhg_02.007c_1 śiṣyas te 'haṃ śādhi māṃ tvāṃ prapannam
analyzed: śiṣyaḥ te ham śādhi mām tvām prapannam

original: Bhg_02.008a_0 na hi prapaśyāmi mamāpanudyād;
analyzed: na hi prapaśyāmi mama apanudyāt

original: Bhg_02.008a_1 yac chokam ucchoṣaṇam indriyāṇām
analyzed: yat śokam ucchoṣaṇam indriyāṇām

original: Bhg_02.008c_0 avāpya bhūmāv asapatnam ṛddhaṃ;
analyzed: avāpya bhūmau asapatnam ṛddham

original: Bhg_02.008c_1 rājyaṃ surāṇām api cādhipatyam
analyzed: rājyam surāṇām api ca ādhipatyam

original: Bhg_02.009 saṃjaya uvāca
analyzed: saṃjayaḥ uvāca

original: Bhg_02.009a evam uktvā hṛṣīkeśaṃ guḍākeśaḥ paraṃtapa
analyzed: evam uktvā hṛṣīkeśam guḍākeśaḥ paraṃtapa

original: Bhg_02.009c na yotsya iti govindam uktvā tūṣṇīṃ babhūva ha
analyzed: na yotsye iti govindam uktvā tūṣṇīm babhūva ha

original: Bhg_02.010a tam uvāca hṛṣīkeśaḥ prahasann iva bhārata
analyzed: tam uvāca hṛṣīkeśaḥ prahasan iva bhārata

original: Bhg_02.010c senayor ubhayor madhye viṣīdantam idaṃ vacaḥ
analyzed: senayoḥ ubhayoḥ madhye viṣīdantam idam vacaḥ

original: Bhg_02.011 śrībhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: Bhg_02.011a aśocyān anvaśocas tvaṃ prajñāvādāṃś ca bhāṣase
analyzed: a śocyān anvaśocaḥ tvam prajñā vādān ca bhāṣase

original: Bhg_02.011c gatāsūn agatāsūṃś ca nānuśocanti paṇḍitāḥ
analyzed: gatāsūn agatāsūn ca na anuśocanti paṇḍitāḥ

original: Bhg_02.012a na tv evāhaṃ jātu nāsaṃ na tvaṃ neme janādhipāḥ
analyzed: na tu eva aham jātu na āsam na tvam na ime janādhipāḥ

original: Bhg_02.012c na caiva na bhaviṣyāmaḥ sarve vayam ataḥ param
analyzed: na ca eva na bhaviṣyāmaḥ sarve vayam atas param

original: Bhg_02.013a dehino 'smin yathā dehe kaumāraṃ yauvanaṃ jarā
analyzed: dehinaḥ u smin yathā dehe kaumāram yauvanam jarā

original: Bhg_02.013c tathā dehāntaraprāptir dhīras tatra na muhyati
analyzed: tathā deha antara prāptiḥ dhīraḥ tatra na muhyati

original: Bhg_02.014a mātrāsparśās tu kaunteya śītoṣṇasukhaduḥkhadāḥ
analyzed: mātrā sparśāḥ tu kaunteya śīta uṣṇa sukha duḥkha dāḥ

original: Bhg_02.014c āgamāpāyino 'nityās tāṃs titikṣasva bhārata
analyzed: āgama apāyinaḥ nityāḥ tān titikṣasva bhārata

original: Bhg_02.015a yaṃ hi na vyathayanty ete puruṣaṃ puruṣarṣabha
analyzed: yam hi na vyathayanti ete puruṣam puruṣa ṛṣabha

original: Bhg_02.015c samaduḥkhasukhaṃ dhīraṃ so 'mṛtatvāya kalpate
analyzed: sama duḥkha sukham dhīram saḥ mṛta tvāya kalpate

original: Bhg_02.016a nāsato vidyate bhāvo nābhāvo vidyate sataḥ
analyzed: na asataḥ vidyate bhāvaḥ na abhāvaḥ vidyate sataḥ

original: Bhg_02.016c ubhayor api dṛṣṭo 'ntas tv anayos tattvadarśibhiḥ
analyzed: ubhayoḥ api dṛṣṭaḥ ntaḥ tu anayoḥ tattva darśibhiḥ

original: Bhg_02.017a avināśi tu tad viddhi yena sarvam idaṃ tatam
analyzed: avināśi tu tat viddhi yena sarvam idam tatam

original: Bhg_02.017c vināśam avyayasyāsya na kaś cit kartum arhati
analyzed: vināśam avyayasya asya na kaḥ cit kartum arhati

original: Bhg_02.018a antavanta ime dehā nityasyoktāḥ śarīriṇaḥ
analyzed: antavantaḥ ime dehāḥ nityasya uktāḥ śarīriṇaḥ

original: Bhg_02.018c anāśino 'prameyasya tasmād yudhyasva bhārata
analyzed: anāśino prameyasya tasmāt yudhyasva bhārata

original: Bhg_02.019a ya enaṃ vetti hantāraṃ yaś cainaṃ manyate hatam
analyzed: yaḥ enam vetti hantāram yaḥ ca enam manyate hatam

original: Bhg_02.019c ubhau tau na vijānīto nāyaṃ hanti na hanyate
analyzed: ubhau tau na vijānītaḥ na ayam hanti na hanyate

original: Bhg_02.020a_0 na jāyate mriyate vā kadā cin;
analyzed: na jāyate mriyate vā kadā cit

original: Bhg_02.020a_1 nāyaṃ bhūtvā bhavitā vā na bhūyaḥ
analyzed: na ayam bhūtvā bhavitā vā na bhūyas

original: Bhg_02.020c_0 ajo nityaḥ śāśvato 'yaṃ purāṇo;
analyzed: ajaḥ nityaḥ śāśvataḥ yam purāṇaḥ

original: Bhg_02.020c_1 na hanyate hanyamāne śarīre
analyzed: na hanyate hanyamāne śarīre

original: Bhg_02.021a vedāvināśinaṃ nityaṃ ya enam ajam avyayam
analyzed: veda avināśinam nityam yaḥ enam ajam avyayam

original: Bhg_02.021c kathaṃ sa puruṣaḥ pārtha kaṃ ghātayati hanti kam
analyzed: katham sa puruṣaḥ pārtha kam ghātayati hanti kam

original: Bhg_02.022a_0 vāsāṃsi jīrṇāni yathā vihāya;
analyzed: vāsāṃsi jīrṇāni yathā vihāya

original: Bhg_02.022a_1 navāni gṛhṇāti naro 'parāṇi
analyzed: navāni gṛhṇāti naraḥ parāṇi

original: Bhg_02.022c_0 tathā śarīrāṇi vihāya jīrṇāny;
analyzed: tathā śarīrāṇi vihāya jīrṇāni

original: Bhg_02.022c_1 anyāni saṃyāti navāni dehī
analyzed: anyāni saṃyāti navāni dehī

original: Bhg_02.023a nainaṃ chindanti śastrāṇi nainaṃ dahati pāvakaḥ
analyzed: na enam chindanti śastrāṇi na enam dahati pāvakaḥ

original: Bhg_02.023c na cainaṃ kledayanty āpo na śoṣayati mārutaḥ
analyzed: na ca enam kledayanti āpaḥ na śoṣayati mārutaḥ

original: Bhg_02.024a acchedyo 'yam adāhyo 'yam akledyo 'śoṣya eva ca
analyzed: acchedyaḥ yam a dāhyaḥ yam a kledyaḥ śoṣyaḥ eva ca

original: Bhg_02.024c nityaḥ sarvagataḥ sthāṇur acalo 'yaṃ sanātanaḥ
analyzed: nityaḥ sarva gataḥ sthāṇuḥ acalaḥ yam sanātanaḥ

original: Bhg_02.025a avyakto 'yam acintyo 'yam avikāryo 'yam ucyate
analyzed: avyaktaḥ yam acintyaḥ yam avikāryaḥ yam ucyate

original: Bhg_02.025c tasmād evaṃ viditvainaṃ nānuśocitum arhasi
analyzed: tasmāt evam viditvā enam na anuśocitum arhasi

original: Bhg_02.026a atha cainaṃ nityajātaṃ nityaṃ vā manyase mṛtam
analyzed: atha ca enam nitya jātam nityam vā manyase mṛtam

original: Bhg_02.026c tathāpi tvaṃ mahābāho nainaṃ śocitum arhasi
analyzed: tathā api tvam mahā bāho na enam śocitum arhasi

original: Bhg_02.027a jātasya hi dhruvo mṛtyur dhruvaṃ janma mṛtasya ca
analyzed: jātasya hi dhruvaḥ mṛtyuḥ dhruvam janma mṛtasya ca

original: Bhg_02.027c tasmād aparihārye 'rthe na tvaṃ śocitum arhasi
analyzed: tasmāt aparihārye rthe na tvam śocitum arhasi

original: Bhg_02.028a avyaktādīni bhūtāni vyaktamadhyāni bhārata
analyzed: avyakta ādīni bhūtāni vyakta madhyāni bhārata

original: Bhg_02.028c avyaktanidhanāny eva tatra kā paridevanā
analyzed: avyakta nidhanāni eva tatra kā paridevanā

original: Bhg_02.029a_0 āścaryavat paśyati kaś cid enam;
analyzed: āścarya vat paśyati kaḥ cit enam

original: Bhg_02.029a_1 āścaryavad vadati tathaiva cānyaḥ
analyzed: āścarya vat vadati tathā eva ca anyaḥ

original: Bhg_02.029c_0 āścaryavac cainam anyaḥ śṛṇoti;
analyzed: āścarya vat ca enam anyaḥ śṛṇoti

original: Bhg_02.029c_1 śrutvāpy enaṃ veda na caiva kaś cit
analyzed: śrutvā api enam veda na ca eva kaḥ cit

original: Bhg_02.030a dehī nityam avadhyo 'yaṃ dehe sarvasya bhārata
analyzed: dehī nityam avadhyaḥ yam dehe sarvasya bhārata

original: Bhg_02.030c tasmāt sarvāṇi bhūtāni na tvaṃ śocitum arhasi
analyzed: tasmāt sarvāṇi bhūtāni na tvam śocitum arhasi

original: Bhg_02.031a svadharmam api cāvekṣya na vikampitum arhasi
analyzed: svadharmam api ca avekṣya na vikampitum arhasi

original: Bhg_02.031c dharmyād dhi yuddhāc chreyo 'nyat kṣatriyasya na vidyate
analyzed: dharmyāt hi yuddhāt śreyaḥ nyat kṣatriyasya na vidyate

original: Bhg_02.032a yadṛcchayā copapannaṃ svargadvāram apāvṛtam
analyzed: yadṛcchayā ca upapannam svarga dvāram apāvṛtam

original: Bhg_02.032c sukhinaḥ kṣatriyāḥ pārtha labhante yuddham īdṛśam
analyzed: sukhinaḥ kṣatriyāḥ pārtha labhante yuddham īdṛśam

original: Bhg_02.033a atha cet tvam imaṃ dharmyaṃ saṃgrāmaṃ na kariṣyasi
analyzed: atha ced tvam imam dharmyam saṃgrāmam na kariṣyasi

original: Bhg_02.033c tataḥ svadharmaṃ kīrtiṃ ca hitvā pāpam avāpsyasi
analyzed: tatas svadharmam kīrtim ca hitvā pāpam avāpsyasi

original: Bhg_02.034a akīrtiṃ cāpi bhūtāni kathayiṣyanti te 'vyayām
analyzed: akīrtim ca api bhūtāni kathayiṣyanti te vyayām

original: Bhg_02.034c saṃbhāvitasya cākīrtir maraṇād atiricyate
analyzed: saṃbhāvitasya ca akīrtiḥ maraṇāt atiricyate

original: Bhg_02.035a bhayād raṇād uparataṃ maṃsyante tvāṃ mahārathāḥ
analyzed: bhayāt raṇāt uparatam maṃsyante tvām mahā rathāḥ

original: Bhg_02.035c yeṣāṃ ca tvaṃ bahumato bhūtvā yāsyasi lāghavam
analyzed: yeṣām ca tvam bahu mataḥ bhūtvā yāsyasi lāghavam

original: Bhg_02.036a avācyavādāṃś ca bahūn vadiṣyanti tavāhitāḥ
analyzed: avācya vādān ca bahūn vadiṣyanti tava ahitāḥ

original: Bhg_02.036c nindantas tava sāmarthyaṃ tato duḥkhataraṃ nu kim
analyzed: nindantaḥ tava sāmarthyam tatas duḥkhataram nu kim

original: Bhg_02.037a hato vā prāpsyasi svargaṃ jitvā vā bhokṣyase mahīm
analyzed: hataḥ vā prāpsyasi svargam jitvā vā bhokṣyase mahīm

original: Bhg_02.037c tasmād uttiṣṭha kaunteya yuddhāya kṛtaniścayaḥ
analyzed: tasmāt uttiṣṭha kaunteya yuddhāya kṛta niścayaḥ

original: Bhg_02.038a sukhaduḥkhe same kṛtvā lābhālābhau jayājayau
analyzed: sukha duḥkhe same kṛtvā lābha alābhau jaya ajayau

original: Bhg_02.038c tato yuddhāya yujyasva naivaṃ pāpam avāpsyasi
analyzed: tatas yuddhāya yujyasva na evam pāpam avāpsyasi

original: Bhg_02.039a eṣā te 'bhihitā sāṃkhye buddhir yoge tv imāṃ śṛṇu
analyzed: eṣā te bhihitā sāṃkhye buddhiḥ yoge tu imām śṛṇu

original: Bhg_02.039c buddhyā yukto yayā pārtha karmabandhaṃ prahāsyasi
analyzed: buddhyā yuktaḥ yayā pārtha karma bandham prahāsyasi

original: Bhg_02.040a nehābhikramanāśo 'sti pratyavāyo na vidyate
analyzed: na iha abhikrama nāśaḥ sti pratyavāyaḥ na vidyate

original: Bhg_02.040c svalpam apy asya dharmasya trāyate mahato bhayāt
analyzed: su alpam api asya dharmasya trāyate mahataḥ bhayāt

original: Bhg_02.041a vyavasāyātmikā buddhir ekeha kurunandana
analyzed: vyavasāya ātmikā buddhiḥ ekā iha kuru nandana

original: Bhg_02.041c bahuśākhā hy anantāś ca buddhayo 'vyavasāyinām
analyzed: bahu śākhāḥ hi anantāḥ ca buddhayaḥ vyavasāyinām

original: Bhg_02.042a yām imāṃ puṣpitāṃ vācaṃ pravadanty avipaścitaḥ
analyzed: yām imām puṣpitām vācam pravadanti a vipaścitaḥ

original: Bhg_02.042c vedavādaratāḥ pārtha nānyad astīti vādinaḥ
analyzed: veda vāda ratāḥ pārtha na anyat asti iti vādinaḥ

original: Bhg_02.043a kāmātmānaḥ svargaparā janmakarmaphalapradām
analyzed: kāma ātmānaḥ svarga parāḥ janma karma phala pradām

original: Bhg_02.043c kriyāviśeṣabahulāṃ bhogaiśvaryagatiṃ prati
analyzed: kriyā viśeṣa bahulām bhoga aiśvarya gatim prati

original: Bhg_02.044a bhogaiśvaryaprasaktānāṃ tayāpahṛtacetasām
analyzed: bhoga aiśvarya prasaktānām tayā apahṛta cetasām

original: Bhg_02.044c vyavasāyātmikā buddhiḥ samādhau na vidhīyate
analyzed: vyavasāya ātmikā buddhiḥ samādhau na vidhīyate

original: Bhg_02.045a traiguṇyaviṣayā vedā nistraiguṇyo bhavārjuna
analyzed: traiguṇya viṣayāḥ vedāḥ nistraiguṇyaḥ bhava arjuna

original: Bhg_02.045c nirdvaṃdvo nityasattvastho niryogakṣema ātmavān
analyzed: nirdvaṃdvaḥ nitya sattva sthaḥ niryogakṣemaḥ ātmavān

original: Bhg_02.046a yāvān artha udapāne sarvataḥ saṃplutodake
analyzed: yāvān arthaḥ udapāne sarvatas saṃpluta udake

original: Bhg_02.046c tāvān sarveṣu vedeṣu brāhmaṇasya vijānataḥ
analyzed: tāvān sarveṣu vedeṣu brāhmaṇasya vijānataḥ

original: Bhg_02.047a karmaṇy evādhikāras te mā phaleṣu kadā cana
analyzed: karmaṇi eva adhikāraḥ te mā phaleṣu kadā cana

original: Bhg_02.047c mā karmaphalahetur bhūr mā te saṅgo 'stv akarmaṇi
analyzed: mā karma phala hetuḥ bhūḥ mā te saṅgo stu akarmaṇi

original: Bhg_02.048a yogasthaḥ kuru karmāṇi saṅgaṃ tyaktvā dhanaṃjaya
analyzed: yoga sthaḥ kuru karmāṇi saṅgam tyaktvā dhanaṃjaya

original: Bhg_02.048c siddhyasiddhyoḥ samo bhūtvā samatvaṃ yoga ucyate
analyzed: siddhi asiddhyoḥ samaḥ bhūtvā sama tvam yogaḥ ucyate

original: Bhg_02.049a dūreṇa hy avaraṃ karma buddhiyogād dhanaṃjaya
analyzed: dūreṇa hi avaram karma buddhi yogāt dhanaṃjaya

original: Bhg_02.049c buddhau śaraṇam anviccha kṛpaṇāḥ phalahetavaḥ
analyzed: buddhau śaraṇam anviccha kṛpaṇāḥ phala hetavaḥ

original: Bhg_02.050a buddhiyukto jahātīha ubhe sukṛtaduṣkṛte
analyzed: buddhi yuktaḥ jahāti iha ubhe sukṛta duṣkṛte

original: Bhg_02.050c tasmād yogāya yujyasva yogaḥ karmasu kauśalam
analyzed: tasmāt yogāya yujyasva yogaḥ karmasu kauśalam

original: Bhg_02.051a karmajaṃ buddhiyuktā hi phalaṃ tyaktvā manīṣiṇaḥ
analyzed: karma jam buddhi yuktāḥ hi phalam tyaktvā manīṣiṇaḥ

original: Bhg_02.051c janmabandhavinirmuktāḥ padaṃ gacchanty anāmayam
analyzed: janma bandha vinirmuktāḥ padam gacchanti anāmayam

original: Bhg_02.052a yadā te mohakalilaṃ buddhir vyatitariṣyati
analyzed: yadā te moha kalilam buddhiḥ vyatitariṣyati

original: Bhg_02.052c tadā gantāsi nirvedaṃ śrotavyasya śrutasya ca
analyzed: tadā gantāsi nirvedam śrotavyasya śrutasya ca

original: Bhg_02.053a śrutivipratipannā te yadā sthāsyati niścalā
analyzed: śruti vipratipannā te yadā sthāsyati niścalā

original: Bhg_02.053c samādhāv acalā buddhis tadā yogam avāpsyasi
analyzed: samādhau acalā buddhiḥ tadā yogam avāpsyasi

original: Bhg_02.054 arjuna uvāca
analyzed: arjunaḥ uvāca

original: Bhg_02.054a sthitaprajñasya kā bhāṣā samādhisthasya keśava
analyzed: sthita prajñasya kā bhāṣā samādhi sthasya keśava

original: Bhg_02.054c sthitadhīḥ kiṃ prabhāṣeta kim āsīta vrajeta kim
analyzed: sthita dhīḥ kim prabhāṣeta kim āsīta vrajeta kim

original: Bhg_02.055 śrībhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: Bhg_02.055a prajahāti yadā kāmān sarvān pārtha manogatān
analyzed: prajahāti yadā kāmān sarvān pārtha manaḥ gatān

original: Bhg_02.055c ātmany evātmanā tuṣṭaḥ sthitaprajñas tadocyate
analyzed: ātmani eva ātmanā tuṣṭaḥ sthita prajñaḥ tadā ucyate

original: Bhg_02.056a duḥkheṣv anudvignamanāḥ sukheṣu vigataspṛhaḥ
analyzed: duḥkheṣu anudvigna manāḥ sukheṣu vigata spṛhaḥ

original: Bhg_02.056c vītarāgabhayakrodhaḥ sthitadhīr munir ucyate
analyzed: vīta rāga bhaya krodhaḥ sthita dhīḥ muniḥ ucyate

original: Bhg_02.057a yaḥ sarvatrānabhisnehas tat tat prāpya śubhāśubham
analyzed: yaḥ sarvatra anabhisnehaḥ tat tat prāpya śubha aśubham

original: Bhg_02.057c nābhinandati na dveṣṭi tasya prajñā pratiṣṭhitā
analyzed: na abhinandati na dveṣṭi tasya prajñā pratiṣṭhitā

original: Bhg_02.058a yadā saṃharate cāyaṃ kūrmo 'ṅgānīva sarvaśaḥ
analyzed: yadā saṃharate ca ayam kūrmaḥ u ṅgāni iva sarvaśas

original: Bhg_02.058c indriyāṇīndriyārthebhyas tasya prajñā pratiṣṭhitā
analyzed: indriyāṇi indriya arthebhyaḥ tasya prajñā pratiṣṭhitā

original: Bhg_02.059a viṣayā vinivartante nirāhārasya dehinaḥ
analyzed: viṣayāḥ vinivartante nirāhārasya dehinaḥ

original: Bhg_02.059c rasavarjaṃ raso 'py asya paraṃ dṛṣṭvā nivartate
analyzed: rasa varjam asya param dṛṣṭvā nivartate

original: Bhg_02.060a yatato hy api kaunteya puruṣasya vipaścitaḥ
analyzed: yatataḥ hi api kaunteya puruṣasya vipaścitaḥ

original: Bhg_02.060c indriyāṇi pramāthīni haranti prasabhaṃ manaḥ
analyzed: indriyāṇi pramāthīni haranti prasabham manaḥ

original: Bhg_02.061a tāni sarvāṇi saṃyamya yukta āsīta matparaḥ
analyzed: tāni sarvāṇi saṃyamya yuktaḥ āsīta mad paraḥ

original: Bhg_02.061c vaśe hi yasyendriyāṇi tasya prajñā pratiṣṭhitā
analyzed: vaśe hi yasya indriyāṇi tasya prajñā pratiṣṭhitā

original: Bhg_02.062a dhyāyato viṣayān puṃsaḥ saṅgas teṣūpajāyate
analyzed: dhyāyataḥ viṣayān puṃsaḥ saṅgaḥ teṣu upajāyate

original: Bhg_02.062c saṅgāt saṃjāyate kāmaḥ kāmāt krodho 'bhijāyate
analyzed: saṅgāt saṃjāyate kāmaḥ kāmāt krodhaḥ bhijāyate

original: Bhg_02.063a krodhād bhavati saṃmohaḥ saṃmohāt smṛtivibhramaḥ
analyzed: krodhāt bhavati saṃmohaḥ saṃmohāt smṛti vibhramaḥ

original: Bhg_02.063c smṛtibhraṃśād buddhināśo buddhināśāt praṇaśyati
analyzed: smṛti bhraṃśāt buddhi nāśaḥ buddhi nāśāt praṇaśyati

original: Bhg_02.064a rāgadveṣaviyuktais tu viṣayān indriyaiś caran
analyzed: rāga dveṣa viyuktaiḥ tu viṣayān indriyaiḥ caran

original: Bhg_02.064c ātmavaśyair vidheyātmā prasādam adhigacchati
analyzed: ātma vaśyaiḥ vidheya ātmā prasādam adhigacchati

original: Bhg_02.065a prasāde sarvaduḥkhānāṃ hānir asyopajāyate
analyzed: prasāde sarva duḥkhānām hāniḥ asya upajāyate

original: Bhg_02.065c prasannacetaso hy āśu buddhiḥ paryavatiṣṭhate
analyzed: prasanna cetasaḥ hi āśu buddhiḥ paryavatiṣṭhate

original: Bhg_02.066a nāsti buddhir ayuktasya na cāyuktasya bhāvanā
analyzed: na asti buddhiḥ ayuktasya na ca ayuktasya bhāvanā

original: Bhg_02.066c na cābhāvayataḥ śāntir aśāntasya kutaḥ sukham
analyzed: na ca abhāvayataḥ śāntiḥ aśāntasya kutas sukham

original: Bhg_02.067a indriyāṇāṃ hi caratāṃ yan mano 'nuvidhīyate
analyzed: indriyāṇām hi caratām yat manaḥ nuvidhīyate

original: Bhg_02.067c tad asya harati prajñāṃ vāyur nāvam ivāmbhasi
analyzed: tat asya harati prajñām vāyuḥ nāvam iva ambhasi

original: Bhg_02.068a tasmād yasya mahābāho nigṛhītāni sarvaśaḥ
analyzed: tasmāt yasya mahā bāho nigṛhītāni sarvaśas

original: Bhg_02.068c indriyāṇīndriyārthebhyas tasya prajñā pratiṣṭhitā
analyzed: indriyāṇi indriya arthebhyaḥ tasya prajñā pratiṣṭhitā

original: Bhg_02.069a yā niśā sarvabhūtānāṃ tasyāṃ jāgarti saṃyamī
analyzed: yā niśā sarva bhūtānām tasyām jāgarti saṃyamī

original: Bhg_02.069c yasyāṃ jāgrati bhūtāni sā niśā paśyato muneḥ
analyzed: yasyām jāgrati bhūtāni sā niśā paśyataḥ muneḥ

original: Bhg_02.070a_0 āpūryamāṇam acalapratiṣṭhaṃ;
analyzed: āpūryamāṇam acala pratiṣṭham

original: Bhg_02.070a_1 samudram āpaḥ praviśanti yadvat
analyzed: samudram āpaḥ praviśanti yadvat

original: Bhg_02.070c_0 tadvat kāmā yaṃ praviśanti sarve;
analyzed: tadvat kāmāḥ yam praviśanti sarve

original: Bhg_02.070c_1 sa śāntim āpnoti na kāmakāmī
analyzed: sa śāntim āpnoti na kāma kāmī

original: Bhg_02.071a vihāya kāmān yaḥ sarvān pumāṃś carati niḥspṛhaḥ
analyzed: vihāya kāmān yaḥ sarvān pumān carati niḥspṛhaḥ

original: Bhg_02.071c nirmamo nirahaṃkāraḥ sa śāntim adhigacchati
analyzed: nirmamaḥ nirahaṃkāraḥ sa śāntim adhigacchati

original: Bhg_02.072a eṣā brāhmī sthitiḥ pārtha naināṃ prāpya vimuhyati
analyzed: eṣā brāhmī sthitiḥ pārtha na enām prāpya vimuhyati

original: Bhg_02.072c sthitvāsyām antakāle 'pi brahmanirvāṇam ṛcchati
analyzed: sthitvā asyām anta kāle brahma nirvāṇam ṛcchati

original: Bhg_03.001 arjuna uvāca
analyzed: arjunaḥ uvāca

original: Bhg_03.001a jyāyasī cet karmaṇas te matā buddhir janārdana
analyzed: jyāyasī ced karmaṇaḥ te matā buddhiḥ janārdana

original: Bhg_03.001c tat kiṃ karmaṇi ghore māṃ niyojayasi keśava
analyzed: tat kim karmaṇi ghore mām niyojayasi keśava

original: Bhg_03.002a vyāmiśreṇaiva vākyena buddhiṃ mohayasīva me
analyzed: vyāmiśreṇa eva vākyena buddhim mohayasi iva me

original: Bhg_03.002c tad ekaṃ vada niścitya yena śreyo 'ham āpnuyām
analyzed: tat ekam vada niścitya yena śreyaḥ ham āpnuyām

original: Bhg_03.003 śrībhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: Bhg_03.003a loke 'smin dvividhā niṣṭhā purā proktā mayānagha
analyzed: loke smin dvividhā niṣṭhā purā proktā mayā anagha

original: Bhg_03.003c jñānayogena sāṃkhyānāṃ karmayogena yoginām
analyzed: jñāna yogena sāṃkhyānām karma yogena yoginām

original: Bhg_03.004a na karmaṇām anārambhān naiṣkarmyaṃ puruṣo 'śnute
analyzed: na karmaṇām anārambhāt naiṣkarmyam śnute

original: Bhg_03.004c na ca saṃnyasanād eva siddhiṃ samadhigacchati
analyzed: na ca saṃnyasanāt eva siddhim samadhigacchati

original: Bhg_03.005a na hi kaś cit kṣaṇam api jātu tiṣṭhaty akarmakṛt
analyzed: na hi kaḥ cit kṣaṇam api jātu tiṣṭhati a karma kṛt

original: Bhg_03.005c kāryate hy avaśaḥ karma sarvaḥ prakṛtijair guṇaiḥ
analyzed: kāryate hi avaśaḥ karma sarvaḥ prakṛti jaiḥ guṇaiḥ

original: Bhg_03.006a karmendriyāṇi saṃyamya ya āste manasā smaran
analyzed: karmendriyāṇi saṃyamya yaḥ āste manasā smaran

original: Bhg_03.006c indriyārthān vimūḍhātmā mithyācāraḥ sa ucyate
analyzed: indriya arthān vimūḍha ātmā mithyā ācāraḥ saḥ ucyate

original: Bhg_03.007a yas tv indriyāṇi manasā niyamyārabhate 'rjuna
analyzed: yaḥ tu indriyāṇi manasā niyamya ārabhate rjuna

original: Bhg_03.007c karmendriyaiḥ karmayogam asaktaḥ sa viśiṣyate
analyzed: karmendriyaiḥ karma yogam asaktaḥ sa viśiṣyate

original: Bhg_03.008a niyataṃ kuru karma tvaṃ karma jyāyo hy akarmaṇaḥ
analyzed: niyatam kuru karma tvam karma jyāyaḥ hi akarmaṇaḥ

original: Bhg_03.008c śarīrayātrāpi ca te na prasidhyed akarmaṇaḥ
analyzed: śarīra yātrā api ca te na prasidhyet a karmaṇaḥ

original: Bhg_03.009a yajñārthāt karmaṇo 'nyatra loko 'yaṃ karmabandhanaḥ
analyzed: yajña arthāt karmaṇaḥ nyatra lokaḥ yam karma bandhanaḥ

original: Bhg_03.009c tadarthaṃ karma kaunteya muktasaṅgaḥ samācara
analyzed: tad artham karma kaunteya mukta saṅgaḥ samācara

original: Bhg_03.010a sahayajñāḥ prajāḥ sṛṣṭvā purovāca prajāpatiḥ
analyzed: saha yajñāḥ prajāḥ sṛṣṭvā purā uvāca prajāpatiḥ

original: Bhg_03.010c anena prasaviṣyadhvam eṣa vo 'stv iṣṭakāmadhuk
analyzed: anena prasaviṣyadhvam eṣa vaḥ stu iṣṭa kāmadhuk

original: Bhg_03.011a devān bhāvayatānena te devā bhāvayantu vaḥ
analyzed: devān bhāvayata anena te devāḥ bhāvayantu vaḥ

original: Bhg_03.011c parasparaṃ bhāvayantaḥ śreyaḥ param avāpsyatha
analyzed: parasparam bhāvayantaḥ śreyaḥ param avāpsyatha

original: Bhg_03.012a iṣṭān bhogān hi vo devā dāsyante yajñabhāvitāḥ
analyzed: iṣṭān bhogān hi vaḥ devāḥ dāsyante yajña bhāvitāḥ

original: Bhg_03.012c tair dattān apradāyaibhyo yo bhuṅkte stena eva saḥ
analyzed: taiḥ dattān a pradāya ebhyaḥ yaḥ bhuṅkte stenaḥ eva saḥ

original: Bhg_03.013a yajñaśiṣṭāśinaḥ santo mucyante sarvakilbiṣaiḥ
analyzed: yajña śiṣṭa āśinaḥ santaḥ mucyante sarva kilbiṣaiḥ

original: Bhg_03.013c bhuñjate te tv aghaṃ pāpā ye pacanty ātmakāraṇāt
analyzed: bhuñjate te tu agham pāpāḥ ye pacanti ātma kāraṇāt

original: Bhg_03.014a annād bhavanti bhūtāni parjanyād annasaṃbhavaḥ
analyzed: annāt bhavanti bhūtāni parjanyāt anna saṃbhavaḥ

original: Bhg_03.014c yajñād bhavati parjanyo yajñaḥ karmasamudbhavaḥ
analyzed: yajñāt bhavati parjanyaḥ yajñaḥ karma samudbhavaḥ

original: Bhg_03.015a karma brahmodbhavaṃ viddhi brahmākṣarasamudbhavam
analyzed: karma brahma udbhavam viddhi brahma akṣara samudbhavam

original: Bhg_03.015c tasmāt sarvagataṃ brahma nityaṃ yajñe pratiṣṭhitam
analyzed: tasmāt sarva gatam brahma nityam yajñe pratiṣṭhitam

original: Bhg_03.016a evaṃ pravartitaṃ cakraṃ nānuvartayatīha yaḥ
analyzed: evam pravartitam cakram na anuvartayati iha yaḥ

original: Bhg_03.016c aghāyur indriyārāmo moghaṃ pārtha sa jīvati
analyzed: aghāyuḥ indriya ārāmaḥ mogham pārtha sa jīvati

original: Bhg_03.017a yas tv ātmaratir eva syād ātmatṛptaś ca mānavaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ tu ātma ratiḥ eva syāt ātma tṛptaḥ ca mānavaḥ

original: Bhg_03.017c ātmany eva ca saṃtuṣṭas tasya kāryaṃ na vidyate
analyzed: ātmani eva ca saṃtuṣṭaḥ tasya kāryam na vidyate

original: Bhg_03.018a naiva tasya kṛtenārtho nākṛteneha kaś cana
analyzed: na eva tasya kṛtena arthaḥ na akṛtena iha kaḥ cana

original: Bhg_03.018c na cāsya sarvabhūteṣu kaś cid arthavyapāśrayaḥ
analyzed: na ca asya sarva bhūteṣu kaḥ cit artha vyapāśrayaḥ

original: Bhg_03.019a tasmād asaktaḥ satataṃ kāryaṃ karma samācara
analyzed: tasmāt asaktaḥ satatam kāryam karma samācara

original: Bhg_03.019c asakto hy ācaran karma param āpnoti pūruṣaḥ
analyzed: asaktaḥ hi ācaran karma param āpnoti pūruṣaḥ

original: Bhg_03.020a karmaṇaiva hi saṃsiddhim āsthitā janakādayaḥ
analyzed: karmaṇā eva hi saṃsiddhim āsthitāḥ janaka ādayaḥ

original: Bhg_03.020c lokasaṃgraham evāpi saṃpaśyan kartum arhasi
analyzed: loka saṃgraham eva api saṃpaśyan kartum arhasi

original: Bhg_03.021a yad yad ācarati śreṣṭhas tat tad evetaro janaḥ
analyzed: yat yat ācarati śreṣṭhaḥ tat tat eva itaraḥ janaḥ

original: Bhg_03.021c sa yat pramāṇaṃ kurute lokas tad anuvartate
analyzed: sa yat pramāṇam kurute lokaḥ tat anuvartate

original: Bhg_03.022a na me pārthāsti kartavyaṃ triṣu lokeṣu kiṃ cana
analyzed: na me pārtha asti kartavyam triṣu lokeṣu kim cana

original: Bhg_03.022c nānavāptam avāptavyaṃ varta eva ca karmaṇi
analyzed: na anavāptam avāptavyam varte eva ca karmaṇi

original: Bhg_03.023a yadi hy ahaṃ na varteyaṃ jātu karmaṇy atandritaḥ
analyzed: yadi hi aham na varteyam jātu karmaṇi atandritaḥ

original: Bhg_03.023c mama vartmānuvartante manuṣyāḥ pārtha sarvaśaḥ
analyzed: mama vartma anuvartante manuṣyāḥ pārtha sarvaśas

original: Bhg_03.024a utsīdeyur ime lokā na kuryāṃ karma ced aham
analyzed: utsīdeyuḥ ime lokāḥ na kuryām karma ced aham

original: Bhg_03.024c saṃkarasya ca kartā syām upahanyām imāḥ prajāḥ
analyzed: saṃkarasya ca kartā syām upahanyām imāḥ prajāḥ

original: Bhg_03.025a saktāḥ karmaṇy avidvāṃso yathā kurvanti bhārata
analyzed: saktāḥ karmaṇi a vidvāṃsaḥ yathā kurvanti bhārata

original: Bhg_03.025c kuryād vidvāṃs tathāsaktaś cikīrṣur lokasaṃgraham
analyzed: kuryāt vidvān tathā asaktaḥ cikīrṣuḥ loka saṃgraham

original: Bhg_03.026a na buddhibhedaṃ janayed ajñānāṃ karmasaṅginām
analyzed: na buddhi bhedam janayet ajñānām karma saṅginām

original: Bhg_03.026c joṣayet sarvakarmāṇi vidvān yuktaḥ samācaran
analyzed: joṣayet sarva karmāṇi vidvān yuktaḥ samācaran

original: Bhg_03.027a prakṛteḥ kriyamāṇāni guṇaiḥ karmāṇi sarvaśaḥ
analyzed: prakṛteḥ kriyamāṇāni guṇaiḥ karmāṇi sarvaśas

original: Bhg_03.027c ahaṃkāravimūḍhātmā kartāham iti manyate
analyzed: ahaṃkāra vimūḍha ātmā kartāham iti manyate

original: Bhg_03.028a tattvavit tu mahābāho guṇakarmavibhāgayoḥ
analyzed: tattva vid tu mahā bāho guṇa karma vibhāgayoḥ

original: Bhg_03.028c guṇā guṇeṣu vartanta iti matvā na sajjate
analyzed: guṇāḥ guṇeṣu vartante iti matvā na sajjate

original: Bhg_03.029a prakṛter guṇasaṃmūḍhāḥ sajjante guṇakarmasu
analyzed: prakṛteḥ guṇa saṃmūḍhāḥ sajjante guṇa karmasu

original: Bhg_03.029c tān akṛtsnavido mandān kṛtsnavin na vicālayet
analyzed: tān akṛtsna vidaḥ mandān kṛtsna vid na vicālayet

original: Bhg_03.030a mayi sarvāṇi karmāṇi saṃnyasyādhyātmacetasā
analyzed: mayi sarvāṇi karmāṇi saṃnyasya adhyātma cetasā

original: Bhg_03.030c nirāśīr nirmamo bhūtvā yudhyasva vigatajvaraḥ
analyzed: nirāśīḥ nirmamaḥ bhūtvā yudhyasva vigata jvaraḥ

original: Bhg_03.031a ye me matam idaṃ nityam anutiṣṭhanti mānavāḥ
analyzed: ye me matam idam nityam anutiṣṭhanti mānavāḥ

original: Bhg_03.031c śraddhāvanto 'nasūyanto mucyante te 'pi karmabhiḥ
analyzed: śraddhāvantaḥ nasūyantaḥ mucyante te karmabhiḥ

original: Bhg_03.032a ye tv etad abhyasūyanto nānutiṣṭhanti me matam
analyzed: ye tu etat abhyasūyantaḥ na anutiṣṭhanti me matam

original: Bhg_03.032c sarvajñānavimūḍhāṃs tān viddhi naṣṭān acetasaḥ
analyzed: sarva jñāna vimūḍhān tān viddhi naṣṭān acetasaḥ

original: Bhg_03.033a sadṛśaṃ ceṣṭate svasyāḥ prakṛter jñānavān api
analyzed: sadṛśam ceṣṭate svasyāḥ prakṛteḥ jñānavān api

original: Bhg_03.033c prakṛtiṃ yānti bhūtāni nigrahaḥ kiṃ kariṣyati
analyzed: prakṛtim yānti bhūtāni nigrahaḥ kim kariṣyati

original: Bhg_03.034a indriyasyendriyasyārthe rāgadveṣau vyavasthitau
analyzed: indriyasya indriyasya arthe rāga dveṣau vyavasthitau

original: Bhg_03.034c tayor na vaśam āgacchet tau hy asya paripanthinau
analyzed: tayoḥ na vaśam āgacchet tau hi asya paripanthinau

original: Bhg_03.035a śreyān svadharmo viguṇaḥ paradharmāt svanuṣṭhitāt
analyzed: śreyān svadharmaḥ viguṇaḥ para dharmāt su anuṣṭhitāt

original: Bhg_03.035c svadharme nidhanaṃ śreyaḥ paradharmo bhayāvahaḥ
analyzed: svadharme nidhanam śreyaḥ para dharmaḥ bhaya āvahaḥ

original: Bhg_03.036 arjuna uvāca
analyzed: arjunaḥ uvāca

original: Bhg_03.036a atha kena prayukto 'yaṃ pāpaṃ carati pūruṣaḥ
analyzed: atha kena prayuktaḥ yam pāpam carati pūruṣaḥ

original: Bhg_03.036c anicchann api vārṣṇeya balād iva niyojitaḥ
analyzed: an icchan api vārṣṇeya balāt iva niyojitaḥ

original: Bhg_03.037 śrībhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: Bhg_03.037a kāma eṣa krodha eṣa rajoguṇasamudbhavaḥ
analyzed: kāmaḥ eṣa krodhaḥ eṣa rajaḥ guṇa samudbhavaḥ

original: Bhg_03.037c mahāśano mahāpāpmā viddhy enam iha vairiṇam
analyzed: mahā aśanaḥ mahā pāpmā viddhi enam iha vairiṇam

original: Bhg_03.038a dhūmenāvriyate vahnir yathādarśo malena ca
analyzed: dhūmena āvriyate vahniḥ yathā ādarśaḥ malena ca

original: Bhg_03.038c yatholbenāvṛto garbhas tathā tenedam āvṛtam
analyzed: yathā ulbena āvṛtaḥ garbhaḥ tathā tena idam āvṛtam

original: Bhg_03.039a āvṛtaṃ jñānam etena jñānino nityavairiṇā
analyzed: āvṛtam jñānam etena jñāninaḥ nitya vairiṇā

original: Bhg_03.039c kāmarūpeṇa kaunteya duṣpūreṇānalena ca
analyzed: kāmarūpeṇa kaunteya duṣpūreṇa analena ca

original: Bhg_03.040a indriyāṇi mano buddhir asyādhiṣṭhānam ucyate
analyzed: indriyāṇi manaḥ buddhiḥ asya adhiṣṭhānam ucyate

original: Bhg_03.040c etair vimohayaty eṣa jñānam āvṛtya dehinam
analyzed: etaiḥ vimohayati eṣa jñānam āvṛtya dehinam

original: Bhg_03.041a tasmāt tvam indriyāṇy ādau niyamya bharatarṣabha
analyzed: tasmāt tvam indriyāṇi ādau niyamya bharata ṛṣabha

original: Bhg_03.041c pāpmānaṃ prajahihy enaṃ jñānavijñānanāśanam
analyzed: pāpmānam prajahihi enam jñāna vijñāna nāśanam

original: Bhg_03.042a indriyāṇi parāṇy āhur indriyebhyaḥ paraṃ manaḥ
analyzed: indriyāṇi parāṇi āhuḥ indriyebhyaḥ param manaḥ

original: Bhg_03.042c manasas tu parā buddhir yo buddheḥ paratas tu saḥ
analyzed: manasaḥ tu parā buddhiḥ yaḥ buddheḥ paratas tu saḥ

original: Bhg_03.043a evaṃ buddheḥ paraṃ buddhvā saṃstabhyātmānam ātmanā
analyzed: evam buddheḥ param buddhvā saṃstabhya ātmānam ātmanā

original: Bhg_03.043c jahi śatruṃ mahābāho kāmarūpaṃ durāsadam
analyzed: jahi śatrum mahā bāho kāmarūpam durāsadam

original: Bhg_04.001 śrībhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: Bhg_04.001a imaṃ vivasvate yogaṃ proktavān aham avyayam
analyzed: imam vivasvate yogam proktavān aham avyayam

original: Bhg_04.001c vivasvān manave prāha manur ikṣvākave 'bravīt
analyzed: vivasvān manave prāha manuḥ ikṣvākave bravīt

original: Bhg_04.002a evaṃ paraṃparāprāptam imaṃ rājarṣayo viduḥ
analyzed: evam paraṃparā prāptam imam rājarṣayaḥ viduḥ

original: Bhg_04.002c sa kāleneha mahatā yogo naṣṭaḥ paraṃtapa
analyzed: sa kālena iha mahatā yogaḥ naṣṭaḥ paraṃtapa

original: Bhg_04.003a sa evāyaṃ mayā te 'dya yogaḥ proktaḥ purātanaḥ
analyzed: saḥ eva ayam mayā te dya yogaḥ proktaḥ purātanaḥ

original: Bhg_04.003c bhakto 'si me sakhā ceti rahasyaṃ hy etad uttamam
analyzed: bhaktaḥ si me sakhā ca iti rahasyam hi etat uttamam

original: Bhg_04.004 arjuna uvāca
analyzed: arjunaḥ uvāca

original: Bhg_04.004a aparaṃ bhavato janma paraṃ janma vivasvataḥ
analyzed: aparam bhavataḥ janma param janma vivasvataḥ

original: Bhg_04.004c katham etad vijānīyāṃ tvam ādau proktavān iti
analyzed: katham etat vijānīyām tvam ādau proktavān iti

original: Bhg_04.005 śrībhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: Bhg_04.005a bahūni me vyatītāni janmāni tava cārjuna
analyzed: bahūni me vyatītāni janmāni tava ca arjuna

original: Bhg_04.005c tāny ahaṃ veda sarvāṇi na tvaṃ vettha paraṃtapa
analyzed: tāni aham veda sarvāṇi na tvam vettha paraṃtapa

original: Bhg_04.006a ajo 'pi sann avyayātmā bhūtānām īśvaro 'pi san
analyzed: ajaḥ pi san avyaya ātmā bhūtānām īśvaraḥ pi san

original: Bhg_04.006c prakṛtiṃ svām adhiṣṭhāya saṃbhavāmy ātmamāyayā
analyzed: prakṛtim svām adhiṣṭhāya saṃbhavāmi ātma māyayā

original: Bhg_04.007a yadā yadā hi dharmasya glānir bhavati bhārata
analyzed: yadā yadā hi dharmasya glāniḥ bhavati bhārata

original: Bhg_04.007c abhyutthānam adharmasya tadātmānaṃ sṛjāmy aham
analyzed: abhyutthānam adharmasya tadā ātmānam sṛjāmi aham

original: Bhg_04.008a paritrāṇāya sādhūnāṃ vināśāya ca duṣkṛtām
analyzed: paritrāṇāya sādhūnām vināśāya ca duṣkṛtām

original: Bhg_04.008c dharmasaṃsthāpanārthāya saṃbhavāmi yuge yuge
analyzed: dharma saṃsthāpana arthāya saṃbhavāmi yuge yuge

original: Bhg_04.009a janma karma ca me divyam evaṃ yo vetti tattvataḥ
analyzed: janma karma ca me divyam evam yaḥ vetti tattvataḥ

original: Bhg_04.009c tyaktvā dehaṃ punarjanma naiti mām eti so 'rjuna
analyzed: tyaktvā deham punarjanma na eti mām eti saḥ rjuna

original: Bhg_04.010a vītarāgabhayakrodhā manmayā mām upāśritāḥ
analyzed: vīta rāga bhaya krodhāḥ mad mayāḥ mām upāśritāḥ

original: Bhg_04.010c bahavo jñānatapasā pūtā madbhāvam āgatāḥ
analyzed: bahavaḥ jñāna tapasā pūtāḥ mad bhāvam āgatāḥ

original: Bhg_04.011a ye yathā māṃ prapadyante tāṃs tathaiva bhajāmy aham
analyzed: ye yathā mām prapadyante tān tathā eva bhajāmi aham

original: Bhg_04.011c mama vartmānuvartante manuṣyāḥ pārtha sarvaśaḥ
analyzed: mama vartma anuvartante manuṣyāḥ pārtha sarvaśas

original: Bhg_04.012a kāṅkṣantaḥ karmaṇāṃ siddhiṃ yajanta iha devatāḥ
analyzed: kāṅkṣantaḥ karmaṇām siddhim yajantaḥ iha devatāḥ

original: Bhg_04.012c kṣipraṃ hi mānuṣe loke siddhir bhavati karmajā
analyzed: kṣipram hi mānuṣe loke siddhiḥ bhavati karma jā

original: Bhg_04.013a cāturvarṇyaṃ mayā sṛṣṭaṃ guṇakarmavibhāgaśaḥ
analyzed: cāturvarṇyam mayā sṛṣṭam guṇa karma vibhāgaśaḥ

original: Bhg_04.013c tasya kartāram api māṃ viddhy akartāram avyayam
analyzed: tasya kartāram api mām viddhi akartāram avyayam

original: Bhg_04.014a na māṃ karmāṇi limpanti na me karmaphale spṛhā
analyzed: na mām karmāṇi limpanti na me karma phale spṛhā

original: Bhg_04.014c iti māṃ yo 'bhijānāti karmabhir na sa badhyate
analyzed: iti mām yaḥ abhijānāti karmabhiḥ na sa badhyate

original: Bhg_04.015a evaṃ jñātvā kṛtaṃ karma pūrvair api mumukṣubhiḥ
analyzed: evam jñātvā kṛtam karma pūrvaiḥ api mumukṣubhiḥ

original: Bhg_04.015c kuru karmaiva tasmāt tvaṃ pūrvaiḥ pūrvataraṃ kṛtam
analyzed: kuru karma eva tasmāt tvam pūrvaiḥ pūrvataram kṛtam

original: Bhg_04.016a kiṃ karma kim akarmeti kavayo 'py atra mohitāḥ
analyzed: kim karma kim akarma iti kavayaḥ api atra mohitāḥ

original: Bhg_04.016c tat te karma pravakṣyāmi yaj jñātvā mokṣyase 'śubhāt
analyzed: tat te karma pravakṣyāmi yat jñātvā mokṣyase śubhāt

original: Bhg_04.017a karmaṇo hy api boddhavyaṃ boddhavyaṃ ca vikarmaṇaḥ
analyzed: karmaṇaḥ hi api boddhavyam boddhavyam ca vikarmaṇaḥ

original: Bhg_04.017c akarmaṇaś ca boddhavyaṃ gahanā karmaṇo gatiḥ
analyzed: akarmaṇaḥ ca boddhavyam gahanā karmaṇaḥ gatiḥ

original: Bhg_04.018a karmaṇy akarma yaḥ paśyed akarmaṇi ca karma yaḥ
analyzed: karmaṇi a karma yaḥ paśyet a karmaṇi ca karma yaḥ

original: Bhg_04.018c sa buddhimān manuṣyeṣu sa yuktaḥ kṛtsnakarmakṛt
analyzed: sa buddhimān manuṣyeṣu sa yuktaḥ kṛtsna karma kṛt

original: Bhg_04.019a yasya sarve samārambhāḥ kāmasaṃkalpavarjitāḥ
analyzed: yasya sarve samārambhāḥ kāma saṃkalpa varjitāḥ

original: Bhg_04.019c jñānāgnidagdhakarmāṇaṃ tam āhuḥ paṇḍitaṃ budhāḥ
analyzed: jñāna agni dagdha karmāṇam tam āhuḥ paṇḍitam budhāḥ

original: Bhg_04.020a tyaktvā karmaphalāsaṅgaṃ nityatṛpto nirāśrayaḥ
analyzed: tyaktvā karma phala āsaṅgam nitya tṛptaḥ nirāśrayaḥ

original: Bhg_04.020c karmaṇy abhipravṛtto 'pi naiva kiṃ cit karoti saḥ
analyzed: karmaṇi na eva kim cit karoti saḥ

original: Bhg_04.021a nirāśīr yatacittātmā tyaktasarvaparigrahaḥ
analyzed: nirāśīḥ yata citta ātmā tyakta sarva parigrahaḥ

original: Bhg_04.021c śārīraṃ kevalaṃ karma kurvan nāpnoti kilbiṣam
analyzed: śārīram kevalam karma kurvan na āpnoti kilbiṣam

original: Bhg_04.022a yadṛcchālābhasaṃtuṣṭo dvaṃdvātīto vimatsaraḥ
analyzed: yadṛcchā lābha saṃtuṣṭaḥ dvaṃdva atītaḥ vimatsaraḥ

original: Bhg_04.022c samaḥ siddhāv asiddhau ca kṛtvāpi na nibadhyate
analyzed: samaḥ siddhau asiddhau ca kṛtvā api na nibadhyate

original: Bhg_04.023a gatasaṅgasya muktasya jñānāvasthitacetasaḥ
analyzed: gata saṅgasya muktasya jñāna avasthita cetasaḥ

original: Bhg_04.023c yajñāyācarataḥ karma samagraṃ pravilīyate
analyzed: yajñāya ācarataḥ karma samagram pravilīyate

original: Bhg_04.024a brahmārpaṇaṃ brahmahavir brahmāgnau brahmaṇā hutam
analyzed: brahma arpaṇam brahma haviḥ brahma agnau brahmaṇā hutam

original: Bhg_04.024c brahmaiva tena gantavyaṃ brahmakarmasamādhinā
analyzed: brahma eva tena gantavyam brahma karma samādhinā

original: Bhg_04.025a daivam evāpare yajñaṃ yoginaḥ paryupāsate
analyzed: daivam eva apare yajñam yoginaḥ paryupāsate

original: Bhg_04.025c brahmāgnāv apare yajñaṃ yajñenaivopajuhvati
analyzed: brahma agnau apare yajñam yajñena eva upajuhvati

original: Bhg_04.026a śrotrādīnīndriyāṇy anye saṃyamāgniṣu juhvati
analyzed: śrotra ādīni indriyāṇi anye saṃyama agniṣu juhvati

original: Bhg_04.026c śabdādīn viṣayān anya indriyāgniṣu juhvati
analyzed: śabda ādīn viṣayān anye indriya agniṣu juhvati

original: Bhg_04.027a sarvāṇīndriyakarmāṇi prāṇakarmāṇi cāpare
analyzed: sarvāṇi indriya karmāṇi prāṇa karmāṇi ca apare

original: Bhg_04.027c ātmasaṃyamayogāgnau juhvati jñānadīpite
Bhg_04.028a dravyayajñās tapoyajñā yogayajñās tathāpare
analyzed: dravya yajñāḥ tapaḥ yajñāḥ yoga yajñāḥ tathā apare

original: Bhg_04.028c svādhyāyajñānayajñāś ca yatayaḥ saṃśitavratāḥ
analyzed: svādhyāya jñāna yajñāḥ ca yatayaḥ saṃśita vratāḥ

original: Bhg_04.029a apāne juhvati prāṇaṃ prāṇe 'pānaṃ tathāpare
analyzed: apāne juhvati prāṇam prāṇe pānam tathā apare

original: Bhg_04.029c prāṇāpānagatī ruddhvā prāṇāyāmaparāyaṇāḥ
analyzed: prāṇa apāna gatīḥ ruddhvā prāṇāyāma parāyaṇāḥ

original: Bhg_04.030a apare niyatāhārāḥ prāṇān prāṇeṣu juhvati
analyzed: apare niyata āhārāḥ prāṇān prāṇeṣu juhvati

original: Bhg_04.030c sarve 'py ete yajñavido yajñakṣapitakalmaṣāḥ
analyzed: sarve pi ete yajña vidaḥ yajña kṣapita kalmaṣāḥ

original: Bhg_04.031a yajñaśiṣṭāmṛtabhujo yānti brahma sanātanam
analyzed: yajña śiṣṭa amṛta bhujaḥ yānti brahma sanātanam

original: Bhg_04.031c nāyaṃ loko 'sty ayajñasya kuto 'nyaḥ kurusattama
analyzed: na ayam asti ayajñasya kutas kurusattama

original: Bhg_04.032a evaṃ bahuvidhā yajñā vitatā brahmaṇo mukhe
analyzed: evam bahuvidhāḥ yajñāḥ vitatāḥ brahmaṇaḥ mukhe

original: Bhg_04.032c karmajān viddhi tān sarvān evaṃ jñātvā vimokṣyase
analyzed: karma jān viddhi tān sarvān evam jñātvā vimokṣyase

original: Bhg_04.033a śreyān dravyamayād yajñāj jñānayajñaḥ paraṃtapa
analyzed: śreyān dravya mayāt yajñāt jñāna yajñaḥ paraṃtapa

original: Bhg_04.033c sarvaṃ karmākhilaṃ pārtha jñāne parisamāpyate
analyzed: sarvam karma akhilam pārtha jñāne parisamāpyate

original: Bhg_04.034a tad viddhi praṇipātena paripraśnena sevayā
analyzed: tat viddhi praṇipātena paripraśnena sevayā

original: Bhg_04.034c upadekṣyanti te jñānaṃ jñāninas tattvadarśinaḥ
analyzed: upadekṣyanti te jñānam jñāninaḥ tattva darśinaḥ

original: Bhg_04.035a yaj jñātvā na punar moham evaṃ yāsyasi pāṇḍava
analyzed: yat jñātvā na punar moham evam yāsyasi pāṇḍava

original: Bhg_04.035c yena bhūtāny aśeṣeṇa drakṣyasy ātmany atho mayi
analyzed: yena bhūtāni aśeṣeṇa drakṣyasi ātmani atha u mayi

original: Bhg_04.036a api ced asi pāpebhyaḥ sarvebhyaḥ pāpakṛttamaḥ
analyzed: api ced asi pāpebhyaḥ sarvebhyaḥ pāpa kṛttamaḥ

original: Bhg_04.036c sarvaṃ jñānaplavenaiva vṛjinaṃ saṃtariṣyasi
analyzed: sarvam jñāna plavena eva vṛjinam saṃtariṣyasi

original: Bhg_04.037a yathaidhāṃsi samiddho 'gnir bhasmasāt kurute 'rjuna
analyzed: yathā edhāṃsi samiddhaḥ gniḥ bhasmasāt kurute rjuna

original: Bhg_04.037c jñānāgniḥ sarvakarmāṇi bhasmasāt kurute tathā
analyzed: jñāna agniḥ sarva karmāṇi bhasmasāt kurute tathā

original: Bhg_04.038a na hi jñānena sadṛśaṃ pavitram iha vidyate
analyzed: na hi jñānena sadṛśam pavitram iha vidyate

original: Bhg_04.038c tat svayaṃ yogasaṃsiddhaḥ kālenātmani vindati
analyzed: tat svayam yoga saṃsiddhaḥ kālena ātmani vindati

original: Bhg_04.039a śraddhāvāṃl labhate jñānaṃ tatparaḥ saṃyatendriyaḥ
analyzed: śraddhāvān labhate jñānam tad paraḥ saṃyata indriyaḥ

original: Bhg_04.039c jñānaṃ labdhvā parāṃ śāntim acireṇādhigacchati
analyzed: jñānam labdhvā parām śāntim acireṇa adhigacchati

original: Bhg_04.040a ajñaś cāśraddadhānaś ca saṃśayātmā vinaśyati
analyzed: ajñaḥ ca aśraddadhānaḥ ca saṃśaya ātmā vinaśyati

original: Bhg_04.040c nāyaṃ loko 'sti na paro na sukhaṃ saṃśayātmanaḥ
analyzed: na ayam lokaḥ sti na paraḥ na sukham saṃśaya ātmanaḥ

original: Bhg_04.041a yogasaṃnyastakarmāṇaṃ jñānasaṃchinnasaṃśayam
analyzed: yoga saṃnyasta karmāṇam jñāna saṃchinna saṃśayam

original: Bhg_04.041c ātmavantaṃ na karmāṇi nibadhnanti dhanaṃjaya
analyzed: ātmavantam na karmāṇi nibadhnanti dhanaṃjaya

original: Bhg_04.042a tasmād ajñānasaṃbhūtaṃ hṛtsthaṃ jñānāsinātmanaḥ
analyzed: tasmāt ajñāna saṃbhūtam hṛd stham jñāna asinā ātmanaḥ

original: Bhg_04.042c chittvainaṃ saṃśayaṃ yogam ātiṣṭhottiṣṭha bhārata
analyzed: chittvā enam saṃśayam yogam ātiṣṭha uttiṣṭha bhārata

original: Bhg_05.001 arjuna uvāca
analyzed: arjunaḥ uvāca

original: Bhg_05.001a saṃnyāsaṃ karmaṇāṃ kṛṣṇa punar yogaṃ ca śaṃsasi
analyzed: saṃnyāsam karmaṇām kṛṣṇa punar yogam ca śaṃsasi

original: Bhg_05.001c yac chreya etayor ekaṃ tan me brūhi suniścitam
analyzed: yat śreyaḥ etayoḥ ekam tat me brūhi su niścitam

original: Bhg_05.002 śrībhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: Bhg_05.002a saṃnyāsaḥ karmayogaś ca niḥśreyasakarāv ubhau
analyzed: saṃnyāsaḥ karma yogaḥ ca niḥśreyasa karau ubhau

original: Bhg_05.002c tayos tu karmasaṃnyāsāt karmayogo viśiṣyate
analyzed: tayoḥ tu karma saṃnyāsāt karma yogaḥ viśiṣyate

original: Bhg_05.003a jñeyaḥ sa nityasaṃnyāsī yo na dveṣṭi na kāṅkṣati
analyzed: jñeyaḥ sa nitya saṃnyāsī yaḥ na dveṣṭi na kāṅkṣati

original: Bhg_05.003c nirdvaṃdvo hi mahābāho sukhaṃ bandhāt pramucyate
analyzed: nirdvaṃdvaḥ hi mahā bāho sukham bandhāt pramucyate

original: Bhg_05.004a sāṃkhyayogau pṛthag bālāḥ pravadanti na paṇḍitāḥ
analyzed: sāṃkhya yogau pṛthak bālāḥ pravadanti na paṇḍitāḥ

original: Bhg_05.004c ekam apy āsthitaḥ samyag ubhayor vindate phalam
analyzed: ekam api āsthitaḥ samyak ubhayoḥ vindate phalam

original: Bhg_05.005a yat sāṃkhyaiḥ prāpyate sthānaṃ tad yogair api gamyate
analyzed: yat sāṃkhyaiḥ prāpyate sthānam tat yogaiḥ api gamyate

original: Bhg_05.005c ekaṃ sāṃkhyaṃ ca yogaṃ ca yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati
analyzed: ekam sāṃkhyam ca yogam ca yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati

original: Bhg_05.006a saṃnyāsas tu mahābāho duḥkham āptum ayogataḥ
analyzed: saṃnyāsaḥ tu mahā bāho duḥkham āptum ayogataḥ

original: Bhg_05.006c yogayukto munir brahma nacireṇādhigacchati
analyzed: yoga yuktaḥ muniḥ brahma nacireṇa adhigacchati

original: Bhg_05.007a yogayukto viśuddhātmā vijitātmā jitendriyaḥ
analyzed: yoga yuktaḥ viśuddha ātmā vijita ātmā jita indriyaḥ

original: Bhg_05.007c sarvabhūtātmabhūtātmā kurvann api na lipyate
analyzed: sarva bhūta ātma bhūta ātmā kurvan api na lipyate

original: Bhg_05.008a naiva kiṃ cit karomīti yukto manyeta tattvavit
analyzed: na eva kim cit karomi iti yuktaḥ manyeta tattva vid

original: Bhg_05.008c paśyañ śṛṇvan spṛśañ jighrann aśnan gacchan svapañ śvasan
analyzed: paśyam śṛṇvan spṛśam jighran aśnan gacchan svapam śvasan

original: Bhg_05.009a pralapan visṛjan gṛhṇann unmiṣan nimiṣann api
analyzed: pralapan visṛjan gṛhṇan unmiṣan nimiṣan api

original: Bhg_05.009c indriyāṇīndriyārtheṣu vartanta iti dhārayan
analyzed: indriyāṇi indriya artheṣu vartante iti dhārayan

original: Bhg_05.010a brahmaṇy ādhāya karmāṇi saṅgaṃ tyaktvā karoti yaḥ
analyzed: brahmaṇi ādhāya karmāṇi saṅgam tyaktvā karoti yaḥ

original: Bhg_05.010c lipyate na sa pāpena padmapatram ivāmbhasā
analyzed: lipyate na sa pāpena padma patram iva ambhasā

original: Bhg_05.011a kāyena manasā buddhyā kevalair indriyair api
analyzed: kāyena manasā buddhyā kevalaiḥ indriyaiḥ api

original: Bhg_05.011c yoginaḥ karma kurvanti saṅgaṃ tyaktvātmaśuddhaye
analyzed: yoginaḥ karma kurvanti saṅgam tyaktvā ātma śuddhaye

original: Bhg_05.012a yuktaḥ karmaphalaṃ tyaktvā śāntim āpnoti naiṣṭhikīm
analyzed: yuktaḥ karma phalam tyaktvā śāntim āpnoti naiṣṭhikīm

original: Bhg_05.012c ayuktaḥ kāmakāreṇa phale sakto nibadhyate
analyzed: a yuktaḥ kāmakāreṇa phale saktaḥ nibadhyate

original: Bhg_05.013a sarvakarmāṇi manasā saṃnyasyāste sukhaṃ vaśī
analyzed: sarva karmāṇi manasā saṃnyasya āste sukham vaśī

original: Bhg_05.013c navadvāre pure dehī naiva kurvan na kārayan
analyzed: nava dvāre pure dehī na eva kurvan na kārayan

original: Bhg_05.014a na kartṛtvaṃ na karmāṇi lokasya sṛjati prabhuḥ
analyzed: na kartṛ tvam na karmāṇi lokasya sṛjati prabhuḥ

original: Bhg_05.014c na karmaphalasaṃyogaṃ svabhāvas tu pravartate
analyzed: na karma phala saṃyogam svabhāvaḥ tu pravartate

original: Bhg_05.015a nādatte kasya cit pāpaṃ na caiva sukṛtaṃ vibhuḥ
analyzed: na ādatte kasya cit pāpam na ca eva sukṛtam vibhuḥ

original: Bhg_05.015c ajñānenāvṛtaṃ jñānaṃ tena muhyanti jantavaḥ
analyzed: ajñānena āvṛtam jñānam tena muhyanti jantavaḥ

original: Bhg_05.016a jñānena tu tad ajñānaṃ yeṣāṃ nāśitam ātmanaḥ
analyzed: jñānena tu tat ajñānam yeṣām nāśitam ātmanaḥ

original: Bhg_05.016c teṣām ādityavaj jñānaṃ prakāśayati tatparam
analyzed: teṣām āditya vat jñānam prakāśayati tat param

original: Bhg_05.017a tadbuddhayas tadātmānas tanniṣṭhās tatparāyaṇāḥ
analyzed: tad buddhayaḥ tad ātmānaḥ tad niṣṭhāḥ tad parāyaṇāḥ

original: Bhg_05.017c gacchanty apunarāvṛttiṃ jñānanirdhūtakalmaṣāḥ
analyzed: gacchanti apunarāvṛttim jñāna nirdhūta kalmaṣāḥ

original: Bhg_05.018a vidyāvinayasaṃpanne brāhmaṇe gavi hastini
analyzed: vidyā vinaya saṃpanne brāhmaṇe gavi hastini

original: Bhg_05.018c śuni caiva śvapāke ca paṇḍitāḥ samadarśinaḥ
analyzed: śuni ca eva śvapāke ca paṇḍitāḥ sama darśinaḥ

original: Bhg_05.019a ihaiva tair jitaḥ sargo yeṣāṃ sāmye sthitaṃ manaḥ
analyzed: iha eva taiḥ jitaḥ sargaḥ yeṣām sāmye sthitam manaḥ

original: Bhg_05.019c nirdoṣaṃ hi samaṃ brahma tasmād brahmaṇi te sthitāḥ
analyzed: nirdoṣam hi samam brahma tasmāt brahmaṇi te sthitāḥ

original: Bhg_05.020a na prahṛṣyet priyaṃ prāpya nodvijet prāpya cāpriyam
analyzed: na prahṛṣyet priyam prāpya na udvijet prāpya ca apriyam

original: Bhg_05.020c sthirabuddhir asaṃmūḍho brahmavid brahmaṇi sthitaḥ
analyzed: sthira buddhiḥ asaṃmūḍhaḥ brahma vid brahmaṇi sthitaḥ

original: Bhg_05.021a bāhyasparśeṣv asaktātmā vindaty ātmani yat sukham
analyzed: bāhya sparśeṣu asakta ātmā vindati ātmani yat sukham

original: Bhg_05.021c sa brahmayogayuktātmā sukham akṣayam aśnute
analyzed: sa brahma yoga yukta ātmā sukham akṣayam aśnute

original: Bhg_05.022a ye hi saṃsparśajā bhogā duḥkhayonaya eva te
analyzed: ye hi saṃsparśa jāḥ bhogāḥ duḥkha yonayaḥ eva te

original: Bhg_05.022c ādyantavantaḥ kaunteya na teṣu ramate budhaḥ
analyzed: ādi antavantaḥ kaunteya na teṣu ramate budhaḥ

original: Bhg_05.023a śaknotīhaiva yaḥ soḍhuṃ prāk śarīravimokṣaṇāt
analyzed: śaknoti iha eva yaḥ soḍhum prāk śarīravimokṣaṇāt

original: Bhg_05.023c kāmakrodhodbhavaṃ vegaṃ sa yuktaḥ sa sukhī naraḥ
analyzed: kāma krodha udbhavam vegam sa yuktaḥ sa sukhī naraḥ

original: Bhg_05.024a yo 'ntaḥsukho 'ntarārāmas tathāntarjyotir eva yaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ ntar sukhaḥ ntara ārāmaḥ tathā antar jyotiḥ eva yaḥ

original: Bhg_05.024c sa yogī brahmanirvāṇaṃ brahmabhūto 'dhigacchati
analyzed: sa yogī brahma nirvāṇam brahma bhūtaḥ dhigacchati

original: Bhg_05.025a labhante brahmanirvāṇam ṛṣayaḥ kṣīṇakalmaṣāḥ
analyzed: labhante brahma nirvāṇam ṛṣayaḥ kṣīṇa kalmaṣāḥ

original: Bhg_05.025c chinnadvaidhā yatātmānaḥ sarvabhūtahite ratāḥ
analyzed: chinna dvaidhāḥ yata ātmānaḥ sarva bhūta hite ratāḥ

original: Bhg_05.026a kāmakrodhaviyuktānāṃ yatīnāṃ yatacetasām
analyzed: kāma krodha viyuktānām yatīnām yata cetasām

original: Bhg_05.026c abhito brahmanirvāṇaṃ vartate viditātmanām
analyzed: abhitas brahma nirvāṇam vartate vidita ātmanām

original: Bhg_05.027a sparśān kṛtvā bahir bāhyāṃś cakṣuś caivāntare bhruvoḥ
analyzed: sparśān kṛtvā bahis bāhyān cakṣuḥ ca eva antare bhruvoḥ

original: Bhg_05.027c prāṇāpānau samau kṛtvā nāsābhyantaracāriṇau
analyzed: prāṇa apānau samau kṛtvā nāsā abhyantara cāriṇau

original: Bhg_05.028a yatendriyamanobuddhir munir mokṣaparāyaṇaḥ
analyzed: yata indriya manaḥ buddhiḥ muniḥ mokṣa parāyaṇaḥ

original: Bhg_05.028c vigatecchābhayakrodho yaḥ sadā mukta eva saḥ
analyzed: vigata icchā bhaya krodhaḥ yaḥ sadā muktaḥ eva saḥ

original: Bhg_05.029a bhoktāraṃ yajñatapasāṃ sarvalokamaheśvaram
analyzed: bhoktāram yajña tapasām sarva loka mahā īśvaram

original: Bhg_05.029c suhṛdaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ jñātvā māṃ śāntim ṛcchati
analyzed: suhṛdam sarva bhūtānām jñātvā mām śāntim ṛcchati

original: Bhg_06.001 śrībhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: Bhg_06.001a anāśritaḥ karmaphalaṃ kāryaṃ karma karoti yaḥ
analyzed: anāśritaḥ karma phalam kāryam karma karoti yaḥ

original: Bhg_06.001c sa saṃnyāsī ca yogī ca na niragnir na cākriyaḥ
analyzed: sa saṃnyāsī ca yogī ca na niragniḥ na ca akriyaḥ

original: Bhg_06.002a yaṃ saṃnyāsam iti prāhur yogaṃ taṃ viddhi pāṇḍava
analyzed: yam saṃnyāsam iti prāhuḥ yogam tam viddhi pāṇḍava

original: Bhg_06.002c na hy asaṃnyastasaṃkalpo yogī bhavati kaś cana
analyzed: na hi asaṃnyasta saṃkalpaḥ yogī bhavati kaḥ cana

original: Bhg_06.003a ārurukṣor muner yogaṃ karma kāraṇam ucyate
analyzed: ārurukṣoḥ muneḥ yogam karma kāraṇam ucyate

original: Bhg_06.003c yogārūḍhasya tasyaiva śamaḥ kāraṇam ucyate
analyzed: yoga ārūḍhasya tasya eva śamaḥ kāraṇam ucyate

original: Bhg_06.004a yadā hi nendriyārtheṣu na karmasv anuṣajjate
analyzed: yadā hi na indriya artheṣu na karmasu anuṣajjate

original: Bhg_06.004c sarvasaṃkalpasaṃnyāsī yogārūḍhas tadocyate
analyzed: sarva saṃkalpa saṃnyāsī yoga ārūḍhaḥ tadā ucyate

original: Bhg_06.005a uddhared ātmanātmānaṃ nātmānam avasādayet
analyzed: uddharet ātmanā ātmānam na ātmānam avasādayet

original: Bhg_06.005c ātmaiva hy ātmano bandhur ātmaiva ripur ātmanaḥ
analyzed: ātmā eva hi ātmanaḥ bandhuḥ ātmā eva ripuḥ ātmanaḥ

original: Bhg_06.006a bandhur ātmātmanas tasya yenātmaivātmanā jitaḥ
analyzed: bandhuḥ ātmā ātmanaḥ tasya yena ātmā eva ātmanā jitaḥ

original: Bhg_06.006c anātmanas tu śatrutve vartetātmaiva śatruvat
analyzed: anātmanaḥ tu śatru tve varteta ātmā eva śatru vat

original: Bhg_06.007a jitātmanaḥ praśāntasya paramātmā samāhitaḥ
analyzed: jita ātmanaḥ praśāntasya paramātmā samāhitaḥ

original: Bhg_06.007c śītoṣṇasukhaduḥkheṣu tathā mānāvamānayoḥ
analyzed: śīta uṣṇa sukha duḥkheṣu tathā māna avamānayoḥ

original: Bhg_06.008a jñānavijñānatṛptātmā kūṭastho vijitendriyaḥ
analyzed: jñāna vijñāna tṛpta ātmā kūṭasthaḥ vijita indriyaḥ

original: Bhg_06.008c yukta ity ucyate yogī samaloṣṭāśmakāñcanaḥ
analyzed: yuktaḥ iti ucyate yogī sama loṣṭa aśma kāñcanaḥ

original: Bhg_06.009a suhṛnmitrāryudāsīnamadhyasthadveṣyabandhuṣu
analyzed: suhṛd mitra ari udāsīna madhyastha dveṣya bandhuṣu

original: Bhg_06.009c sādhuṣv api ca pāpeṣu samabuddhir viśiṣyate
analyzed: sādhuṣu api ca pāpeṣu sama buddhiḥ viśiṣyate

original: Bhg_06.010a yogī yuñjīta satatam ātmānaṃ rahasi sthitaḥ
analyzed: yogī yuñjīta satatam ātmānam rahasi sthitaḥ

original: Bhg_06.010c ekākī yatacittātmā nirāśīr aparigrahaḥ
analyzed: ekākī yata citta ātmā nirāśīḥ aparigrahaḥ

original: Bhg_06.011a śucau deśe pratiṣṭhāpya sthiram āsanam ātmanaḥ
analyzed: śucau deśe pratiṣṭhāpya sthiram āsanam ātmanaḥ

original: Bhg_06.011c nātyucchritaṃ nātinīcaṃ cailājinakuśottaram
analyzed: na ati ucchritam na ati nīcam caila ajina kuśa uttaram

original: Bhg_06.012a tatraikāgraṃ manaḥ kṛtvā yatacittendriyakriyaḥ
analyzed: tatra ekāgram manaḥ kṛtvā yata citta indriya kriyaḥ

original: Bhg_06.012c upaviśyāsane yuñjyād yogam ātmaviśuddhaye
analyzed: upaviśya āsane yuñjyāt yogam ātma viśuddhaye

original: Bhg_06.013a samaṃ kāyaśirogrīvaṃ dhārayann acalaṃ sthiraḥ
analyzed: samam kāya śiraḥ grīvam dhārayan acalam sthiraḥ

original: Bhg_06.013c saṃprekṣya nāsikāgraṃ svaṃ diśaś cānavalokayan
analyzed: saṃprekṣya nāsikā agram svam diśaḥ ca anavalokayan

original: Bhg_06.014a praśāntātmā vigatabhīr brahmacārivrate sthitaḥ
analyzed: praśānta ātmā vigata bhīḥ brahmacāri vrate sthitaḥ

original: Bhg_06.014c manaḥ saṃyamya maccitto yukta āsīta matparaḥ
analyzed: manaḥ saṃyamya mad cittaḥ yuktaḥ āsīta mad paraḥ

original: Bhg_06.015a yuñjann evaṃ sadātmānaṃ yogī niyatamānasaḥ
analyzed: yuñjan evam sadā ātmānam yogī niyata mānasaḥ

original: Bhg_06.015c śāntiṃ nirvāṇaparamāṃ matsaṃsthām adhigacchati
analyzed: śāntim nirvāṇa paramām mad saṃsthām adhigacchati

original: Bhg_06.016a nātyaśnatas tu yogo 'sti na caikāntam anaśnataḥ
analyzed: na atyaśnataḥ tu yogaḥ sti na ca ekāntam an aśnataḥ

original: Bhg_06.016c na cātisvapnaśīlasya jāgrato naiva cārjuna
analyzed: na ca ati svapna śīlasya jāgrataḥ na eva ca arjuna

original: Bhg_06.017a yuktāhāravihārasya yuktaceṣṭasya karmasu
analyzed: yukta āhāra vihārasya yukta ceṣṭasya karmasu

original: Bhg_06.017c yuktasvapnāvabodhasya yogo bhavati duḥkhahā
analyzed: yukta svapna avabodhasya yogaḥ bhavati duḥkha hā

original: Bhg_06.018a yadā viniyataṃ cittam ātmany evāvatiṣṭhate
analyzed: yadā viniyatam cittam ātmani eva avatiṣṭhate

original: Bhg_06.018c niḥspṛhaḥ sarvakāmebhyo yukta ity ucyate tadā
analyzed: niḥspṛhaḥ sarva kāmebhyaḥ yuktaḥ iti ucyate tadā

original: Bhg_06.019a yathā dīpo nivātastho neṅgate sopamā smṛtā
analyzed: yathā dīpaḥ nivāta sthaḥ na iṅgate sā upamā smṛtā

original: Bhg_06.019c yogino yatacittasya yuñjato yogam ātmanaḥ
analyzed: yoginaḥ yata cittasya yuñjataḥ yogam ātmanaḥ

original: Bhg_06.020a yatroparamate cittaṃ niruddhaṃ yogasevayā
analyzed: yatra uparamate cittam niruddham yoga sevayā

original: Bhg_06.020c yatra caivātmanātmānaṃ paśyann ātmani tuṣyati
analyzed: yatra ca eva ātmanā ātmānam paśyan ātmani tuṣyati

original: Bhg_06.021a sukham ātyantikaṃ yat tad buddhigrāhyam atīndriyam
analyzed: sukham ātyantikam yat tat buddhi grāhyam atīndriyam

original: Bhg_06.021c vetti yatra na caivāyaṃ sthitaś calati tattvataḥ
analyzed: vetti yatra na ca eva ayam sthitaḥ calati tattvataḥ

original: Bhg_06.022a yaṃ labdhvā cāparaṃ lābhaṃ manyate nādhikaṃ tataḥ
analyzed: yam labdhvā ca aparam lābham manyate na adhikam tatas

original: Bhg_06.022c yasmin sthito na duḥkhena guruṇāpi vicālyate
analyzed: yasmin sthitaḥ na duḥkhena guruṇā api vicālyate

original: Bhg_06.023a taṃ vidyād duḥkhasaṃyogaviyogaṃ yogasaṃjñitam
analyzed: tam vidyāt duḥkha saṃyoga viyogam yoga saṃjñitam

original: Bhg_06.023c sa niścayena yoktavyo yogo 'nirviṇṇacetasā
analyzed: sa niścayena yoktavyaḥ yogaḥ nirviṇṇa cetasā

original: Bhg_06.024a saṃkalpaprabhavān kāmāṃs tyaktvā sarvān aśeṣataḥ
analyzed: saṃkalpa prabhavān kāmān tyaktvā sarvān aśeṣatas

original: Bhg_06.024c manasaivendriyagrāmaṃ viniyamya samantataḥ
analyzed: manasā eva indriya grāmam viniyamya samantataḥ

original: Bhg_06.025a śanaiḥ śanair uparamed buddhyā dhṛtigṛhītayā
analyzed: śanais śanais uparamet buddhyā dhṛti gṛhītayā

original: Bhg_06.025c ātmasaṃsthaṃ manaḥ kṛtvā na kiṃ cid api cintayet
analyzed: ātma saṃstham manaḥ kṛtvā na kim cit api cintayet

original: Bhg_06.026a yato yato niścarati manaś cañcalam asthiram
analyzed: yatas yatas niścarati manaḥ cañcalam asthiram

original: Bhg_06.026c tatas tato niyamyaitad ātmany eva vaśaṃ nayet
analyzed: tatas tatas niyamya etat ātmani eva vaśam nayet

original: Bhg_06.027a praśāntamanasaṃ hy enaṃ yoginaṃ sukham uttamam
analyzed: praśānta manasam hi enam yoginam sukham uttamam

original: Bhg_06.027c upaiti śāntarajasaṃ brahmabhūtam akalmaṣam
analyzed: upaiti śānta rajasam brahma bhūtam akalmaṣam

original: Bhg_06.028a yuñjann evaṃ sadātmānaṃ yogī vigatakalmaṣaḥ
analyzed: yuñjan evam sadā ātmānam yogī vigata kalmaṣaḥ

original: Bhg_06.028c sukhena brahmasaṃsparśam atyantaṃ sukham aśnute
analyzed: sukhena brahma saṃsparśam atyantam sukham aśnute

original: Bhg_06.029a sarvabhūtastham ātmānaṃ sarvabhūtāni cātmani
analyzed: sarva bhūta stham ātmānam sarva bhūtāni ca ātmani

original: Bhg_06.029c īkṣate yogayuktātmā sarvatra samadarśanaḥ
analyzed: īkṣate yoga yukta ātmā sarvatra sama darśanaḥ

original: Bhg_06.030a yo māṃ paśyati sarvatra sarvaṃ ca mayi paśyati
analyzed: yaḥ mām paśyati sarvatra sarvam ca mayi paśyati

original: Bhg_06.030c tasyāhaṃ na praṇaśyāmi sa ca me na praṇaśyati
analyzed: tasya aham na praṇaśyāmi sa ca me na praṇaśyati

original: Bhg_06.031a sarvabhūtasthitaṃ yo māṃ bhajaty ekatvam āsthitaḥ
analyzed: sarva bhūta sthitam yaḥ mām bhajati eka tvam āsthitaḥ

original: Bhg_06.031c sarvathā vartamāno 'pi sa yogī mayi vartate
analyzed: sarvathā vartamānaḥ pi sa yogī mayi vartate

original: Bhg_06.032a ātmaupamyena sarvatra samaṃ paśyati yo 'rjuna
analyzed: ātma aupamyena sarvatra samam paśyati yaḥ rjuna

original: Bhg_06.032c sukhaṃ vā yadi vā duḥkhaṃ sa yogī paramo mataḥ
analyzed: sukham vā yadi vā duḥkham sa yogī paramaḥ mataḥ

original: Bhg_06.033 arjuna uvāca
analyzed: arjunaḥ uvāca

original: Bhg_06.033a yo 'yaṃ yogas tvayā proktaḥ sāmyena madhusūdana
analyzed: yaḥ yam yogaḥ tvayā proktaḥ sāmyena madhusūdana

original: Bhg_06.033c etasyāhaṃ na paśyāmi cañcalatvāt sthitiṃ sthirām
analyzed: etasya aham na paśyāmi cañcala tvāt sthitim sthirām

original: Bhg_06.034a cañcalaṃ hi manaḥ kṛṣṇa pramāthi balavad dṛḍham
analyzed: cañcalam hi manaḥ kṛṣṇa pramāthi balavat dṛḍham

original: Bhg_06.034c tasyāhaṃ nigrahaṃ manye vāyor iva suduṣkaram
analyzed: tasya aham nigraham manye vāyoḥ iva su duṣkaram

original: Bhg_06.035 śrībhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: Bhg_06.035a asaṃśayaṃ mahābāho mano durnigrahaṃ calam
analyzed: asaṃśayam mahā bāho manaḥ durnigraham calam

original: Bhg_06.035c abhyāsena tu kaunteya vairāgyeṇa ca gṛhyate
analyzed: abhyāsena tu kaunteya vairāgyeṇa ca gṛhyate

original: Bhg_06.036a asaṃyatātmanā yogo duṣprāpa iti me matiḥ
analyzed: asaṃyata ātmanā yogaḥ duṣprāpaḥ iti me matiḥ

original: Bhg_06.036c vaśyātmanā tu yatatā śakyo 'vāptum upāyataḥ
analyzed: vaśya ātmanā tu yatatā śakyaḥ vāptum upāyataḥ

original: Bhg_06.037 arjuna uvāca
analyzed: arjunaḥ uvāca

original: Bhg_06.037a ayatiḥ śraddhayopeto yogāc calitamānasaḥ
analyzed: ayatiḥ śraddhayā upetaḥ yogāt calita mānasaḥ

original: Bhg_06.037c aprāpya yogasaṃsiddhiṃ kāṃ gatiṃ kṛṣṇa gacchati
analyzed: a prāpya yoga saṃsiddhim kām gatim kṛṣṇa gacchati

original: Bhg_06.038a kaccin nobhayavibhraṣṭaś chinnābhram iva naśyati
analyzed: kaccit nā ubhaya vibhraṣṭaḥ chinna abhram iva naśyati

original: Bhg_06.038c apratiṣṭho mahābāho vimūḍho brahmaṇaḥ pathi
analyzed: apratiṣṭhaḥ mahā bāho vimūḍhaḥ brahmaṇaḥ pathi

original: Bhg_06.039a etan me saṃśayaṃ kṛṣṇa chettum arhasy aśeṣataḥ
analyzed: etat me saṃśayam kṛṣṇa chettum arhasi aśeṣatas

original: Bhg_06.039c tvad anyaḥ saṃśayasyāsya chettā na hy upapadyate
analyzed: tvat anyaḥ saṃśayasya asya chettā na hi upapadyate

original: Bhg_06.040 śrībhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: Bhg_06.040a pārtha naiveha nāmutra vināśas tasya vidyate
analyzed: pārtha na evā iha na amutra vināśaḥ tasya vidyate

original: Bhg_06.040c na hi kalyāṇakṛt kaś cid durgatiṃ tāta gacchati
analyzed: na hi kalyāṇa kṛt kaḥ cit durgatim tāta gacchati

original: Bhg_06.041a prāpya puṇyakṛtāṃl lokān uṣitvā śāśvatīḥ samāḥ
analyzed: prāpya puṇya kṛtām lokān uṣitvā śāśvatīḥ samāḥ

original: Bhg_06.041c śucīnāṃ śrīmatāṃ gehe yogabhraṣṭo 'bhijāyate
analyzed: śucīnām śrīmatām gehe yoga bhraṣṭaḥ bhijāyate

original: Bhg_06.042a atha vā yoginām eva kule bhavati dhīmatām
analyzed: atha vā yoginām eva kule bhavati dhīmatām

original: Bhg_06.042c etad dhi durlabhataraṃ loke janma yad īdṛśam
analyzed: etat hi durlabhataram loke janma yat īdṛśam

original: Bhg_06.043a tatra taṃ buddhisaṃyogaṃ labhate paurvadehikam
analyzed: tatra tam buddhi saṃyogam labhate paurvadehikam

original: Bhg_06.043c yatate ca tato bhūyaḥ saṃsiddhau kurunandana
analyzed: yatate ca tatas bhūyas saṃsiddhau kuru nandana

original: Bhg_06.044a pūrvābhyāsena tenaiva hriyate hy avaśo 'pi saḥ
analyzed: pūrva abhyāsena tena eva hriyate hi avaśaḥ pi saḥ

original: Bhg_06.044c jijñāsur api yogasya śabdabrahmātivartate
analyzed: jijñāsuḥ api yogasya śabdabrahma ativartate

original: Bhg_06.045a prayatnād yatamānas tu yogī saṃśuddhakilbiṣaḥ
analyzed: prayatnāt yatamānaḥ tu yogī saṃśuddha kilbiṣaḥ

original: Bhg_06.045c anekajanmasaṃsiddhas tato yāti parāṃ gatim
analyzed: aneka janma saṃsiddhaḥ tatas yāti parām gatim

original: Bhg_06.046a tapasvibhyo 'dhiko yogī jñānibhyo 'pi mato 'dhikaḥ
analyzed: tapasvibhyaḥ dhikaḥ yogī jñānibhyaḥ pi mataḥ dhikaḥ

original: Bhg_06.046c karmibhyaś cādhiko yogī tasmād yogī bhavārjuna
analyzed: karmibhyaḥ ca adhikaḥ yogī tasmāt yogī bhava arjuna

original: Bhg_06.047a yoginām api sarveṣāṃ madgatenāntarātmanā
analyzed: yoginām api sarveṣām mad gatena antarātmanā

original: Bhg_06.047c śraddhāvān bhajate yo māṃ sa me yuktatamo mataḥ
analyzed: śraddhāvān bhajate yaḥ mām sa me yuktatamaḥ mataḥ

original: Bhg_07.001 śrībhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: Bhg_07.001a mayy āsaktamanāḥ pārtha yogaṃ yuñjan madāśrayaḥ
analyzed: mayi āsakta manāḥ pārtha yogam yuñjan mad āśrayaḥ

original: Bhg_07.001c asaṃśayaṃ samagraṃ māṃ yathā jñāsyasi tac chṛṇu
analyzed: asaṃśayam samagram mām yathā jñāsyasi tat śṛṇu

original: Bhg_07.002a jñānaṃ te 'haṃ savijñānam idaṃ vakṣyāmy aśeṣataḥ
analyzed: jñānam te haṃ sa vijñānam idam vakṣyāmi aśeṣatas

original: Bhg_07.002c yaj jñātvā neha bhūyo 'nyaj jñātavyam avaśiṣyate
analyzed: yat jñātvā na iha bhūyas nyat jñātavyam avaśiṣyate

original: Bhg_07.003a manuṣyāṇāṃ sahasreṣu kaś cid yatati siddhaye
analyzed: manuṣyāṇām sahasreṣu kaḥ cit yatati siddhaye

original: Bhg_07.003c yatatām api siddhānāṃ kaś cin māṃ vetti tattvataḥ
analyzed: yatatām api siddhānām kaḥ cit mām vetti tattvataḥ

original: Bhg_07.004a bhūmir āpo 'nalo vāyuḥ khaṃ mano buddhir eva ca
analyzed: bhūmiḥ āpaḥ nalaḥ vāyuḥ kham manaḥ buddhiḥ eva ca

original: Bhg_07.004c ahaṃkāra itīyaṃ me bhinnā prakṛtir aṣṭadhā
analyzed: ahaṃkāraḥ iti iyam me bhinnā prakṛtiḥ aṣṭadhā

original: Bhg_07.005a apareyam itas tv anyāṃ prakṛtiṃ viddhi me parām
analyzed: aparā iyam itas tu anyām prakṛtim viddhi me parām

original: Bhg_07.005c jīvabhūtāṃ mahābāho yayedaṃ dhāryate jagat
analyzed: jīva bhūtām mahā bāho yayā idam dhāryate jagat

original: Bhg_07.006a etadyonīni bhūtāni sarvāṇīty upadhāraya
analyzed: etad yonīni bhūtāni sarvāṇi iti upadhāraya

original: Bhg_07.006c ahaṃ kṛtsnasya jagataḥ prabhavaḥ pralayas tathā
analyzed: aham kṛtsnasya jagataḥ prabhavaḥ pralayaḥ tathā

original: Bhg_07.007a mattaḥ parataraṃ nānyat kiṃ cid asti dhanaṃjaya
analyzed: mattaḥ parataram na anyat kim cit asti dhanaṃjaya

original: Bhg_07.007c mayi sarvam idaṃ protaṃ sūtre maṇigaṇā iva
analyzed: mayi sarvam idam protam sūtre maṇi gaṇāḥ iva

original: Bhg_07.008a raso 'ham apsu kaunteya prabhāsmi śaśisūryayoḥ
analyzed: rasaḥ ham apsu kaunteya prabhā asmi śaśi sūryayoḥ

original: Bhg_07.008c praṇavaḥ sarvavedeṣu śabdaḥ khe pauruṣaṃ nṛṣu
analyzed: praṇavaḥ sarva vedeṣu śabdaḥ khe pauruṣam nṛṣu

original: Bhg_07.009a puṇyo gandhaḥ pṛthivyāṃ ca tejaś cāsmi vibhāvasau
analyzed: puṇyaḥ gandhaḥ pṛthivyām ca tejaḥ ca asmi vibhāvasau

original: Bhg_07.009c jīvanaṃ sarvabhūteṣu tapaś cāsmi tapasviṣu
analyzed: jīvanam sarva bhūteṣu tapaḥ ca asmi tapasviṣu

original: Bhg_07.010a bījaṃ māṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ viddhi pārtha sanātanam
analyzed: bījam mām sarva bhūtānām viddhi pārtha sanātanam

original: Bhg_07.010c buddhir buddhimatām asmi tejas tejasvinām aham
analyzed: buddhiḥ buddhimatām asmi tejaḥ tejasvinām aham

original: Bhg_07.011a balaṃ balavatāṃ cāhaṃ kāmarāgavivarjitam
analyzed: balam balavatām ca aham kāma rāga vivarjitam

original: Bhg_07.011c dharmāviruddho bhūteṣu kāmo 'smi bharatarṣabha
analyzed: dharma aviruddhaḥ bhūteṣu smi bharata ṛṣabha

original: Bhg_07.012a ye caiva sāttvikā bhāvā rājasās tāmasāś ca ye
analyzed: ye ca eva sāttvikāḥ bhāvāḥ rājasāḥ tāmasāḥ ca ye

original: Bhg_07.012c matta eveti tān viddhi na tv ahaṃ teṣu te mayi
analyzed: mattaḥ evā iti tān viddhi na tu aham teṣu te mayi

original: Bhg_07.013a tribhir guṇamayair bhāvair ebhiḥ sarvam idaṃ jagat
analyzed: tribhiḥ guṇa mayaiḥ bhāvaiḥ ebhiḥ sarvam idam jagat

original: Bhg_07.013c mohitaṃ nābhijānāti mām ebhyaḥ param avyayam
analyzed: mohitam na abhijānāti mām ebhyaḥ param avyayam

original: Bhg_07.014a daivī hy eṣā guṇamayī mama māyā duratyayā
analyzed: daivī hi eṣā guṇa mayī mama māyā duratyayā

original: Bhg_07.014c mām eva ye prapadyante māyām etāṃ taranti te
analyzed: mām eva ye prapadyante māyām etām taranti te

original: Bhg_07.015a na māṃ duṣkṛtino mūḍhāḥ prapadyante narādhamāḥ
analyzed: na mām duṣkṛtinaḥ mūḍhāḥ prapadyante nara adhamāḥ

original: Bhg_07.015c māyayāpahṛtajñānā āsuraṃ bhāvam āśritāḥ
analyzed: māyayā apahṛta jñānāḥ āsuram bhāvam āśritāḥ

original: Bhg_07.016a caturvidhā bhajante māṃ janāḥ sukṛtino 'rjuna
analyzed: caturvidhāḥ bhajante mām janāḥ sukṛtinaḥ rjuna

original: Bhg_07.016c ārto jijñāsur arthārthī jñānī ca bharatarṣabha
analyzed: ārtaḥ jijñāsuḥ artha arthī jñānī ca bharata ṛṣabha

original: Bhg_07.017a teṣāṃ jñānī nityayukta ekabhaktir viśiṣyate
analyzed: teṣām jñānī nitya yuktaḥ eka bhaktiḥ viśiṣyate

original: Bhg_07.017c priyo hi jñānino 'tyartham ahaṃ sa ca mama priyaḥ
analyzed: priyaḥ hi jñāninaḥ tyartham aham sa ca mama priyaḥ

original: Bhg_07.018a udārāḥ sarva evaite jñānī tv ātmaiva me matam
analyzed: udārāḥ sarve eva ete jñānī tu ātmā eva me matam

original: Bhg_07.018c āsthitaḥ sa hi yuktātmā mām evānuttamāṃ gatim
analyzed: āsthitaḥ sa hi yukta ātmā mām eva anuttamām gatim

original: Bhg_07.019a bahūnāṃ janmanām ante jñānavān māṃ prapadyate
analyzed: bahūnām janmanām ante jñānavān mām prapadyate

original: Bhg_07.019c vāsudevaḥ sarvam iti sa mahātmā sudurlabhaḥ
analyzed: vāsudevaḥ sarvam iti sa mahātmā su durlabhaḥ

original: Bhg_07.020a kāmais tais tair hṛtajñānāḥ prapadyante 'nyadevatāḥ
analyzed: kāmaiḥ taiḥ taiḥ hṛta jñānāḥ prapadyante nyadevatāḥ

original: Bhg_07.020c taṃ taṃ niyamam āsthāya prakṛtyā niyatāḥ svayā
analyzed: tam tam niyamam āsthāya prakṛtyā niyatāḥ svayā

original: Bhg_07.021a yo yo yāṃ yāṃ tanuṃ bhaktaḥ śraddhayārcitum icchati
analyzed: yaḥ yaḥ yām yām tanum bhaktaḥ śraddhayā arcitum icchati

original: Bhg_07.021c tasya tasyācalāṃ śraddhāṃ tām eva vidadhāmy aham
analyzed: tasya tasya acalām śraddhām tām eva vidadhāmi aham

original: Bhg_07.022a sa tayā śraddhayā yuktas tasyā rādhanam īhate
analyzed: sa tayā śraddhayā yuktaḥ tasyāḥ rādhanam īhate

original: Bhg_07.022c labhate ca tataḥ kāmān mayaiva vihitān hi tān
analyzed: labhate ca tatas kāmān mayā eva vihitān hi tān

original: Bhg_07.023a antavat tu phalaṃ teṣāṃ tad bhavaty alpamedhasām
analyzed: antavat tu phalam teṣām tat bhavati alpa medhasām

original: Bhg_07.023c devān devayajo yānti madbhaktā yānti mām api
analyzed: devān deva yajaḥ yānti mad bhaktāḥ yānti mām api

original: Bhg_07.024a avyaktaṃ vyaktim āpannaṃ manyante mām abuddhayaḥ
analyzed: avyaktam vyaktim āpannam manyante mām abuddhayaḥ

original: Bhg_07.024c paraṃ bhāvam ajānanto mamāvyayam anuttamam
analyzed: param bhāvam a jānantaḥ mama avyayam anuttamam

original: Bhg_07.025a nāhaṃ prakāśaḥ sarvasya yogamāyāsamāvṛtaḥ
