analyzed: na aham prakāśaḥ sarvasya yoga māyā samāvṛtaḥ

original: Bhg_07.025c mūḍho 'yaṃ nābhijānāti loko mām ajam avyayam
analyzed: mūḍhaḥ yam na abhijānāti lokaḥ mām ajam avyayam

original: Bhg_07.026a vedāhaṃ samatītāni vartamānāni cārjuna
analyzed: veda aham samatītāni vartamānāni ca arjuna

original: Bhg_07.026c bhaviṣyāṇi ca bhūtāni māṃ tu veda na kaś cana
analyzed: bhaviṣyāṇi ca bhūtāni mām tu veda na kaḥ cana

original: Bhg_07.027a icchādveṣasamutthena dvaṃdvamohena bhārata
analyzed: icchā dveṣa samutthena dvaṃdva mohena bhārata

original: Bhg_07.027c sarvabhūtāni saṃmohaṃ sarge yānti paraṃtapa
analyzed: sarva bhūtāni saṃmoham sarge yānti paraṃtapa

original: Bhg_07.028a yeṣāṃ tv antagataṃ pāpaṃ janānāṃ puṇyakarmaṇām
analyzed: yeṣām tu anta gatam pāpam janānām puṇya karmaṇām

original: Bhg_07.028c te dvaṃdvamohanirmuktā bhajante māṃ dṛḍhavratāḥ
analyzed: te dvaṃdva moha nirmuktāḥ bhajante mām dṛḍha vratāḥ

original: Bhg_07.029a jarāmaraṇamokṣāya mām āśritya yatanti ye
analyzed: jarā maraṇa mokṣāya mām āśritya yatanti ye

original: Bhg_07.029c te brahma tad viduḥ kṛtsnam adhyātmaṃ karma cākhilam
analyzed: te brahma tat viduḥ kṛtsnam adhyātmam karma ca akhilam

original: Bhg_07.030a sādhibhūtādhidaivaṃ māṃ sādhiyajñaṃ ca ye viduḥ
analyzed: sa adhibhūta adhidaivam mām sa adhiyajñam ca ye viduḥ

original: Bhg_07.030c prayāṇakāle 'pi ca māṃ te vidur yuktacetasaḥ
analyzed: prayāṇa kāle ca mām te viduḥ yukta cetasaḥ

original: Bhg_08.001 arjuna uvāca
analyzed: arjunaḥ uvāca

original: Bhg_08.001a kiṃ tad brahma kim adhyātmaṃ kiṃ karma puruṣottama
analyzed: kim tat brahma kim adhyātmam kim karma puruṣottama

original: Bhg_08.001c adhibhūtaṃ ca kiṃ proktam adhidaivaṃ kim ucyate
analyzed: adhibhūtam ca kim proktam adhidaivam kim ucyate

original: Bhg_08.002a adhiyajñaḥ kathaṃ ko 'tra dehe 'smin madhusūdana
analyzed: adhiyajñaḥ katham kaḥ tra dehe smin madhusūdana

original: Bhg_08.002c prayāṇakāle ca kathaṃ jñeyo 'si niyatātmabhiḥ
analyzed: prayāṇa kāle ca katham jñeyaḥ si niyata ātmabhiḥ

original: Bhg_08.003 śrībhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: Bhg_08.003a akṣaraṃ brahma paramaṃ svabhāvo 'dhyātmam ucyate
analyzed: akṣaram brahma paramam svabhāvaḥ dhyātmam ucyate

original: Bhg_08.003c bhūtabhāvodbhavakaro visargaḥ karmasaṃjñitaḥ
Bhg_08.004a adhibhūtaṃ kṣaro bhāvaḥ puruṣaś cādhidaivatam
analyzed: adhibhūtam kṣaraḥ bhāvaḥ puruṣaḥ ca adhidaivatam

original: Bhg_08.004c adhiyajño 'ham evātra dehe dehabhṛtāṃ vara
analyzed: adhiyajñaḥ ham eva atra dehe dehabhṛtām vara

original: Bhg_08.005a antakāle ca mām eva smaran muktvā kalevaram
analyzed: antakāle ca mām eva smaran muktvā kalevaram

original: Bhg_08.005c yaḥ prayāti sa madbhāvaṃ yāti nāsty atra saṃśayaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ prayāti sa mad bhāvam yāti na asti atra saṃśayaḥ

original: Bhg_08.006a yaṃ yaṃ vāpi smaran bhāvaṃ tyajaty ante kalevaram
analyzed: yam yam vā api smaran bhāvam tyajati ante kalevaram

original: Bhg_08.006c taṃ tam evaiti kaunteya sadā tadbhāvabhāvitaḥ
analyzed: tam tam eva eti kaunteya sadā tad bhāva bhāvitaḥ

original: Bhg_08.007a tasmāt sarveṣu kāleṣu mām anusmara yudhya ca
analyzed: tasmāt sarveṣu kāleṣu mām anusmara yudhya ca

original: Bhg_08.007c mayy arpitamanobuddhir mām evaiṣyasy asaṃśayaḥ
analyzed: mayi arpita manaḥ buddhiḥ mām eva eṣyasi asaṃśayaḥ

original: Bhg_08.008a abhyāsayogayuktena cetasā nānyagāminā
analyzed: abhyāsa yoga yuktena cetasā na anya gāminā

original: Bhg_08.008c paramaṃ puruṣaṃ divyaṃ yāti pārthānucintayan
analyzed: paramam puruṣam divyam yāti pārtha anucintayan

original: Bhg_08.009a_0 kaviṃ purāṇam anuśāsitāram;
analyzed: kavim purāṇam anuśāsitāram

original: Bhg_08.009a_1 aṇor aṇīyāṃsam anusmared yaḥ
analyzed: aṇoḥ aṇīyāṃsam anusmaret yaḥ

original: Bhg_08.009c_0 sarvasya dhātāram acintyarūpam;
analyzed: sarvasya dhātāram acintya rūpam

original: Bhg_08.009c_1 ādityavarṇaṃ tamasaḥ parastāt
analyzed: āditya varṇam tamasaḥ parastāt

original: Bhg_08.010a_0 prayāṇakāle manasācalena;
analyzed: prayāṇa kāle manasā acalena

original: Bhg_08.010a_1 bhaktyā yukto yogabalena caiva
analyzed: bhaktyā yuktaḥ yoga balena ca eva

original: Bhg_08.010c_0 bhruvor madhye prāṇam āveśya samyak;
analyzed: bhruvoḥ madhye prāṇam āveśya samyak

original: Bhg_08.010c_1 sa taṃ paraṃ puruṣam upaiti divyam
analyzed: sa tam param puruṣam upaiti divyam

original: Bhg_08.011a_0 yad akṣaraṃ vedavido vadanti;
analyzed: yat akṣaram veda vidaḥ vadanti

original: Bhg_08.011a_1 viśanti yad yatayo vītarāgāḥ
analyzed: viśanti yat yatayaḥ vīta rāgāḥ

original: Bhg_08.011c_0 yad icchanto brahmacaryaṃ caranti;
analyzed: yat icchantaḥ brahmacaryam caranti

original: Bhg_08.011c_1 tat te padaṃ saṃgraheṇa pravakṣye
analyzed: tat te padam saṃgraheṇa pravakṣye

original: Bhg_08.012a sarvadvārāṇi saṃyamya mano hṛdi nirudhya ca
analyzed: sarva dvārāṇi saṃyamya manaḥ hṛdi nirudhya ca

original: Bhg_08.012c mūrdhny ādhāyātmanaḥ prāṇam āsthito yogadhāraṇām
analyzed: mūrdhni ādhāya ātmanaḥ prāṇam āsthitaḥ yoga dhāraṇām

original: Bhg_08.013a om ity ekākṣaraṃ brahma vyāharan mām anusmaran
analyzed: om iti ekākṣaram brahma vyāharan mām anusmaran

original: Bhg_08.013c yaḥ prayāti tyajan dehaṃ sa yāti paramāṃ gatim
analyzed: yaḥ prayāti tyajan deham sa yāti paramām gatim

original: Bhg_08.014a ananyacetāḥ satataṃ yo māṃ smarati nityaśaḥ
analyzed: an anya cetāḥ satatam yaḥ mām smarati nityaśas

original: Bhg_08.014c tasyāhaṃ sulabhaḥ pārtha nityayuktasya yoginaḥ
analyzed: tasya aham sulabhaḥ pārtha nitya yuktasya yoginaḥ

original: Bhg_08.015a mām upetya punarjanma duḥkhālayam aśāśvatam
analyzed: mām upetya punarjanma duḥkha ālayam aśāśvatam

original: Bhg_08.015c nāpnuvanti mahātmānaḥ saṃsiddhiṃ paramāṃ gatāḥ
analyzed: na āpnuvanti mahātmānaḥ saṃsiddhim paramām gatāḥ

original: Bhg_08.016a ā brahmabhuvanāl lokāḥ punarāvartino 'rjuna
analyzed: ā brahma bhuvanāt lokāḥ punarāvartinaḥ rjuna

original: Bhg_08.016c mām upetya tu kaunteya punarjanma na vidyate
analyzed: mām upetya tu kaunteya punarjanma na vidyate

original: Bhg_08.017a sahasrayugaparyantam ahar yad brahmaṇo viduḥ
analyzed: sahasra yuga paryantam ahar yat brahmaṇaḥ viduḥ

original: Bhg_08.017c rātriṃ yugasahasrāntāṃ te 'horātravido janāḥ
analyzed: rātrim yuga sahasra antām te horātra vidaḥ janāḥ

original: Bhg_08.018a avyaktād vyaktayaḥ sarvāḥ prabhavanty aharāgame
analyzed: avyaktāt vyaktayaḥ sarvāḥ prabhavanti ahar āgame

original: Bhg_08.018c rātryāgame pralīyante tatraivāvyaktasaṃjñake
analyzed: rātri āgame pralīyante tatra eva avyakta saṃjñake

original: Bhg_08.019a bhūtagrāmaḥ sa evāyaṃ bhūtvā bhūtvā pralīyate
analyzed: bhūta grāmaḥ saḥ eva ayam bhūtvā bhūtvā pralīyate

original: Bhg_08.019c rātryāgame 'vaśaḥ pārtha prabhavaty aharāgame
analyzed: rātri āgame vaśaḥ pārtha prabhavati ahar āgame

original: Bhg_08.020a paras tasmāt tu bhāvo 'nyo 'vyakto 'vyaktāt sanātanaḥ
analyzed: paraḥ tasmāt tu bhāvaḥ nyaḥ vyaktaḥ vyaktāt sanātanaḥ

original: Bhg_08.020c yaḥ sa sarveṣu bhūteṣu naśyatsu na vinaśyati
analyzed: yaḥ sa sarveṣu bhūteṣu naśyatsu na vinaśyati

original: Bhg_08.021a avyakto 'kṣara ity uktas tam āhuḥ paramāṃ gatim
analyzed: avyakto kṣaraḥ iti uktaḥ tam āhuḥ paramām gatim

original: Bhg_08.021c yaṃ prāpya na nivartante tad dhāma paramaṃ mama
analyzed: yam prāpya na nivartante tat dhāma paramam mama

original: Bhg_08.022a puruṣaḥ sa paraḥ pārtha bhaktyā labhyas tv ananyayā
analyzed: puruṣaḥ sa paraḥ pārtha bhaktyā labhyaḥ tu ananyayā

original: Bhg_08.022c yasyāntaḥsthāni bhūtāni yena sarvam idaṃ tatam
analyzed: yasya antar sthāni bhūtāni yena sarvam idam tatam

original: Bhg_08.023a yatra kāle tv anāvṛttim āvṛttiṃ caiva yoginaḥ
analyzed: yatra kāle tu anāvṛttim āvṛttim ca eva yoginaḥ

original: Bhg_08.023c prayātā yānti taṃ kālaṃ vakṣyāmi bharatarṣabha
analyzed: prayātāḥ yānti tam kālam vakṣyāmi bharata ṛṣabha

original: Bhg_08.024a agnir jyotir ahaḥ śuklaḥ ṣaṇmāsā uttarāyaṇam
analyzed: agniḥ jyotiḥ ahar śuklaḥ ṣaṣ māsāḥ uttarāyaṇam

original: Bhg_08.024c tatra prayātā gacchanti brahma brahmavido janāḥ
analyzed: tatra prayātāḥ gacchanti brahma brahma vidaḥ janāḥ

original: Bhg_08.025a dhūmo rātris tathā kṛṣṇaḥ ṣaṇmāsā dakṣiṇāyanam
analyzed: dhūmaḥ rātriḥ tathā kṛṣṇaḥ ṣaṣ māsāḥ dakṣiṇāyanam

original: Bhg_08.025c tatra cāndramasaṃ jyotir yogī prāpya nivartate
analyzed: tatra cāndramasam jyotiḥ yogī prāpya nivartate

original: Bhg_08.026a śuklakṛṣṇe gatī hy ete jagataḥ śāśvate mate
analyzed: śukla kṛṣṇe gatī hi ete jagataḥ śāśvate mate

original: Bhg_08.026c ekayā yāty anāvṛttim anyayāvartate punaḥ
analyzed: ekayā yāti anāvṛttim anyayā āvartate punar

original: Bhg_08.027a naite sṛtī pārtha jānan yogī muhyati kaś cana
analyzed: na ete sṛtī pārtha jānan yogī muhyati kaḥ cana

original: Bhg_08.027c tasmāt sarveṣu kāleṣu yogayukto bhavārjuna
analyzed: tasmāt sarveṣu kāleṣu yoga yuktaḥ bhava arjuna

original: Bhg_08.028a_0 vedeṣu yajñeṣu tapaḥsu caiva;
analyzed: vedeṣu yajñeṣu tapaḥsu ca eva

original: Bhg_08.028a_1 dāneṣu yat puṇyaphalaṃ pradiṣṭam
analyzed: dāneṣu yat puṇya phalam pradiṣṭam

original: Bhg_08.028c_0 atyeti tat sarvam idaṃ viditvā;
analyzed: atyeti tat sarvam idam viditvā

original: Bhg_08.028c_1 yogī paraṃ sthānam upaiti cādyam
analyzed: yogī param sthānam upaiti ca ādyam

original: Bhg_09.001 śrībhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: Bhg_09.001a idaṃ tu te guhyatamaṃ pravakṣyāmy anasūyave
analyzed: idam tu te guhyatamam pravakṣyāmi anasūyave

original: Bhg_09.001c jñānaṃ vijñānasahitaṃ yaj jñātvā mokṣyase 'śubhāt
analyzed: jñānam vijñāna sahitam yat jñātvā mokṣyase śubhāt

original: Bhg_09.002a rājavidyā rājaguhyaṃ pavitram idam uttamam
analyzed: rāja vidyā rāja guhyam pavitram idam uttamam

original: Bhg_09.002c pratyakṣāvagamaṃ dharmyaṃ susukhaṃ kartum avyayam
analyzed: pratyakṣa avagamam dharmyam su sukham kartum avyayam

original: Bhg_09.003a aśraddadhānāḥ puruṣā dharmasyāsya paraṃtapa
analyzed: aśraddadhānāḥ puruṣāḥ dharmasya asya paraṃtapa

original: Bhg_09.003c aprāpya māṃ nivartante mṛtyusaṃsāravartmani
analyzed: a prāpya mām nivartante mṛtyu saṃsāra vartmani

original: Bhg_09.004a mayā tatam idaṃ sarvaṃ jagad avyaktamūrtinā
analyzed: mayā tatam idam sarvam jagat avyakta mūrtinā

original: Bhg_09.004c matsthāni sarvabhūtāni na cāhaṃ teṣv avasthitaḥ
analyzed: mad sthāni sarva bhūtāni na ca aham teṣu avasthitaḥ

original: Bhg_09.005a na ca matsthāni bhūtāni paśya me yogam aiśvaram
analyzed: na ca mad sthāni bhūtāni paśya me yogam aiśvaram

original: Bhg_09.005c bhūtabhṛn na ca bhūtastho mamātmā bhūtabhāvanaḥ
analyzed: bhūta bhṛt na ca bhūta sthaḥ mama ātmā bhūta bhāvanaḥ

original: Bhg_09.006a yathākāśasthito nityaṃ vāyuḥ sarvatrago mahān
analyzed: yathā ākāśa sthitaḥ nityam vāyuḥ sarvatragaḥ mahān

original: Bhg_09.006c tathā sarvāṇi bhūtāni matsthānīty upadhāraya
analyzed: tathā sarvāṇi bhūtāni mad sthāni iti upadhāraya

original: Bhg_09.007a sarvabhūtāni kaunteya prakṛtiṃ yānti māmikām
analyzed: sarva bhūtāni kaunteya prakṛtim yānti māmikām

original: Bhg_09.007c kalpakṣaye punas tāni kalpādau visṛjāmy aham
Bhg_09.008a prakṛtiṃ svām avaṣṭabhya visṛjāmi punaḥ punaḥ
analyzed: prakṛtim svām avaṣṭabhya visṛjāmi punar punar

original: Bhg_09.008c bhūtagrāmam imaṃ kṛtsnam avaśaṃ prakṛter vaśāt
analyzed: bhūta grāmam imam kṛtsnam avaśam prakṛteḥ vaśāt

original: Bhg_09.009a na ca māṃ tāni karmāṇi nibadhnanti dhanaṃjaya
analyzed: na ca mām tāni karmāṇi nibadhnanti dhanaṃjaya

original: Bhg_09.009c udāsīnavad āsīnam asaktaṃ teṣu karmasu
analyzed: udāsīna vat āsīnam asaktam teṣu karmasu

original: Bhg_09.010a mayādhyakṣeṇa prakṛtiḥ sūyate sacarācaram
analyzed: mayā adhyakṣeṇa prakṛtiḥ sūyate sacarācaram

original: Bhg_09.010c hetunānena kaunteya jagad viparivartate
analyzed: hetunā anena kaunteya jagat viparivartate

original: Bhg_09.011a avajānanti māṃ mūḍhā mānuṣīṃ tanum āśritam
analyzed: avajānanti mām mūḍhāḥ mānuṣīm tanum āśritam

original: Bhg_09.011c paraṃ bhāvam ajānanto mama bhūtamaheśvaram
analyzed: param bhāvam a jānantaḥ mama bhūta maheśvaram

original: Bhg_09.012a moghāśā moghakarmāṇo moghajñānā vicetasaḥ
analyzed: mogha āśāḥ mogha karmāṇaḥ mogha jñānāḥ vicetasaḥ

original: Bhg_09.012c rākṣasīm āsurīṃ caiva prakṛtiṃ mohinīṃ śritāḥ
analyzed: rākṣasīm āsurīm ca eva prakṛtim mohinīm śritāḥ

original: Bhg_09.013a mahātmānas tu māṃ pārtha daivīṃ prakṛtim āśritāḥ
analyzed: mahātmānaḥ tu mām pārtha daivīm prakṛtim āśritāḥ

original: Bhg_09.013c bhajanty ananyamanaso jñātvā bhūtādim avyayam
analyzed: bhajanti an anya manasaḥ jñātvā bhūtādim avyayam

original: Bhg_09.014a satataṃ kīrtayanto māṃ yatantaś ca dṛḍhavratāḥ
analyzed: satatam kīrtayantaḥ mām yatantaḥ ca dṛḍha vratāḥ

original: Bhg_09.014c namasyantaś ca māṃ bhaktyā nityayuktā upāsate
analyzed: namasyantaḥ ca mām bhaktyā nitya yuktāḥ upāsate

original: Bhg_09.015a jñānayajñena cāpy anye yajanto mām upāsate
analyzed: jñāna yajñena ca api anye yajantaḥ mām upāsate

original: Bhg_09.015c ekatvena pṛthaktvena bahudhā viśvatomukham
analyzed: eka tvena pṛthak tvena bahudhā viśvatomukham

original: Bhg_09.016a ahaṃ kratur ahaṃ yajñaḥ svadhāham aham auṣadham
analyzed: aham kratuḥ aham yajñaḥ svadhā aham aham auṣadham

original: Bhg_09.016c mantro 'ham aham evājyam aham agnir ahaṃ hutam
analyzed: mantraḥ ham aham eva ājyam aham agniḥ aham hutam

original: Bhg_09.017a pitāham asya jagato mātā dhātā pitāmahaḥ
analyzed: pitā aham asya jagataḥ mātā dhātā pitāmahaḥ

original: Bhg_09.017c vedyaṃ pavitram oṃkāra ṛk sāma yajur eva ca
analyzed: vedyam pavitram oṃkāraḥ ṛc sāma yajuḥ eva ca

original: Bhg_09.018a gatir bhartā prabhuḥ sākṣī nivāsaḥ śaraṇaṃ suhṛt
analyzed: gatiḥ bhartā prabhuḥ sākṣī nivāsaḥ śaraṇam suhṛd

original: Bhg_09.018c prabhavaḥ pralayaḥ sthānaṃ nidhānaṃ bījam avyayam
analyzed: prabhavaḥ pralayaḥ sthānam nidhānam bījam avyayam

original: Bhg_09.019a tapāmy aham ahaṃ varṣaṃ nigṛhṇāmy utsṛjāmi ca
analyzed: tapāmi aham aham varṣam nigṛhṇāmi utsṛjāmi ca

original: Bhg_09.019c amṛtaṃ caiva mṛtyuś ca sad asac cāham arjuna
analyzed: amṛtam ca eva mṛtyuḥ ca sat asat ca aham arjuna

original: Bhg_09.020a_0 traividyā māṃ somapāḥ pūtapāpā;
analyzed: traividyā mām somapāḥ pūta pāpā

original: Bhg_09.020a_1 yajñair iṣṭvā svargatiṃ prārthayante
analyzed: yajñaiḥ iṣṭvā svar gatim prārthayante

original: Bhg_09.020c_0 te puṇyam āsādya surendralokam;
analyzed: te puṇyam āsādya sura indra lokam

original: Bhg_09.020c_1 aśnanti divyān divi devabhogān
analyzed: aśnanti divyān divi deva bhogān

original: Bhg_09.021a_0 te taṃ bhuktvā svargalokaṃ viśālaṃ;
analyzed: te tam bhuktvā svarga lokam viśālam

original: Bhg_09.021a_1 kṣīṇe puṇye martyalokaṃ viśanti
analyzed: kṣīṇe puṇye martya lokam viśanti

original: Bhg_09.021c_0 evaṃ trayīdharmam anuprapannā;
analyzed: evam trayī dharmam anuprapannā

original: Bhg_09.021c_1 gatāgataṃ kāmakāmā labhante
analyzed: gata āgatam kāma kāmāḥ labhante

original: Bhg_09.022a ananyāś cintayanto māṃ ye janāḥ paryupāsate
analyzed: an anyāḥ cintayantaḥ mām ye janāḥ paryupāsate

original: Bhg_09.022c teṣāṃ nityābhiyuktānāṃ yogakṣemaṃ vahāmy aham
analyzed: teṣām nitya abhiyuktānām yogakṣemam vahāmi aham

original: Bhg_09.023a ye 'py anyadevatā bhaktā yajante śraddhayānvitāḥ
analyzed: ye pi anya devatāḥ bhaktāḥ yajante śraddhayā anvitāḥ

original: Bhg_09.023c te 'pi mām eva kaunteya yajanty avidhipūrvakam
analyzed: te pi mām eva kaunteya yajanti avidhi pūrvakam

original: Bhg_09.024a ahaṃ hi sarvayajñānāṃ bhoktā ca prabhur eva ca
analyzed: aham hi sarva yajñānām bhoktā ca prabhuḥ eva ca

original: Bhg_09.024c na tu mām abhijānanti tattvenātaś cyavanti te
analyzed: na tu mām abhijānanti tattvena atas cyavanti te

original: Bhg_09.025a yānti devavratā devān pitṝn yānti pitṛvratāḥ
analyzed: yānti deva vratāḥ devān pitṝn yānti pitṛ vratāḥ

original: Bhg_09.025c bhūtāni yānti bhūtejyā yānti madyājino 'pi mām
analyzed: bhūtāni yānti bhūta ijyāḥ yānti mad yājinaḥ u mām

original: Bhg_09.026a patraṃ puṣpaṃ phalaṃ toyaṃ yo me bhaktyā prayacchati
analyzed: patram puṣpam phalam toyam yaḥ me bhaktyā prayacchati

original: Bhg_09.026c tad ahaṃ bhaktyupahṛtam aśnāmi prayatātmanaḥ
analyzed: tat aham bhakti upahṛtam aśnāmi prayata ātmanaḥ

original: Bhg_09.027a yat karoṣi yad aśnāsi yaj juhoṣi dadāsi yat
analyzed: yat karoṣi yat aśnāsi yat juhoṣi dadāsi yat

original: Bhg_09.027c yat tapasyasi kaunteya tat kuruṣva madarpaṇam
analyzed: yat tapasyasi kaunteya tat kuruṣva mad arpaṇam

original: Bhg_09.028a śubhāśubhaphalair evaṃ mokṣyase karmabandhanaiḥ
analyzed: śubha aśubha phalaiḥ evam mokṣyase karma bandhanaiḥ

original: Bhg_09.028c saṃnyāsayogayuktātmā vimukto mām upaiṣyasi
analyzed: saṃnyāsa yoga yukta ātmā vimuktaḥ mām upaiṣyasi

original: Bhg_09.029a samo 'haṃ sarvabhūteṣu na me dveṣyo 'sti na priyaḥ
analyzed: samaḥ ham sarva bhūteṣu na me dveṣyaḥ sti na priyaḥ

original: Bhg_09.029c ye bhajanti tu māṃ bhaktyā mayi te teṣu cāpy aham
analyzed: ye bhajanti tu mām bhaktyā mayi te teṣu ca api aham

original: Bhg_09.030a api cet sudurācāro bhajate mām ananyabhāk
analyzed: api ced su durācāraḥ bhajate mām an anya bhāj

original: Bhg_09.030c sādhur eva sa mantavyaḥ samyag vyavasito hi saḥ
analyzed: sādhuḥ eva sa mantavyaḥ samyak vyavasitaḥ hi saḥ

original: Bhg_09.031a kṣipraṃ bhavati dharmātmā śaśvacchāntiṃ nigacchati
analyzed: kṣipram bhavati dharma ātmā śaśvat śāntim nigacchati

original: Bhg_09.031c kaunteya pratijānīhi na me bhaktaḥ praṇaśyati
analyzed: kaunteya pratijānīhi na me bhaktaḥ praṇaśyati

original: Bhg_09.032a māṃ hi pārtha vyapāśritya ye 'pi syuḥ pāpayonayaḥ
analyzed: mām hi pārtha vyapāśritya ye pi syuḥ pāpa yonayaḥ

original: Bhg_09.032c striyo vaiśyās tathā śūdrās te 'pi yānti parāṃ gatim
analyzed: striyaḥ vaiśyāḥ tathā śūdrāḥ te yānti parām gatim

original: Bhg_09.033a kiṃ punar brāhmaṇāḥ puṇyā bhaktā rājarṣayas tathā
analyzed: kim punar brāhmaṇāḥ puṇyāḥ bhaktāḥ rājarṣayaḥ tathā

original: Bhg_09.033c anityam asukhaṃ lokam imaṃ prāpya bhajasva mām
analyzed: anityam asukham lokam imam prāpya bhajasva mām

original: Bhg_09.034a manmanā bhava madbhakto madyājī māṃ namaskuru
analyzed: mad manāḥ bhava mad bhaktaḥ mad yājī mām namaskuru

original: Bhg_09.034c mām evaiṣyasi yuktvaivam ātmānaṃ matparāyaṇaḥ
analyzed: mām eva eṣyasi yuktvā evam ātmānam mad parāyaṇaḥ

original: Bhg_10.001 śrībhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: Bhg_10.001a bhūya eva mahābāho śṛṇu me paramaṃ vacaḥ
analyzed: bhūyas eva mahā bāho śṛṇu me paramam vacaḥ

original: Bhg_10.001c yat te 'haṃ prīyamāṇāya vakṣyāmi hitakāmyayā
analyzed: yat te ham prīyamāṇāya vakṣyāmi hita kāmyayā

original: Bhg_10.002a na me viduḥ suragaṇāḥ prabhavaṃ na maharṣayaḥ
analyzed: na me viduḥ sura gaṇāḥ prabhavam na mahā ṛṣayaḥ

original: Bhg_10.002c aham ādir hi devānāṃ maharṣīṇāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ
analyzed: aham ādiḥ hi devānām mahā ṛṣīṇām ca sarvaśas

original: Bhg_10.003a yo mām ajam anādiṃ ca vetti lokamaheśvaram
analyzed: yaḥ mām ajam anādim ca vetti loka mahā īśvaram

original: Bhg_10.003c asaṃmūḍhaḥ sa martyeṣu sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate
analyzed: asaṃmūḍhaḥ sa martyeṣu sarva pāpaiḥ pramucyate

original: Bhg_10.004a buddhir jñānam asaṃmohaḥ kṣamā satyaṃ damaḥ śamaḥ
analyzed: buddhiḥ jñānam asaṃmohaḥ kṣamā satyam damaḥ śamaḥ

original: Bhg_10.004c sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ bhavo 'bhāvo bhayaṃ cābhayam eva ca
analyzed: sukham duḥkham bhavaḥ bhāvaḥ bhayam ca abhayam eva ca

original: Bhg_10.005a ahiṃsā samatā tuṣṭis tapo dānaṃ yaśo 'yaśaḥ
analyzed: ahiṃsā sama tā tuṣṭiḥ tapaḥ dānam yaśaḥ yaśaḥ

original: Bhg_10.005c bhavanti bhāvā bhūtānāṃ matta eva pṛthagvidhāḥ
analyzed: bhavanti bhāvāḥ bhūtānām mattaḥ eva pṛthagvidhāḥ

original: Bhg_10.006a maharṣayaḥ sapta pūrve catvāro manavas tathā
analyzed: mahā ṛṣayaḥ sapta pūrve catvāraḥ manavaḥ tathā

original: Bhg_10.006c madbhāvā mānasā jātā yeṣāṃ loka imāḥ prajāḥ
analyzed: mad bhāvāḥ mānasāḥ jātāḥ yeṣām loke imāḥ prajāḥ

original: Bhg_10.007a etāṃ vibhūtiṃ yogaṃ ca mama yo vetti tattvataḥ
analyzed: etām vibhūtim yogam ca mama yaḥ vetti tattvataḥ

original: Bhg_10.007c so 'vikampena yogena yujyate nātra saṃśayaḥ
analyzed: saḥ vikampena yogena yujyate na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: Bhg_10.008a ahaṃ sarvasya prabhavo mattaḥ sarvaṃ pravartate
analyzed: aham sarvasya prabhavaḥ mattaḥ sarvam pravartate

original: Bhg_10.008c iti matvā bhajante māṃ budhā bhāvasamanvitāḥ
analyzed: iti matvā bhajante mām budhāḥ bhāva samanvitāḥ

original: Bhg_10.009a maccittā madgataprāṇā bodhayantaḥ parasparam
analyzed: mad cittāḥ mad gata prāṇāḥ bodhayantaḥ parasparam

original: Bhg_10.009c kathayantaś ca māṃ nityaṃ tuṣyanti ca ramanti ca
analyzed: kathayantaḥ ca mām nityam tuṣyanti ca ramanti ca

original: Bhg_10.010a teṣāṃ satatayuktānāṃ bhajatāṃ prītipūrvakam
analyzed: teṣām satata yuktānām bhajatām prīti pūrvakam

original: Bhg_10.010c dadāmi buddhiyogaṃ taṃ yena mām upayānti te
analyzed: dadāmi buddhi yogam tam yena mām upayānti te

original: Bhg_10.011a teṣām evānukampārtham aham ajñānajaṃ tamaḥ
analyzed: teṣām eva anukampā artham aham ajñāna jam tamaḥ

original: Bhg_10.011c nāśayāmy ātmabhāvastho jñānadīpena bhāsvatā
analyzed: nāśayāmi ātma bhāva sthaḥ jñāna dīpena bhāsvatā

original: Bhg_10.012 arjuna uvāca
analyzed: arjunaḥ uvāca

original: Bhg_10.012a paraṃ brahma paraṃ dhāma pavitraṃ paramaṃ bhavān
analyzed: param brahma param dhāma pavitram paramam bhavān

original: Bhg_10.012c puruṣaṃ śāśvataṃ divyam ādidevam ajaṃ vibhum
analyzed: puruṣam śāśvatam divyam ādidevam ajam vibhum

original: Bhg_10.013a āhus tvām ṛṣayaḥ sarve devarṣir nāradas tathā
analyzed: āhuḥ tvām ṛṣayaḥ sarve deva ṛṣiḥ nāradaḥ tathā

original: Bhg_10.013c asito devalo vyāsaḥ svayaṃ caiva bravīṣi me
analyzed: asitaḥ devalaḥ vyāsaḥ svayam ca eva bravīṣi me

original: Bhg_10.014a sarvam etad ṛtaṃ manye yan māṃ vadasi keśava
analyzed: sarvam etat ṛtam manye yat mām vadasi keśava

original: Bhg_10.014c na hi te bhagavan vyaktiṃ vidur devā na dānavāḥ
analyzed: na hi te bhagavan vyaktim viduḥ devāḥ na dānavāḥ

original: Bhg_10.015a svayam evātmanātmānaṃ vettha tvaṃ puruṣottama
analyzed: svayam eva ātmanā ātmānam vettha tvam puruṣottama

original: Bhg_10.015c bhūtabhāvana bhūteśa devadeva jagatpate
analyzed: bhūtabhāvana bhūteśa devadeva jagatpate

original: Bhg_10.016a vaktum arhasy aśeṣeṇa divyā hy ātmavibhūtayaḥ
analyzed: vaktum arhasi aśeṣeṇa divyāḥ hi ātma vibhūtayaḥ

original: Bhg_10.016c yābhir vibhūtibhir lokān imāṃs tvaṃ vyāpya tiṣṭhasi
analyzed: yābhiḥ vibhūtibhiḥ lokān imān tvam vyāpya tiṣṭhasi

original: Bhg_10.017a kathaṃ vidyām ahaṃ yogiṃs tvāṃ sadā paricintayan
analyzed: katham vidyām aham yogin tvām sadā paricintayan

original: Bhg_10.017c keṣu keṣu ca bhāveṣu cintyo 'si bhagavan mayā
analyzed: keṣu keṣu ca bhāveṣu cintyaḥ si bhagavat mayā

original: Bhg_10.018a vistareṇātmano yogaṃ vibhūtiṃ ca janārdana
analyzed: vistareṇa ātmanaḥ yogam vibhūtim ca janārdana

original: Bhg_10.018c bhūyaḥ kathaya tṛptir hi śṛṇvato nāsti me 'mṛtam
analyzed: bhūyas kathaya tṛptiḥ hi śṛṇvataḥ nā asti me mṛtam

original: Bhg_10.019 śrībhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: Bhg_10.019a hanta te kathayiṣyāmi divyā hy ātmavibhūtayaḥ
analyzed: hanta te kathayiṣyāmi divyāḥ hi ātma vibhūtayaḥ

original: Bhg_10.019c prādhānyataḥ kuruśreṣṭha nāsty anto vistarasya me
analyzed: prādhānyataḥ kuruśreṣṭha na asti antaḥ vistarasya me

original: Bhg_10.020a aham ātmā guḍākeśa sarvabhūtāśayasthitaḥ
analyzed: aham ātmā guḍākeśa sarva bhūta āśaya sthitaḥ

original: Bhg_10.020c aham ādiś ca madhyaṃ ca bhūtānām anta eva ca
analyzed: aham ādiḥ ca madhyam ca bhūtānām antaḥ eva ca

original: Bhg_10.021a ādityānām ahaṃ viṣṇur jyotiṣāṃ ravir aṃśumān
analyzed: ādityānām aham viṣṇuḥ jyotiṣām raviḥ aṃśumān

original: Bhg_10.021c marīcir marutām asmi nakṣatrāṇām ahaṃ śaśī
analyzed: marīciḥ marutām asmi nakṣatrāṇām aham śaśī

original: Bhg_10.022a vedānāṃ sāmavedo 'smi devānām asmi vāsavaḥ
analyzed: vedānām sāmavedaḥ smi devānām asmi vāsavaḥ

original: Bhg_10.022c indriyāṇāṃ manaś cāsmi bhūtānām asmi cetanā
analyzed: indriyāṇām manaḥ ca asmi bhūtānām asmi cetanā

original: Bhg_10.023a rudrāṇāṃ śaṃkaraś cāsmi vitteśo yakṣarakṣasām
analyzed: rudrāṇām śaṃkaraḥ ca asmi vitteśaḥ yakṣa rakṣasām

original: Bhg_10.023c vasūnāṃ pāvakaś cāsmi meruḥ śikhariṇām aham
analyzed: vasūnām pāvakaḥ ca asmi meruḥ śikhariṇām aham

original: Bhg_10.024a purodhasāṃ ca mukhyaṃ māṃ viddhi pārtha bṛhaspatim
analyzed: purodhasām ca mukhyam mām viddhi pārtha bṛhaspatim

original: Bhg_10.024c senānīnām ahaṃ skandaḥ sarasām asmi sāgaraḥ
analyzed: senā nīnām aham skandaḥ sarasām asmi sāgaraḥ

original: Bhg_10.025a maharṣīṇāṃ bhṛgur ahaṃ girām asmy ekam akṣaram
analyzed: mahā ṛṣīṇām bhṛguḥ aham girām asmi ekam akṣaram

original: Bhg_10.025c yajñānāṃ japayajño 'smi sthāvarāṇāṃ himālayaḥ
analyzed: yajñānām japa yajñaḥ smi sthāvarāṇām himālayaḥ

original: Bhg_10.026a aśvatthaḥ sarvavṛkṣāṇāṃ devarṣīṇāṃ ca nāradaḥ
analyzed: aśvatthaḥ sarva vṛkṣāṇām deva ṛṣīṇām ca nāradaḥ

original: Bhg_10.026c gandharvāṇāṃ citrarathaḥ siddhānāṃ kapilo muniḥ
analyzed: gandharvāṇām citrarathaḥ siddhānām kapilaḥ muniḥ

original: Bhg_10.027a uccaiḥśravasam aśvānāṃ viddhi mām amṛtodbhavam
analyzed: uccaiḥśravasam aśvānām viddhi mām amṛta udbhavam

original: Bhg_10.027c airāvataṃ gajendrāṇāṃ narāṇāṃ ca narādhipam
analyzed: airāvatam gaja indrāṇām narāṇām ca narādhipam

original: Bhg_10.028a āyudhānām ahaṃ vajraṃ dhenūnām asmi kāmadhuk
analyzed: āyudhānām aham vajram dhenūnām asmi kāmadhuk

original: Bhg_10.028c prajanaś cāsmi kandarpaḥ sarpāṇām asmi vāsukiḥ
analyzed: prajanaḥ ca asmi kandarpaḥ sarpāṇām asmi vāsukiḥ

original: Bhg_10.029a anantaś cāsmi nāgānāṃ varuṇo yādasām aham
analyzed: anantaḥ ca asmi nāgānām varuṇaḥ yādasām aham

original: Bhg_10.029c pitṝṇām aryamā cāsmi yamaḥ saṃyamatām aham
analyzed: pitṝṇām aryamā ca asmi yamaḥ saṃyamatām aham

original: Bhg_10.030a prahlādaś cāsmi daityānāṃ kālaḥ kalayatām aham
analyzed: prahlādaḥ ca asmi daityānām kālaḥ kalayatām aham

original: Bhg_10.030c mṛgāṇāṃ ca mṛgendro 'haṃ vainateyaś ca pakṣiṇām
analyzed: mṛgāṇām ca mṛgendraḥ ham vainateyaḥ ca pakṣiṇām

original: Bhg_10.031a pavanaḥ pavatām asmi rāmaḥ śastrabhṛtām aham
analyzed: pavanaḥ pavatām asmi rāmaḥ śastrabhṛtām aham

original: Bhg_10.031c jhaṣāṇāṃ makaraś cāsmi srotasām asmi jāhnavī
analyzed: jhaṣāṇām makaraḥ ca asmi srotasām asmi jāhnavī

original: Bhg_10.032a sargāṇām ādir antaś ca madhyaṃ caivāham arjuna
analyzed: sargāṇām ādiḥ antaḥ ca madhyam ca eva aham arjuna

original: Bhg_10.032c adhyātmavidyā vidyānāṃ vādaḥ pravadatām aham
analyzed: adhyātma vidyā vidyānām vādaḥ pravadatām aham

original: Bhg_10.033a akṣarāṇām akāro 'smi dvaṃdvaḥ sāmāsikasya ca
analyzed: akṣarāṇām akāraḥ smi dvaṃdvaḥ sāmāsikasya ca

original: Bhg_10.033c aham evākṣayaḥ kālo dhātāhaṃ viśvatomukhaḥ
analyzed: aham eva akṣayaḥ kālaḥ dhātā aham viśvatomukhaḥ

original: Bhg_10.034a mṛtyuḥ sarvaharaś cāham udbhavaś ca bhaviṣyatām
analyzed: mṛtyuḥ sarva haraḥ ca aham udbhavaḥ ca bhaviṣyatām

original: Bhg_10.034c kīrtiḥ śrīr vāk ca nārīṇāṃ smṛtir medhā dhṛtiḥ kṣamā
analyzed: kīrtiḥ śrīḥ vāc ca nārīṇām smṛtiḥ medhā dhṛtiḥ kṣamā

original: Bhg_10.035a bṛhatsāma tathā sāmnāṃ gāyatrī chandasām aham
analyzed: bṛhatsāma tathā sāmnām gāyatrī chandasām aham

original: Bhg_10.035c māsānāṃ mārgaśīrṣo 'ham ṛtūnāṃ kusumākaraḥ
analyzed: māsānām mārgaśīrṣaḥ ham ṛtūnām kusumākaraḥ

original: Bhg_10.036a dyūtaṃ chalayatām asmi tejas tejasvinām aham
analyzed: dyūtam chalayatām asmi tejaḥ tejasvinām aham

original: Bhg_10.036c jayo 'smi vyavasāyo 'smi sattvaṃ sattvavatām aham
analyzed: jayaḥ smi vyavasāyaḥ smi sattvam sattvavatām aham

original: Bhg_10.037a vṛṣṇīnāṃ vāsudevo 'smi pāṇḍavānāṃ dhanaṃjayaḥ
analyzed: vṛṣṇīnām vāsudevaḥ smi pāṇḍavānām dhanaṃjayaḥ

original: Bhg_10.037c munīnām apy ahaṃ vyāsaḥ kavīnām uśanā kaviḥ
analyzed: munīnām api aham vyāsaḥ kavīnām uśanāḥ kaviḥ

original: Bhg_10.038a daṇḍo damayatām asmi nītir asmi jigīṣatām
analyzed: daṇḍaḥ damayatām asmi nītiḥ asmi jigīṣatām

original: Bhg_10.038c maunaṃ caivāsmi guhyānāṃ jñānaṃ jñānavatām aham
analyzed: maunam ca eva asmi guhyānām jñānam jñānavatām aham

original: Bhg_10.039a yac cāpi sarvabhūtānāṃ bījaṃ tad aham arjuna
analyzed: yat ca api sarva bhūtānām bījam tat aham arjuna

original: Bhg_10.039c na tad asti vinā yat syān mayā bhūtaṃ carācaram
analyzed: na tat asti vinā yat syāt mayā bhūtam carācaram

original: Bhg_10.040a nānto 'sti mama divyānāṃ vibhūtīnāṃ paraṃtapa
analyzed: na antaḥ sti mama divyānām vibhūtīnām paraṃtapa

original: Bhg_10.040c eṣa tūddeśataḥ prokto vibhūter vistaro mayā
analyzed: eṣa tu uddeśataḥ proktaḥ vibhūteḥ vistaraḥ mayā

original: Bhg_10.041a yad yad vibhūtimat sattvaṃ śrīmad ūrjitam eva vā
analyzed: yat yat vibhūtimat sattvam śrīmat ūrjitam eva vā

original: Bhg_10.041c tat tad evāvagaccha tvaṃ mama tejoṃśasaṃbhavam
analyzed: tat tat eva avagaccha tvam mama tejaḥ oṃśa saṃbhavam

original: Bhg_10.042a atha vā bahunaitena kiṃ jñātena tavārjuna
analyzed: atha vā bahunā etena kim jñātena tava arjuna

original: Bhg_10.042c viṣṭabhyāham idaṃ kṛtsnam ekāṃśena sthito jagat
analyzed: viṣṭabhya aham idam kṛtsnam eka aṃśena sthitaḥ jagat

original: Bhg_11.001 arjuna uvāca
analyzed: arjunaḥ uvāca

original: Bhg_11.001a madanugrahāya paramaṃ guhyam adhyātmasaṃjñitam
analyzed: mad anugrahāya paramam guhyam adhyātma saṃjñitam

original: Bhg_11.001c yat tvayoktaṃ vacas tena moho 'yaṃ vigato mama
analyzed: yat tvayā uktam vacaḥ tena mohaḥ yam vigataḥ mama

original: Bhg_11.002a bhavāpyayau hi bhūtānāṃ śrutau vistaraśo mayā
analyzed: bhava apyayau hi bhūtānām śrutau vistaraśaḥ mayā

original: Bhg_11.002c tvattaḥ kamalapatrākṣa māhātmyam api cāvyayam
analyzed: tvattaḥ kamala patra akṣa māhātmyam api ca avyayam

original: Bhg_11.003a evam etad yathāttha tvam ātmānaṃ parameśvara
analyzed: evam etat yathā āttha tvam ātmānam parameśvara

original: Bhg_11.003c draṣṭum icchāmi te rūpam aiśvaraṃ puruṣottama
analyzed: draṣṭum icchāmi te rūpam aiśvaram puruṣottama

original: Bhg_11.004a manyase yadi tac chakyaṃ mayā draṣṭum iti prabho
analyzed: manyase yadi tat śakyam mayā draṣṭum iti prabho

original: Bhg_11.004c yogeśvara tato me tvaṃ darśayātmānam avyayam
analyzed: yogeśvara tatas me tvam darśaya ātmānam avyayam

original: Bhg_11.005 śrībhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: Bhg_11.005a paśya me pārtha rūpāṇi śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ
analyzed: paśya me pārtha rūpāṇi sahasraśas

original: Bhg_11.005c nānāvidhāni divyāni nānāvarṇākṛtīni ca
analyzed: nānāvidhāni divyāni nānā varṇa ākṛtīni ca

original: Bhg_11.006a paśyādityān vasūn rudrān aśvinau marutas tathā
analyzed: paśya ādityān vasūn rudrān aśvinau marutaḥ tathā

original: Bhg_11.006c bahūny adṛṣṭapūrvāṇi paśyāścaryāṇi bhārata
analyzed: bahūni a dṛṣṭa pūrvāṇi paśya āścaryāṇi bhārata

original: Bhg_11.007a ihaikasthaṃ jagat kṛtsnaṃ paśyādya sacarācaram
analyzed: iha ekastham jagat kṛtsnam paśya adya sacarācaram

original: Bhg_11.007c mama dehe guḍākeśa yac cānyad draṣṭum icchasi
analyzed: mama dehe guḍākeśa yat ca anyat draṣṭum icchasi

original: Bhg_11.008a na tu māṃ śakyase draṣṭum anenaiva svacakṣuṣā
analyzed: na tu mām śakyase draṣṭum anena eva sva cakṣuṣā

original: Bhg_11.008c divyaṃ dadāmi te cakṣuḥ paśya me yogam aiśvaram
analyzed: divyam dadāmi te cakṣuḥ paśya me yogam aiśvaram

original: Bhg_11.009 saṃjaya uvāca
analyzed: saṃjayaḥ uvāca

original: Bhg_11.009a evam uktvā tato rājan mahāyogeśvaro hariḥ
analyzed: evam uktvā tatas rājan mahā yoga īśvaraḥ hariḥ

original: Bhg_11.009c darśayām āsa pārthāya paramaṃ rūpam aiśvaram
analyzed: darśayām āsa pārthāya paramam rūpam aiśvaram

original: Bhg_11.010a anekavaktranayanam anekādbhutadarśanam
analyzed: aneka vaktra nayanam aneka adbhuta darśanam

original: Bhg_11.010c anekadivyābharaṇaṃ divyānekodyatāyudham
analyzed: aneka divya ābharaṇam divya aneka udyata āyudham

original: Bhg_11.011a divyamālyāmbaradharaṃ divyagandhānulepanam
analyzed: divya mālya ambara dharam divya gandha anulepanam

original: Bhg_11.011c sarvāścaryamayaṃ devam anantaṃ viśvatomukham
analyzed: sarva āścarya mayam devam anantam viśvatomukham

original: Bhg_11.012a divi sūryasahasrasya bhaved yugapad utthitā
analyzed: divi sūrya sahasrasya bhavet yugapad utthitā

original: Bhg_11.012c yadi bhāḥ sadṛśī sā syād bhāsas tasya mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: yadi bhās sadṛśī sā syāt bhāsaḥ tasya mahātmanaḥ

original: Bhg_11.013a tatraikasthaṃ jagat kṛtsnaṃ pravibhaktam anekadhā
analyzed: tatra ekastham jagat kṛtsnam pravibhaktam anekadhā

original: Bhg_11.013c apaśyad devadevasya śarīre pāṇḍavas tadā
analyzed: apaśyat devadevasya śarīre pāṇḍavaḥ tadā

original: Bhg_11.014a tataḥ sa vismayāviṣṭo hṛṣṭaromā dhanaṃjayaḥ
analyzed: tatas sa vismaya āviṣṭaḥ hṛṣṭa romā dhanaṃjayaḥ

original: Bhg_11.014c praṇamya śirasā devaṃ kṛtāñjalir abhāṣata
analyzed: praṇamya śirasā devam kṛtāñjaliḥ abhāṣata

original: Bhg_11.015 arjuna uvāca
analyzed: arjunaḥ uvāca

original: Bhg_11.015a_0 paśyāmi devāṃs tava deva dehe;
analyzed: paśyāmi devān tava deva dehe

original: Bhg_11.015a_1 sarvāṃs tathā bhūtaviśeṣasaṃghān
analyzed: sarvān tathā bhūta viśeṣa saṃghān

original: Bhg_11.015c_0 brahmāṇam īśaṃ kamalāsanastham;
analyzed: brahmāṇam īśam kamalāsana stham

original: Bhg_11.015c_1 ṛṣīṃś ca sarvān uragāṃś ca divyān
analyzed: ṛṣīn ca sarvān uragān ca divyān

original: Bhg_11.016a_0 anekabāhūdaravaktranetraṃ;
analyzed: aneka bāhu udara vaktra netram

original: Bhg_11.016a_1 paśyāmi tvā sarvato 'nantarūpam
analyzed: paśyāmi tvā sarvatas nanta rūpam

original: Bhg_11.016c_0 nāntaṃ na madhyaṃ na punas tavādiṃ;
analyzed: na antam na madhyam na punar tava ādim

original: Bhg_11.016c_1 paśyāmi viśveśvara viśvarūpa
analyzed: paśyāmi viśveśvara viśvarūpa

original: Bhg_11.017a_0 kirīṭinaṃ gadinaṃ cakriṇaṃ ca;
analyzed: kirīṭinam gadinam cakriṇam ca

original: Bhg_11.017a_1 tejorāśiṃ sarvato dīptimantam
analyzed: tejaḥ rāśim sarvatas dīptimantam

original: Bhg_11.017c_0 paśyāmi tvāṃ durnirīkṣyaṃ samantād;
analyzed: paśyāmi tvām durnirīkṣyam samantāt

original: Bhg_11.017c_1 dīptānalārkadyutim aprameyam
analyzed: dīpta anala arka dyutim aprameyam

original: Bhg_11.018a_0 tvam akṣaraṃ paramaṃ veditavyaṃ;
analyzed: tvam akṣaram paramam veditavyam

original: Bhg_11.018a_1 tvam asya viśvasya paraṃ nidhānam
analyzed: tvam asya viśvasya param nidhānam

original: Bhg_11.018c_0 tvam avyayaḥ śāśvatadharmagoptā;
analyzed: tvam avyayaḥ śāśvata dharma goptā

original: Bhg_11.018c_1 sanātanas tvaṃ puruṣo mato me
analyzed: sanātanaḥ tvam puruṣaḥ mataḥ me

original: Bhg_11.019a_0 anādimadhyāntam anantavīryam;
Bhg_11.019a_1 anantabāhuṃ śaśisūryanetram
analyzed: ananta bāhum śaśi sūrya netram

original: Bhg_11.019c_0 paśyāmi tvāṃ dīptahutāśavaktraṃ;
analyzed: paśyāmi tvām dīpta hutāśa vaktram

original: Bhg_11.019c_1 svatejasā viśvam idaṃ tapantam
analyzed: sva tejasā viśvam idam tapantam

original: Bhg_11.020a_0 dyāvāpṛthivyor idam antaraṃ hi;
analyzed: dyāvāpṛthivyoḥ idam antaram hi

original: Bhg_11.020a_1 vyāptaṃ tvayaikena diśaś ca sarvāḥ
analyzed: vyāptam tvayā ekena diśaḥ ca sarvāḥ

original: Bhg_11.020c_0 dṛṣṭvādbhutaṃ rūpam idaṃ tavograṃ;
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā adbhutam rūpam idam tava ugram

original: Bhg_11.020c_1 lokatrayaṃ pravyathitaṃ mahātman
analyzed: lokatrayam pravyathitam mahātman

original: Bhg_11.021a_0 amī hi tvā surasaṃghā viśanti;
analyzed: amī hi tvā sura saṃghāḥ viśanti

original: Bhg_11.021a_1 ke cid bhītāḥ prāñjalayo gṛṇanti
analyzed: ke cit bhītāḥ prāñjalayaḥ gṛṇanti

original: Bhg_11.021c_0 svastīty uktvā maharṣisiddhasaṃghāḥ;
analyzed: svasti iti uktvā mahā ṛṣi siddha saṃghāḥ

original: Bhg_11.021c_1 stuvanti tvāṃ stutibhiḥ puṣkalābhiḥ
analyzed: stuvanti tvām stutibhiḥ puṣkalābhiḥ

original: Bhg_11.022a_0 rudrādityā vasavo ye ca sādhyā;
analyzed: rudra ādityāḥ vasavaḥ ye ca sādhyā

original: Bhg_11.022a_1 viśve 'śvinau marutaś coṣmapāś ca
analyzed: viśve śvinau marutaḥ ca ūṣmapāḥ ca

original: Bhg_11.022c_0 gandharvayakṣāsurasiddhasaṃghā;
analyzed: gandharva yakṣa asura siddha saṃghā

original: Bhg_11.022c_1 vīkṣante tvā vismitāś caiva sarve
analyzed: vīkṣante tvā vismitāḥ ca eva sarve

original: Bhg_11.023a_0 rūpaṃ mahat te bahuvaktranetraṃ;
analyzed: rūpam mahat te bahu vaktra netram

original: Bhg_11.023a_1 mahābāho bahubāhūrupādam
analyzed: mahā bāho bahu bāhu ūru pādam

original: Bhg_11.023c_0 bahūdaraṃ bahudaṃṣṭrākarālaṃ;
analyzed: bahu udaram bahu daṃṣṭra karālam

original: Bhg_11.023c_1 dṛṣṭvā lokāḥ pravyathitās tathāham
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā lokāḥ pravyathitāḥ tathā aham

original: Bhg_11.024a_0 nabhaḥspṛśaṃ dīptam anekavarṇaṃ;
analyzed: nabhaḥ spṛśam dīptam aneka varṇam

original: Bhg_11.024a_1 vyāttānanaṃ dīptaviśālanetram
analyzed: vyātta ānanam dīpta viśāla netram

original: Bhg_11.024c_0 dṛṣṭvā hi tvāṃ pravyathitāntarātmā;
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā hi tvām pravyathita antarātmā

original: Bhg_11.024c_1 dhṛtiṃ na vindāmi śamaṃ ca viṣṇo
analyzed: dhṛtim na vindāmi śamam ca viṣṇo

original: Bhg_11.025a_0 daṃṣṭrākarālāni ca te mukhāni;
analyzed: daṃṣṭrā karālāni ca te mukhāni

original: Bhg_11.025a_1 dṛṣṭvaiva kālānalasaṃnibhāni
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā eva kāla anala saṃnibhāni

original: Bhg_11.025c_0 diśo na jāne na labhe ca śarma;
analyzed: diśaḥ na jāne na labhe ca śarma

original: Bhg_11.025c_1 prasīda deveśa jagannivāsa
analyzed: prasīda deveśa jagannivāsa

original: Bhg_11.026a_0 amī ca tvāṃ dhṛtarāṣṭrasya putrāḥ;
analyzed: amī ca tvām dhṛtarāṣṭrasya putrāḥ

original: Bhg_11.026a_1 sarve sahaivāvanipālasaṃghaiḥ
analyzed: sarve saha eva avanipāla saṃghaiḥ

original: Bhg_11.026c_0 bhīṣmo droṇaḥ sūtaputras tathāsau;
analyzed: bhīṣmaḥ droṇaḥ sūtaputraḥ tathā asau

original: Bhg_11.026c_1 sahāsmadīyair api yodhamukhyaiḥ
analyzed: saha asmadīyaiḥ api yodha mukhyaiḥ

original: Bhg_11.027a_0 vaktrāṇi te tvaramāṇā viśanti;
analyzed: vaktrāṇi te tvaramāṇāḥ viśanti

original: Bhg_11.027a_1 daṃṣṭrākarālāni bhayānakāni
analyzed: daṃṣṭrā karālāni bhayānakāni

original: Bhg_11.027c_0 ke cid vilagnā daśanāntareṣu;
analyzed: ke cid vilagnāḥ daśana antareṣu

original: Bhg_11.027c_1 saṃdṛśyante cūrṇitair uttamāṅgaiḥ
analyzed: saṃdṛśyante cūrṇitaiḥ uttamāṅgaiḥ

original: Bhg_11.028a_0 yathā nadīnāṃ bahavo 'mbuvegāḥ;
analyzed: yathā nadīnām bahavaḥ mbu vegāḥ

original: Bhg_11.028a_1 samudram evābhimukhā dravanti
analyzed: samudram eva abhimukhāḥ dravanti

original: Bhg_11.028c_0 tathā tavāmī naralokavīrā;
analyzed: tathā tava amī nara loka vīrā

original: Bhg_11.028c_1 viśanti vaktrāṇy abhivijvalanti
analyzed: viśanti vaktrāṇi abhivijvalanti

original: Bhg_11.029a_0 yathā pradīptaṃ jvalanaṃ pataṃgā;
analyzed: yathā pradīptam jvalanam pataṃgā

original: Bhg_11.029a_1 viśanti nāśāya samṛddhavegāḥ
analyzed: viśanti nāśāya samṛddha vegāḥ

original: Bhg_11.029c_0 tathaiva nāśāya viśanti lokās;
analyzed: tathā eva nāśāya viśanti lokāḥ

original: Bhg_11.029c_1 tavāpi vaktrāṇi samṛddhavegāḥ
analyzed: tava api vaktrāṇi samṛddha vegāḥ

original: Bhg_11.030a_0 lelihyase grasamānaḥ samantāl;
analyzed: lelihyase grasamānaḥ samantāt

original: Bhg_11.030a_1 lokān samagrān vadanair jvaladbhiḥ
analyzed: lokān samagrān vadanaiḥ jvaladbhiḥ

original: Bhg_11.030c_0 tejobhir āpūrya jagat samagraṃ;
analyzed: tejobhiḥ āpūrya jagat samagram

original: Bhg_11.030c_1 bhāsas tavogrāḥ pratapanti viṣṇo
analyzed: bhāsaḥ tava ugrāḥ pratapanti viṣṇo

original: Bhg_11.031a_0 ākhyāhi me ko bhavān ugrarūpo;
analyzed: ākhyāhi me kaḥ bhavān ugra rūpaḥ

original: Bhg_11.031a_1 namo 'stu te devavara prasīda
analyzed: namaḥ stu te deva vara prasīda

original: Bhg_11.031c_0 vijñātum icchāmi bhavantam ādyaṃ;
analyzed: vijñātum icchāmi bhavantam ādyam

original: Bhg_11.031c_1 na hi prajānāmi tava pravṛttim
analyzed: na hi prajānāmi tava pravṛttim

original: Bhg_11.032 śrībhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: Bhg_11.032a_0 kālo 'smi lokakṣayakṛt pravṛddho;
analyzed: kālaḥ smi loka kṣaya kṛt pravṛddhaḥ

original: Bhg_11.032a_1 lokān samāhartum iha pravṛttaḥ
analyzed: lokān samāhartum iha pravṛttaḥ

original: Bhg_11.032c_0 ṛte 'pi tvā na bhaviṣyanti sarve;
analyzed: ṛte pi tvā na bhaviṣyanti sarve

original: Bhg_11.032c_1 ye 'vasthitāḥ pratyanīkeṣu yodhāḥ
analyzed: ye vasthitāḥ pratyanīkeṣu yodhāḥ

original: Bhg_11.033a_0 tasmāt tvam uttiṣṭha yaśo labhasva;
analyzed: tasmāt tvam uttiṣṭha yaśaḥ labhasva

original: Bhg_11.033a_1 jitvā śatrūn bhuṅkṣva rājyaṃ samṛddham
analyzed: jitvā śatrūn bhuṅkṣva rājyam samṛddham

original: Bhg_11.033c_0 mayaivaite nihatāḥ pūrvam eva;
analyzed: mayā eva ete nihatāḥ pūrvam eva

original: Bhg_11.033c_1 nimittamātraṃ bhava savyasācin
analyzed: nimitta mātram bhava savyasācin

original: Bhg_11.034a_0 droṇaṃ ca bhīṣmaṃ ca jayadrathaṃ ca;
analyzed: droṇam ca bhīṣmam ca jayadratham ca

original: Bhg_11.034a_1 karṇaṃ tathānyān api yodhavīrān
analyzed: karṇam tathā anyān api yodha vīrān

original: Bhg_11.034c_0 mayā hatāṃs tvaṃ jahi mā vyathiṣṭhā;
analyzed: mayā hatān tvam jahi mā vyathiṣṭhāḥ

original: Bhg_11.034c_1 yudhyasva jetāsi raṇe sapatnān
analyzed: yudhyasva jetāsi raṇe sapatnān

original: Bhg_11.035 saṃjaya uvāca
analyzed: saṃjayaḥ uvāca

original: Bhg_11.035a_0 etac chrutvā vacanaṃ keśavasya;
analyzed: etat śrutvā vacanam keśavasya

original: Bhg_11.035a_1 kṛtāñjalir vepamānaḥ kirīṭī
analyzed: kṛtāñjaliḥ vepamānaḥ kirīṭī

original: Bhg_11.035c_0 namaskṛtvā bhūya evāha kṛṣṇaṃ;
analyzed: namaskṛtvā bhūyas eva āha kṛṣṇam

original: Bhg_11.035c_1 sagadgadaṃ bhītabhītaḥ praṇamya
analyzed: sa gadgadam bhīta bhītaḥ praṇamya

original: Bhg_11.036 arjuna uvāca
analyzed: arjunaḥ uvāca

original: Bhg_11.036a_0 sthāne hṛṣīkeśa tava prakīrtyā;
analyzed: sthāne hṛṣīkeśa tava prakīrtyā

original: Bhg_11.036a_1 jagat prahṛṣyaty anurajyate ca
analyzed: jagat prahṛṣyati anurajyate ca

original: Bhg_11.036c_0 rakṣāṃsi bhītāni diśo dravanti;
analyzed: rakṣāṃsi bhītāni diśaḥ dravanti

original: Bhg_11.036c_1 sarve namasyanti ca siddhasaṃghāḥ
analyzed: sarve namasyanti ca siddha saṃghāḥ

original: Bhg_11.037a_0 kasmāc ca te na nameran mahātman;
analyzed: kasmāt ca te na nameran mahātman

original: Bhg_11.037a_1 garīyase brahmaṇo 'py ādikartre
analyzed: garīyase brahmaṇaḥ pi ādikartre

original: Bhg_11.037c_0 ananta deveśa jagannivāsa;
analyzed: ananta deveśa jagannivāsa

original: Bhg_11.037c_1 tvam akṣaraṃ sad asat tatparaṃ yat
analyzed: tvam akṣaram sat asat tat param yat

original: Bhg_11.038a_0 tvam ādidevaḥ puruṣaḥ purāṇas;
analyzed: tvam ādidevaḥ puruṣaḥ purāṇaḥ

original: Bhg_11.038a_1 tvam asya viśvasya paraṃ nidhānam
analyzed: tvam asya viśvasya param nidhānam

original: Bhg_11.038c_0 vettāsi vedyaṃ ca paraṃ ca dhāma;
analyzed: vettāsi vedyam ca param ca dhāma

original: Bhg_11.038c_1 tvayā tataṃ viśvam anantarūpa
analyzed: tvayā tatam viśvam ananta rūpa

original: Bhg_11.039a_0 vāyur yamo 'gnir varuṇaḥ śaśāṅkaḥ;
analyzed: vāyuḥ yamaḥ gniḥ varuṇaḥ śaśāṅkaḥ

original: Bhg_11.039a_1 prajāpatis tvaṃ prapitāmahaś ca
analyzed: prajāpatiḥ tvam prapitāmahaḥ ca

original: Bhg_11.039c_0 namo namas te 'stu sahasrakṛtvaḥ;
analyzed: namaḥ namaḥ te stu sahasra kṛtvas

original: Bhg_11.039c_1 punaś ca bhūyo 'pi namo namas te
analyzed: punar ca bhūyas namaḥ namaḥ te

original: Bhg_11.040a_0 namaḥ purastād atha pṛṣṭhatas te;
analyzed: namaḥ purastāt atha pṛṣṭhatas te

original: Bhg_11.040a_1 namo 'stu te sarvata eva sarva
analyzed: namaḥ stu te sarvatas eva sarva

original: Bhg_11.040c_0 anantavīryāmitavikramas tvaṃ;
analyzed: ananta vīrya amita vikramaḥ tvam

original: Bhg_11.040c_1 sarvaṃ samāpnoṣi tato 'si sarvaḥ
analyzed: sarvam samāpnoṣi tatas si sarvaḥ

original: Bhg_11.041a_0 sakheti matvā prasabhaṃ yad uktaṃ;
analyzed: sakhā iti matvā prasabham yat uktam

original: Bhg_11.041a_1 he kṛṣṇa he yādava he sakheti
analyzed: he kṛṣṇa he yādava he sakhā iti

original: Bhg_11.041c_0 ajānatā mahimānaṃ tavedaṃ;
analyzed: a jānatā mahimānam tava idam

original: Bhg_11.041c_1 mayā pramādāt praṇayena vāpi
analyzed: mayā pramādāt praṇayena vā api

original: Bhg_11.042a_0 yac cāvahāsārtham asatkṛto 'si;
analyzed: yat ca avahāsa artham asatkṛtaḥ si

original: Bhg_11.042a_1 vihāraśayyāsanabhojaneṣu
analyzed: vihāra śayyā āsana bhojaneṣu

original: Bhg_11.042c_0 eko 'tha vāpy acyuta tatsamakṣaṃ;
analyzed: vā api acyuta tad samakṣam

original: Bhg_11.042c_1 tat kṣāmaye tvām aham aprameyam
analyzed: tat kṣāmaye tvām aham aprameyam

original: Bhg_11.043a_0 pitāsi lokasya carācarasya;
analyzed: pitā asi lokasya carācarasya

original: Bhg_11.043a_1 tvam asya pūjyaś ca gurur garīyān
analyzed: tvam asya pūjyaḥ ca guruḥ garīyān

original: Bhg_11.043c_0 na tvatsamo 'sty abhyadhikaḥ kuto 'nyo;
analyzed: na tvad samaḥ sti abhyadhikaḥ kutas

original: Bhg_11.043c_1 lokatraye 'py apratimaprabhāva
analyzed: lokatraye pi apratima prabhāva

original: Bhg_11.044a_0 tasmāt praṇamya praṇidhāya kāyaṃ;
analyzed: tasmāt praṇamya praṇidhāya kāyam

original: Bhg_11.044a_1 prasādaye tvām aham īśam īḍyam
analyzed: prasādaye tvām aham īśam īḍyam

original: Bhg_11.044c_0 piteva putrasya sakheva sakhyuḥ;
analyzed: pitā iva putrasya sakhā iva sakhyuḥ

original: Bhg_11.044c_1 priyaḥ priyāyārhasi deva soḍhum
analyzed: priyaḥ priyāya arhasi deva soḍhum

original: Bhg_11.045a_0 adṛṣṭapūrvaṃ hṛṣito 'smi dṛṣṭvā;
analyzed: adṛṣṭa pūrvam hṛṣitaḥ smi dṛṣṭvā

original: Bhg_11.045a_1 bhayena ca pravyathitaṃ mano me
analyzed: bhayena ca pravyathitam manaḥ me

original: Bhg_11.045c_0 tad eva me darśaya deva rūpaṃ;
analyzed: tat eva me darśaya deva rūpam

original: Bhg_11.045c_1 prasīda deveśa jagannivāsa
analyzed: prasīda deveśa jagannivāsa

original: Bhg_11.046a_0 kirīṭinaṃ gadinaṃ cakrahastam;
analyzed: kirīṭinam gadinam cakra hastam

original: Bhg_11.046a_1 icchāmi tvāṃ draṣṭum ahaṃ tathaiva
analyzed: icchāmi tvām draṣṭum aham tathā eva

original: Bhg_11.046c_0 tenaiva rūpeṇa caturbhujena;
analyzed: tena eva rūpeṇa catur bhujena

original: Bhg_11.046c_1 sahasrabāho bhava viśvamūrte
analyzed: sahasrabāho bhava viśvamūrte

original: Bhg_11.047 śrībhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: Bhg_11.047a_0 mayā prasannena tavārjunedaṃ;
analyzed: mayā prasannena tava arjuna idam

original: Bhg_11.047a_1 rūpaṃ paraṃ darśitam ātmayogāt
analyzed: rūpam param darśitam ātma yogāt

original: Bhg_11.047c_0 tejomayaṃ viśvam anantam ādyaṃ;
analyzed: tejaḥ mayam viśvam anantam ādyam

original: Bhg_11.047c_1 yan me tvad anyena na dṛṣṭapūrvam
analyzed: yat me tvat anyena na dṛṣṭa pūrvam

original: Bhg_11.048a_0 na vedayajñādhyayanair na dānair;
analyzed: na veda yajña adhyayanaiḥ na dānaiḥ

original: Bhg_11.048a_1 na ca kriyābhir na tapobhir ugraiḥ
analyzed: na ca kriyābhiḥ na tapobhiḥ ugraiḥ

original: Bhg_11.048c_0 evaṃrūpaḥ śakya ahaṃ nṛloke;
analyzed: evaṃrūpaḥ śakyaḥ aham nṛ loke

original: Bhg_11.048c_1 draṣṭuṃ tvad anyena kurupravīra
analyzed: draṣṭum tvat anyena kuru pravīra

original: Bhg_11.049a_0 mā te vyathā mā ca vimūḍhabhāvo;
analyzed: mā te vyathā mā ca vimūḍha bhāvaḥ

original: Bhg_11.049a_1 dṛṣṭvā rūpaṃ ghoram īdṛṅ mamedam
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā rūpam ghoram īdṛś mama idam

original: Bhg_11.049c_0 vyapetabhīḥ prītamanāḥ punas tvaṃ;
analyzed: vyapeta bhīḥ prīta manāḥ punar tvam

original: Bhg_11.049c_1 tad eva me rūpam idaṃ prapaśya
analyzed: tat eva me rūpam idam prapaśya

original: Bhg_11.050 saṃjaya uvāca
analyzed: saṃjayaḥ uvāca

original: Bhg_11.050a_0 ity arjunaṃ vāsudevas tathoktvā;
analyzed: iti arjunam vāsudevaḥ tathā uktvā

original: Bhg_11.050a_1 svakaṃ rūpaṃ darśayām āsa bhūyaḥ
analyzed: svakam rūpam darśayām āsa bhūyas

original: Bhg_11.050c_0 āśvāsayām āsa ca bhītam enaṃ;
analyzed: āśvāsayām āsa ca bhītam enam

original: Bhg_11.050c_1 bhūtvā punaḥ saumyavapur mahātmā
analyzed: bhūtvā punar saumya vapuḥ mahātmā

original: Bhg_11.051 arjuna uvāca
analyzed: arjunaḥ uvāca

original: Bhg_11.051a dṛṣṭvedaṃ mānuṣaṃ rūpaṃ tava saumyaṃ janārdana
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā idam mānuṣam rūpam tava saumyam janārdana

original: Bhg_11.051c idānīm asmi saṃvṛttaḥ sacetāḥ prakṛtiṃ gataḥ
analyzed: idānīm asmi saṃvṛttaḥ sa cetāḥ prakṛtim gataḥ

original: Bhg_11.052 śrībhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: Bhg_11.052a sudurdarśam idaṃ rūpaṃ dṛṣṭavān asi yan mama
analyzed: su durdarśam idam rūpam dṛṣṭavān asi yat mama

original: Bhg_11.052c devā apy asya rūpasya nityaṃ darśanakāṅkṣiṇaḥ
analyzed: devāḥ api asya rūpasya nityam darśana kāṅkṣiṇaḥ

original: Bhg_11.053a nāhaṃ vedair na tapasā na dānena na cejyayā
analyzed: na aham vedaiḥ na tapasā na dānena na ca ijyayā

original: Bhg_11.053c śakya evaṃvidho draṣṭuṃ dṛṣṭavān asi māṃ yathā
analyzed: śakyaḥ evaṃvidhaḥ draṣṭum dṛṣṭavān asi mām yathā

original: Bhg_11.054a bhaktyā tv ananyayā śakya aham evaṃvidho 'rjuna
analyzed: bhaktyā tu an anyayā śakyaḥ aham evaṃvidhaḥ rjuna

original: Bhg_11.054c jñātuṃ draṣṭuṃ ca tattvena praveṣṭuṃ ca paraṃtapa
analyzed: jñātum draṣṭum ca tattvena praveṣṭum ca paraṃtapa

original: Bhg_11.055a matkarmakṛn matparamo madbhaktaḥ saṅgavarjitaḥ
Bhg_11.055c nirvairaḥ sarvabhūteṣu yaḥ sa mām eti pāṇḍava
analyzed: nirvairaḥ sarva bhūteṣu yaḥ sa mām eti pāṇḍava

original: Bhg_12.001 arjuna uvāca
analyzed: arjunaḥ uvāca

original: Bhg_12.001a evaṃ satatayuktā ye bhaktās tvāṃ paryupāsate
analyzed: evam satata yuktāḥ ye bhaktāḥ tvām paryupāsate

original: Bhg_12.001c ye cāpy akṣaram avyaktaṃ teṣāṃ ke yogavittamāḥ
analyzed: ye ca api akṣaram avyaktam teṣām ke yoga vittamāḥ

original: Bhg_12.002 śrībhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: Bhg_12.002a mayy āveśya mano ye māṃ nityayuktā upāsate
analyzed: mayi āveśya manaḥ ye mām nitya yuktāḥ upāsate

original: Bhg_12.002c śraddhayā parayopetās te me yuktatamā matāḥ
analyzed: śraddhayā parayā upetāḥ te me yuktatamāḥ matāḥ

original: Bhg_12.003a ye tv akṣaram anirdeśyam avyaktaṃ paryupāsate
analyzed: ye tu akṣaram anirdeśyam avyaktam paryupāsate

original: Bhg_12.003c sarvatragam acintyaṃ ca kūṭastham acalaṃ dhruvam
analyzed: sarvatragam acintyam ca kūṭastham acalam dhruvam

original: Bhg_12.004a saṃniyamyendriyagrāmaṃ sarvatra samabuddhayaḥ
analyzed: saṃniyamya indriya grāmam sarvatra sama buddhayaḥ

original: Bhg_12.004c te prāpnuvanti mām eva sarvabhūtahite ratāḥ
analyzed: te prāpnuvanti mām eva sarva bhūta hite ratāḥ

original: Bhg_12.005a kleśo 'dhikataras teṣām avyaktāsaktacetasām
analyzed: kleśaḥ dhikataraḥ teṣām avyakta āsakta cetasām

original: Bhg_12.005c avyaktā hi gatir duḥkhaṃ dehavadbhir avāpyate
analyzed: avyaktā hi gatiḥ duḥkham dehavadbhiḥ avāpyate

original: Bhg_12.006a ye tu sarvāṇi karmāṇi mayi saṃnyasya matparāḥ
analyzed: ye tu sarvāṇi karmāṇi mayi saṃnyasya mad parāḥ

original: Bhg_12.006c ananyenaiva yogena māṃ dhyāyanta upāsate
analyzed: an anyena eva yogena mām dhyāyantaḥ upāsate

original: Bhg_12.007a teṣām ahaṃ samuddhartā mṛtyusaṃsārasāgarāt
analyzed: teṣām aham samuddhartā mṛtyu saṃsāra sāgarāt

original: Bhg_12.007c bhavāmi nacirāt pārtha mayy āveśitacetasām
analyzed: bhavāmi nacirāt pārtha mayi āveśita cetasām

original: Bhg_12.008a mayy eva mana ādhatsva mayi buddhiṃ niveśaya
analyzed: mayi eva manaḥ ādhatsva mayi buddhim niveśaya

original: Bhg_12.008c nivasiṣyasi mayy eva ata ūrdhvaṃ na saṃśayaḥ
analyzed: nivasiṣyasi mayi eva atas ūrdhvam na saṃśayaḥ

original: Bhg_12.009a atha cittaṃ samādhātuṃ na śaknoṣi mayi sthiram
analyzed: atha cittam samādhātum na śaknoṣi mayi sthiram

original: Bhg_12.009c abhyāsayogena tato mām icchāptuṃ dhanaṃjaya
analyzed: abhyāsa yogena tatas mām iccha āptum dhanaṃjaya

original: Bhg_12.010a abhyāse 'py asamartho 'si matkarmaparamo bhava
analyzed: abhyāse pi si mad karma paramaḥ bhava

original: Bhg_12.010c madartham api karmāṇi kurvan siddhim avāpsyasi
analyzed: mad artham api karmāṇi kurvan siddhim avāpsyasi

original: Bhg_12.011a athaitad apy aśakto 'si kartuṃ madyogam āśritaḥ
analyzed: athā etat api aśaktaḥ si kartum mad yogam āśritaḥ

original: Bhg_12.011c sarvakarmaphalatyāgaṃ tataḥ kuru yatātmavān
analyzed: sarva karma phala tyāgam tatas kuru yata ātmavān

original: Bhg_12.012a śreyo hi jñānam abhyāsāj jñānād dhyānaṃ viśiṣyate
analyzed: śreyaḥ hi jñānam abhyāsāt jñānāt dhyānam viśiṣyate

original: Bhg_12.012c dhyānāt karmaphalatyāgas tyāgāc chāntir anantaram
Bhg_12.013a adveṣṭā sarvabhūtānāṃ maitraḥ karuṇa eva ca
analyzed: a dveṣṭā sarva bhūtānām maitraḥ karuṇaḥ eva ca

original: Bhg_12.013c nirmamo nirahaṃkāraḥ samaduḥkhasukhaḥ kṣamī
Bhg_12.014a saṃtuṣṭaḥ satataṃ yogī yatātmā dṛḍhaniścayaḥ
analyzed: saṃtuṣṭaḥ satatam yogī yata ātmā dṛḍha niścayaḥ

original: Bhg_12.014c mayy arpitamanobuddhir yo madbhaktaḥ sa me priyaḥ
analyzed: mayi arpita manaḥ buddhiḥ yaḥ mad bhaktaḥ sa me priyaḥ

original: Bhg_12.015a yasmān nodvijate loko lokān nodvijate ca yaḥ
analyzed: yasmāt na udvijate lokaḥ lokāt na udvijate ca yaḥ

original: Bhg_12.015c harṣāmarṣabhayodvegair mukto yaḥ sa ca me priyaḥ
analyzed: harṣa amarṣa bhaya udvegaiḥ muktaḥ yaḥ sa ca me priyaḥ

original: Bhg_12.016a anapekṣaḥ śucir dakṣa udāsīno gatavyathaḥ
analyzed: anapekṣaḥ śuciḥ dakṣaḥ udāsīnaḥ gata vyathaḥ

original: Bhg_12.016c sarvārambhaparityāgī yo madbhaktaḥ sa me priyaḥ
analyzed: sarva ārambha parityāgī yaḥ mad bhaktaḥ sa me priyaḥ

original: Bhg_12.017a yo na hṛṣyati na dveṣṭi na śocati na kāṅkṣati
analyzed: yaḥ na hṛṣyati na dveṣṭi na śocati na kāṅkṣati

original: Bhg_12.017c śubhāśubhaparityāgī bhaktimān yaḥ sa me priyaḥ
analyzed: śubha aśubha parityāgī bhaktimān yaḥ sa me priyaḥ

original: Bhg_12.018a samaḥ śatrau ca mitre ca tathā mānāvamānayoḥ
analyzed: samaḥ śatrau ca mitre ca tathā māna avamānayoḥ

original: Bhg_12.018c śītoṣṇasukhaduḥkheṣu samaḥ saṅgavivarjitaḥ
analyzed: śīta uṣṇa sukha duḥkheṣu samaḥ saṅga vivarjitaḥ

original: Bhg_12.019a tulyanindāstutir maunī saṃtuṣṭo yena kena cit
analyzed: tulya nindā stutiḥ maunī saṃtuṣṭaḥ yena kena cit

original: Bhg_12.019c aniketaḥ sthiramatir bhaktimān me priyo naraḥ
analyzed: aniketaḥ sthira matiḥ bhaktimān me priyaḥ naraḥ

original: Bhg_12.020a ye tu dharmyāmṛtam idaṃ yathoktaṃ paryupāsate
analyzed: ye tu dharmya amṛtam idam yathā uktam paryupāsate

original: Bhg_12.020c śraddadhānā matparamā bhaktās te 'tīva me priyāḥ
analyzed: śraddadhānāḥ mad paramāḥ bhaktāḥ te tīva me priyāḥ

original: Bhg_13.001 śrībhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: Bhg_13.001a idaṃ śarīraṃ kaunteya kṣetram ity abhidhīyate
analyzed: idam śarīram kaunteya kṣetram iti abhidhīyate

original: Bhg_13.001c etad yo vetti taṃ prāhuḥ kṣetrajña iti tadvidaḥ
analyzed: etat yaḥ vetti tam prāhuḥ kṣetrajñaḥ iti tad vidaḥ

original: Bhg_13.002a kṣetrajñaṃ cāpi māṃ viddhi sarvakṣetreṣu bhārata
analyzed: kṣetrajñam ca api mām viddhi sarva kṣetreṣu bhārata

original: Bhg_13.002c kṣetrakṣetrajñayor jñānaṃ yat taj jñānaṃ mataṃ mama
analyzed: kṣetra kṣetrajñayoḥ jñānam yat tat jñānam matam mama

original: Bhg_13.003a tat kṣetraṃ yac ca yādṛk ca yadvikāri yataś ca yat
analyzed: tat kṣetram yat ca yādṛś ca yat vikāri yatas ca yat

original: Bhg_13.003c sa ca yo yatprabhāvaś ca tat samāsena me śṛṇu
analyzed: sa ca yaḥ yad prabhāvaḥ ca tat samāsena me śṛṇu

original: Bhg_13.004a ṛṣibhir bahudhā gītaṃ chandobhir vividhaiḥ pṛthak
analyzed: ṛṣibhiḥ bahudhā gītam chandobhiḥ vividhaiḥ pṛthak

original: Bhg_13.004c brahmasūtrapadaiś caiva hetumadbhir viniścitaiḥ
analyzed: brahmasūtra padaiḥ ca eva hetumadbhiḥ viniścitaiḥ

original: Bhg_13.005a mahābhūtāny ahaṃkāro buddhir avyaktam eva ca
analyzed: mahābhūtāni ahaṃkāraḥ buddhiḥ avyaktam eva ca

original: Bhg_13.005c indriyāṇi daśaikaṃ ca pañca cendriyagocarāḥ
analyzed: indriyāṇi daśa ekam ca pañca ca indriya gocarāḥ

original: Bhg_13.006a icchā dveṣaḥ sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ saṃghātaś cetanā dhṛtiḥ
analyzed: icchā dveṣaḥ sukham duḥkham saṃghātaḥ cetanā dhṛtiḥ

original: Bhg_13.006c etat kṣetraṃ samāsena savikāram udāhṛtam
analyzed: etat kṣetram samāsena sa vikāram udāhṛtam

original: Bhg_13.007a amānitvam adambhitvam ahiṃsā kṣāntir ārjavam
analyzed: amāni tvam adambhi tvam ahiṃsā kṣāntiḥ ārjavam

original: Bhg_13.007c ācāryopāsanaṃ śaucaṃ sthairyam ātmavinigrahaḥ
analyzed: ācārya upāsanam śaucam sthairyam ātma vinigrahaḥ

original: Bhg_13.008a indriyārtheṣu vairāgyam anahaṃkāra eva ca
analyzed: indriya artheṣu vairāgyam anahaṃkāraḥ eva ca

original: Bhg_13.008c janmamṛtyujarāvyādhiduḥkhadoṣānudarśanam
analyzed: janma mṛtyu jarā vyādhi duḥkha doṣa anudarśanam

original: Bhg_13.009a asaktir anabhiṣvaṅgaḥ putradāragṛhādiṣu
analyzed: asaktiḥ anabhiṣvaṅgaḥ putra dāra gṛha ādiṣu

original: Bhg_13.009c nityaṃ ca samacittatvam iṣṭāniṣṭopapattiṣu
analyzed: nityam ca sama citta tvam iṣṭa aniṣṭa upapattiṣu

original: Bhg_13.010a mayi cānanyayogena bhaktir avyabhicāriṇī
analyzed: mayi ca an anya yogena bhaktiḥ avyabhicāriṇī

original: Bhg_13.010c viviktadeśasevitvam aratir janasaṃsadi
analyzed: vivikta deśa sevi tvam aratiḥ jana saṃsadi

original: Bhg_13.011a adhyātmajñānanityatvaṃ tattvajñānārthadarśanam
Bhg_13.011c etaj jñānam iti proktam ajñānaṃ yad ato 'nyathā
analyzed: etat jñānam iti proktam ajñānam yat atas nyathā

original: Bhg_13.012a jñeyaṃ yat tat pravakṣyāmi yaj jñātvāmṛtam aśnute
analyzed: jñeyam yat tat pravakṣyāmi yat jñātvā amṛtam aśnute

original: Bhg_13.012c anādimat paraṃ brahma na sat tan nāsad ucyate
analyzed: anādimat param brahma na sat tat na asat ucyate

original: Bhg_13.013a sarvataḥpāṇipādaṃ tat sarvatokṣiśiromukham
analyzed: sarvatas pāṇi pādam tat sarvatas akṣi śiraḥ mukham

original: Bhg_13.013c sarvataḥśrutimal loke sarvam āvṛtya tiṣṭhati
analyzed: sarvatas śrutimat loke sarvam āvṛtya tiṣṭhati

original: Bhg_13.014a sarvendriyaguṇābhāsaṃ sarvendriyavivarjitam
analyzed: sarva indriya guṇa ābhāsam sarva indriya vivarjitam

original: Bhg_13.014c asaktaṃ sarvabhṛc caiva nirguṇaṃ guṇabhoktṛ ca
analyzed: asaktam sarva bhṛt ca eva nirguṇam guṇa bhoktṛ ca

original: Bhg_13.015a bahir antaś ca bhūtānām acaraṃ caram eva ca
analyzed: bahis antar ca bhūtānām acaram caram eva ca

original: Bhg_13.015c sūkṣmatvāt tad avijñeyaṃ dūrasthaṃ cāntike ca tat
analyzed: sūkṣma tvāt tat avijñeyam dūra stham ca antike ca tat

original: Bhg_13.016a avibhaktaṃ ca bhūteṣu vibhaktam iva ca sthitam
analyzed: avibhaktam ca bhūteṣu vibhaktam iva ca sthitam

original: Bhg_13.016c bhūtabhartṛ ca taj jñeyaṃ grasiṣṇu prabhaviṣṇu ca
analyzed: bhūta bhartṛ ca tat jñeyam grasiṣṇu prabhaviṣṇu ca

original: Bhg_13.017a jyotiṣām api taj jyotis tamasaḥ param ucyate
analyzed: jyotiṣām api tat jyotiḥ tamasaḥ param ucyate

original: Bhg_13.017c jñānaṃ jñeyaṃ jñānagamyaṃ hṛdi sarvasya viṣṭhitam
analyzed: jñānam jñeyam jñāna gamyam hṛdi sarvasya viṣṭhitam

original: Bhg_13.018a iti kṣetraṃ tathā jñānaṃ jñeyaṃ coktaṃ samāsataḥ
analyzed: iti kṣetram tathā jñānam jñeyam ca uktam samāsatas

original: Bhg_13.018c madbhakta etad vijñāya madbhāvāyopapadyate
analyzed: mad bhaktaḥ etat vijñāya mad bhāvāya upapadyate

original: Bhg_13.019a prakṛtiṃ puruṣaṃ caiva viddhy anādī ubhāv api
analyzed: prakṛtim puruṣam ca eva viddhi anādī ubhau api

original: Bhg_13.019c vikārāṃś ca guṇāṃś caiva viddhi prakṛtisaṃbhavān
analyzed: vikārān ca guṇān ca eva viddhi prakṛti saṃbhavān

original: Bhg_13.020a kāryakāraṇakartṛtve hetuḥ prakṛtir ucyate
analyzed: kārya kāraṇa kartṛ tve hetuḥ prakṛtiḥ ucyate

original: Bhg_13.020c puruṣaḥ sukhaduḥkhānāṃ bhoktṛtve hetur ucyate
analyzed: puruṣaḥ sukha duḥkhānām bhoktṛ tve hetuḥ ucyate

original: Bhg_13.021a puruṣaḥ prakṛtistho hi bhuṅkte prakṛtijān guṇān
analyzed: puruṣaḥ prakṛti sthaḥ hi bhuṅkte prakṛti jān guṇān

original: Bhg_13.021c kāraṇaṃ guṇasaṅgo 'sya sadasadyonijanmasu
analyzed: kāraṇam sat asat yoni janmasu

original: Bhg_13.022a upadraṣṭānumantā ca bhartā bhoktā maheśvaraḥ
analyzed: upadraṣṭā anumantā ca bhartā bhoktā maheśvaraḥ

original: Bhg_13.022c paramātmeti cāpy ukto dehe 'smin puruṣaḥ paraḥ
analyzed: paramātmā iti ca api uktaḥ dehe smin puruṣaḥ paraḥ

original: Bhg_13.023a ya evaṃ vetti puruṣaṃ prakṛtiṃ ca guṇaiḥ saha
analyzed: yaḥ evam vetti puruṣam prakṛtim ca guṇaiḥ saha

original: Bhg_13.023c sarvathā vartamāno 'pi na sa bhūyo 'bhijāyate
analyzed: sarvathā vartamānaḥ pi na sa bhūyas bhijāyate

original: Bhg_13.024a dhyānenātmani paśyanti ke cid ātmānam ātmanā
analyzed: dhyānena ātmani paśyanti ke cid ātmānam ātmanā

original: Bhg_13.024c anye sāṃkhyena yogena karmayogena cāpare
analyzed: anye sāṃkhyena yogena karma yogena ca apare

original: Bhg_13.025a anye tv evam ajānantaḥ śrutvānyebhya upāsate
analyzed: anye tu evam a jānantaḥ śrutvā anyebhyaḥ upāsate

original: Bhg_13.025c te 'pi cātitaranty eva mṛtyuṃ śrutiparāyaṇāḥ
analyzed: te ca atitaranti eva mṛtyum śruti parāyaṇāḥ

original: Bhg_13.026a yāvat saṃjāyate kiṃ cit sattvaṃ sthāvarajaṅgamam
analyzed: yāvat saṃjāyate kim cit sattvam sthāvara jaṅgamam

original: Bhg_13.026c kṣetrakṣetrajñasaṃyogāt tad viddhi bharatarṣabha
analyzed: kṣetra kṣetrajña saṃyogāt tat viddhi bharata ṛṣabha

original: Bhg_13.027a samaṃ sarveṣu bhūteṣu tiṣṭhantaṃ parameśvaram
analyzed: samam sarveṣu bhūteṣu tiṣṭhantam parameśvaram

original: Bhg_13.027c vinaśyatsv avinaśyantaṃ yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati
analyzed: vinaśyatsu a vinaśyantam yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati

original: Bhg_13.028a samaṃ paśyan hi sarvatra samavasthitam īśvaram
analyzed: samam paśyan hi sarvatra samavasthitam īśvaram

original: Bhg_13.028c na hinasty ātmanātmānaṃ tato yāti parāṃ gatim
analyzed: na hinasti ātmanā ātmānam tatas yāti parām gatim

original: Bhg_13.029a prakṛtyaiva ca karmāṇi kriyamāṇāni sarvaśaḥ
analyzed: prakṛtyā eva ca karmāṇi kriyamāṇāni sarvaśas

original: Bhg_13.029c yaḥ paśyati tathātmānam akartāraṃ sa paśyati
analyzed: yaḥ paśyati tathā ātmānam akartāram sa paśyati

original: Bhg_13.030a yadā bhūtapṛthagbhāvam ekastham anupaśyati
analyzed: yadā bhūta pṛthagbhāvam ekastham anupaśyati

original: Bhg_13.030c tata eva ca vistāraṃ brahma saṃpadyate tadā
analyzed: tatas eva ca vistāram brahma saṃpadyate tadā

original: Bhg_13.031a anāditvān nirguṇatvāt paramātmāyam avyayaḥ
analyzed: anādi tvāt nirguṇa tvāt paramātmā ayam avyayaḥ

original: Bhg_13.031c śarīrastho 'pi kaunteya na karoti na lipyate
analyzed: kaunteya na karoti na lipyate

original: Bhg_13.032a yathā sarvagataṃ saukṣmyād ākāśaṃ nopalipyate
analyzed: yathā sarva gatam saukṣmyāt ākāśam na upalipyate

original: Bhg_13.032c sarvatrāvasthito dehe tathātmā nopalipyate
analyzed: sarvatra avasthitaḥ dehe tathā ātmā na upalipyate

original: Bhg_13.033a yathā prakāśayaty ekaḥ kṛtsnaṃ lokam imaṃ raviḥ
analyzed: yathā prakāśayati ekaḥ kṛtsnam lokam imam raviḥ

original: Bhg_13.033c kṣetraṃ kṣetrī tathā kṛtsnaṃ prakāśayati bhārata
analyzed: kṣetram kṣetrī tathā kṛtsnam prakāśayati bhārata

original: Bhg_13.034a kṣetrakṣetrajñayor evam antaraṃ jñānacakṣuṣā
analyzed: kṣetra kṣetrajñayoḥ evam antaram jñānacakṣuṣā

original: Bhg_13.034c bhūtaprakṛtimokṣaṃ ca ye vidur yānti te param
analyzed: bhūta prakṛti mokṣam ca ye viduḥ yānti te param

original: Bhg_14.001 śrībhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: Bhg_14.001a paraṃ bhūyaḥ pravakṣyāmi jñānānāṃ jñānam uttamam
analyzed: param bhūyas pravakṣyāmi jñānānām jñānam uttamam

original: Bhg_14.001c yaj jñātvā munayaḥ sarve parāṃ siddhim ito gatāḥ
analyzed: yat jñātvā munayaḥ sarve parām siddhim itas gatāḥ

original: Bhg_14.002a idaṃ jñānam upāśritya mama sādharmyam āgatāḥ
analyzed: idam jñānam upāśritya mama sādharmyam āgatāḥ

original: Bhg_14.002c sarge 'pi nopajāyante pralaye na vyathanti ca
analyzed: sarge pi na upajāyante pralaye na vyathanti ca

original: Bhg_14.003a mama yonir mahad brahma tasmin garbhaṃ dadhāmy aham
analyzed: mama yoniḥ mahat brahma tasmin garbham dadhāmi aham

original: Bhg_14.003c saṃbhavaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ tato bhavati bhārata
analyzed: saṃbhavaḥ sarva bhūtānām tatas bhavati bhārata

original: Bhg_14.004a sarvayoniṣu kaunteya mūrtayaḥ saṃbhavanti yāḥ
analyzed: sarva yoniṣu kaunteya mūrtayaḥ saṃbhavanti yāḥ

original: Bhg_14.004c tāsāṃ brahma mahad yonir ahaṃ bījapradaḥ pitā
analyzed: tāsām brahma mahat yoniḥ aham bīja pradaḥ pitā

original: Bhg_14.005a sattvaṃ rajas tama iti guṇāḥ prakṛtisaṃbhavāḥ
analyzed: sattvam rajaḥ tamaḥ iti guṇāḥ prakṛti saṃbhavāḥ

original: Bhg_14.005c nibadhnanti mahābāho dehe dehinam avyayam
analyzed: nibadhnanti mahā bāho dehe dehinam avyayam

original: Bhg_14.006a tatra sattvaṃ nirmalatvāt prakāśakam anāmayam
analyzed: tatra sattvam nirmala tvāt prakāśakam anāmayam

original: Bhg_14.006c sukhasaṅgena badhnāti jñānasaṅgena cānagha
analyzed: sukha saṅgena badhnāti jñāna saṅgena ca anagha

original: Bhg_14.007a rajo rāgātmakaṃ viddhi tṛṣṇāsaṅgasamudbhavam
analyzed: rajaḥ rāga ātmakam viddhi tṛṣṇā saṅga samudbhavam

original: Bhg_14.007c tan nibadhnāti kaunteya karmasaṅgena dehinam
analyzed: tat nibadhnāti kaunteya karma saṅgena dehinam

original: Bhg_14.008a tamas tv ajñānajaṃ viddhi mohanaṃ sarvadehinām
analyzed: tamaḥ tu ajñāna jam viddhi mohanam sarva dehinām

original: Bhg_14.008c pramādālasyanidrābhis tan nibadhnāti bhārata
analyzed: pramāda ālasya nidrābhiḥ tat nibadhnāti bhārata

original: Bhg_14.009a sattvaṃ sukhe sañjayati rajaḥ karmaṇi bhārata
analyzed: sattvam sukhe sañjayati rajaḥ karmaṇi bhārata

original: Bhg_14.009c jñānam āvṛtya tu tamaḥ pramāde sañjayaty uta
analyzed: jñānam āvṛtya tu tamaḥ pramāde sañjayati uta

original: Bhg_14.010a rajas tamaś cābhibhūya sattvaṃ bhavati bhārata
analyzed: rajaḥ tamaḥ ca abhibhūya sattvam bhavati bhārata

original: Bhg_14.010c rajaḥ sattvaṃ tamaś caiva tamaḥ sattvaṃ rajas tathā
analyzed: rajaḥ sattvam tamaḥ ca eva tamaḥ sattvam rajaḥ tathā

original: Bhg_14.011a sarvadvāreṣu dehe 'smin prakāśa upajāyate
analyzed: sarva dvāreṣu dehe smin prakāśaḥ upajāyate

original: Bhg_14.011c jñānaṃ yadā tadā vidyād vivṛddhaṃ sattvam ity uta
analyzed: jñānam yadā tadā vidyāt vivṛddham sattvam iti uta

original: Bhg_14.012a lobhaḥ pravṛttir ārambhaḥ karmaṇām aśamaḥ spṛhā
analyzed: lobhaḥ pravṛttiḥ ārambhaḥ karmaṇām aśamaḥ spṛhā

original: Bhg_14.012c rajasy etāni jāyante vivṛddhe bharatarṣabha
analyzed: rajasi etāni jāyante vivṛddhe bharata ṛṣabha

original: Bhg_14.013a aprakāśo 'pravṛttiś ca pramādo moha eva ca
analyzed: pravṛttiḥ ca pramādaḥ mohaḥ eva ca

original: Bhg_14.013c tamasy etāni jāyante vivṛddhe kurunandana
analyzed: tamasi etāni jāyante vivṛddhe kuru nandana

original: Bhg_14.014a yadā sattve pravṛddhe tu pralayaṃ yāti dehabhṛt
analyzed: yadā sattve pravṛddhe tu pralayam yāti dehabhṛt

original: Bhg_14.014c tadottamavidāṃ lokān amalān pratipadyate
analyzed: tadā uttama vidām lokān amalān pratipadyate

original: Bhg_14.015a rajasi pralayaṃ gatvā karmasaṅgiṣu jāyate
analyzed: rajasi pralayam gatvā karma saṅgiṣu jāyate

original: Bhg_14.015c tathā pralīnas tamasi mūḍhayoniṣu jāyate
analyzed: tathā pralīnaḥ tamasi mūḍha yoniṣu jāyate

original: Bhg_14.016a karmaṇaḥ sukṛtasyāhuḥ sāttvikaṃ nirmalaṃ phalam
analyzed: karmaṇaḥ su kṛtasya āhuḥ sāttvikam nirmalam phalam

original: Bhg_14.016c rajasas tu phalaṃ duḥkham ajñānaṃ tamasaḥ phalam
analyzed: rajasaḥ tu phalam duḥkham ajñānam tamasaḥ phalam

original: Bhg_14.017a sattvāt saṃjāyate jñānaṃ rajaso lobha eva ca
analyzed: sattvāt saṃjāyate jñānam rajasaḥ lobhaḥ eva ca

original: Bhg_14.017c pramādamohau tamaso bhavato 'jñānam eva ca
analyzed: pramāda mohau tamasaḥ bhavataḥ jñānam eva ca

original: Bhg_14.018a ūrdhvaṃ gacchanti sattvasthā madhye tiṣṭhanti rājasāḥ
analyzed: ūrdhvam gacchanti sattva sthāḥ madhye tiṣṭhanti rājasāḥ

original: Bhg_14.018c jaghanyaguṇavṛttasthā adho gacchanti tāmasāḥ
analyzed: jaghanya guṇa vṛtta sthāḥ adhas gacchanti tāmasāḥ

original: Bhg_14.019a nānyaṃ guṇebhyaḥ kartāraṃ yadā draṣṭānupaśyati
analyzed: na anyam guṇebhyaḥ kartāram yadā draṣṭā anupaśyati

original: Bhg_14.019c guṇebhyaś ca paraṃ vetti madbhāvaṃ so 'dhigacchati
analyzed: guṇebhyaḥ ca param vetti mad bhāvam saḥ dhigacchati

original: Bhg_14.020a guṇān etān atītya trīn dehī dehasamudbhavān
analyzed: guṇān etān atītya trīn dehī deha samudbhavān

original: Bhg_14.020c janmamṛtyujarāduḥkhair vimukto 'mṛtam aśnute
analyzed: janma mṛtyu jarā duḥkhaiḥ vimuktaḥ mṛtam aśnute

original: Bhg_14.021 arjuna uvāca
analyzed: arjunaḥ uvāca

original: Bhg_14.021a kair liṅgais trīn guṇān etān atīto bhavati prabho
analyzed: kaiḥ liṅgaiḥ trīn guṇān etān atītaḥ bhavati prabho

original: Bhg_14.021c kimācāraḥ kathaṃ caitāṃs trīn guṇān ativartate
analyzed: kimācāraḥ katham ca etān trīn guṇān ativartate

original: Bhg_14.022 śrībhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: Bhg_14.022a prakāśaṃ ca pravṛttiṃ ca moham eva ca pāṇḍava
analyzed: prakāśam ca pravṛttim ca moham eva ca pāṇḍava

original: Bhg_14.022c na dveṣṭi saṃpravṛttāni na nivṛttāni kāṅkṣati
analyzed: na dveṣṭi saṃpravṛttāni na nivṛttāni kāṅkṣati

original: Bhg_14.023a udāsīnavad āsīno guṇair yo na vicālyate
analyzed: udāsīna vat āsīnaḥ guṇaiḥ yaḥ na vicālyate

original: Bhg_14.023c guṇā vartanta ity eva yo 'vatiṣṭhati neṅgate
analyzed: guṇāḥ vartante iti eva yaḥ vatiṣṭhati na iṅgate

original: Bhg_14.024a samaduḥkhasukhaḥ svasthaḥ samaloṣṭāśmakāñcanaḥ
analyzed: sama duḥkha sukhaḥ svasthaḥ sama loṣṭa aśma kāñcanaḥ

original: Bhg_14.024c tulyapriyāpriyo dhīras tulyanindātmasaṃstutiḥ
analyzed: tulya priya apriyaḥ dhīraḥ tulya nindā ātma saṃstutiḥ

original: Bhg_14.025a mānāvamānayos tulyas tulyo mitrāripakṣayoḥ
analyzed: māna avamānayoḥ tulyaḥ tulyaḥ mitra ari pakṣayoḥ

original: Bhg_14.025c sarvārambhaparityāgī guṇātītaḥ sa ucyate
analyzed: sarva ārambha parityāgī guṇa atītaḥ saḥ ucyate

original: Bhg_14.026a māṃ ca yo 'vyabhicāreṇa bhaktiyogena sevate
analyzed: mām ca yaḥ vyabhicāreṇa bhakti yogena sevate

original: Bhg_14.026c sa guṇān samatītyaitān brahmabhūyāya kalpate
analyzed: sa guṇān samatītya etān brahma bhūyāya kalpate

original: Bhg_14.027a brahmaṇo hi pratiṣṭhāham amṛtasyāvyayasya ca
analyzed: brahmaṇaḥ hi pratiṣṭhā aham amṛtasya avyayasya ca

original: Bhg_14.027c śāśvatasya ca dharmasya sukhasyaikāntikasya ca
analyzed: śāśvatasya ca dharmasya sukhasya aikāntikasya ca

original: Bhg_15.001 śrībhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: Bhg_15.001a ūrdhvamūlam adhaḥśākham aśvatthaṃ prāhur avyayam
analyzed: ūrdhva mūlam adhas śākham aśvattham prāhuḥ avyayam

original: Bhg_15.001c chandāṃsi yasya parṇāni yas taṃ veda sa vedavit
analyzed: chandāṃsi yasya parṇāni yaḥ tam veda sa veda vid

original: Bhg_15.002a_0 adhaś cordhvaṃ prasṛtās tasya śākhā;
analyzed: adhas ca ūrdhvam prasṛtāḥ tasya śākhā

original: Bhg_15.002a_1 guṇapravṛddhā viṣayapravālāḥ
analyzed: guṇa pravṛddhāḥ viṣaya pravālāḥ

original: Bhg_15.002c_0 adhaś ca mūlāny anusaṃtatāni;
analyzed: adhas ca mūlāni anusaṃtatāni

original: Bhg_15.002c_1 karmānubandhīni manuṣyaloke
analyzed: karma anubandhīni manuṣya loke

original: Bhg_15.003a_0 na rūpam asyeha tathopalabhyate;
analyzed: na rūpam asya iha tathā upalabhyate

original: Bhg_15.003a_1 nānto na cādir na ca saṃpratiṣṭhā
analyzed: na antaḥ na ca ādiḥ na ca saṃpratiṣṭhā

original: Bhg_15.003c_0 aśvattham enaṃ suvirūḍhamūlam;
analyzed: aśvattham enam su virūḍha mūlam

original: Bhg_15.003c_1 asaṅgaśastreṇa dṛḍhena chittvā
analyzed: asaṅga śastreṇa dṛḍhena chittvā

original: Bhg_15.004a_0 tataḥ padaṃ tatparimārgitavyaṃ;
analyzed: tatas padam tat parimārgitavyam

original: Bhg_15.004a_1 yasmin gatā na nivartanti bhūyaḥ
analyzed: yasmin gatāḥ na nivartanti bhūyas

original: Bhg_15.004c_0 tam eva cādyaṃ puruṣaṃ prapadye;
analyzed: tam eva ca ādyam puruṣam prapadye

original: Bhg_15.004c_1 yataḥ pravṛttiḥ prasṛtā purāṇī
analyzed: yatas pravṛttiḥ prasṛtā purāṇī

original: Bhg_15.005a_0 nirmānamohā jitasaṅgadoṣā;
analyzed: nirmāna mohā jita saṅga doṣā

original: Bhg_15.005a_1 adhyātmanityā vinivṛttakāmāḥ
analyzed: adhyātma nityāḥ vinivṛtta kāmāḥ

original: Bhg_15.005c_0 dvaṃdvair vimuktāḥ sukhaduḥkhasaṃjñair;
analyzed: dvaṃdvaiḥ vimuktāḥ sukha duḥkha saṃjñaiḥ

original: Bhg_15.005c_1 gacchanty amūḍhāḥ padam avyayaṃ tat
analyzed: gacchanti amūḍhāḥ padam avyayam tat

original: Bhg_15.006a na tad bhāsayate sūryo na śaśāṅko na pāvakaḥ
analyzed: na tat bhāsayate sūryaḥ na śaśāṅkaḥ na pāvakaḥ

original: Bhg_15.006c yad gatvā na nivartante tad dhāma paramaṃ mama
analyzed: yat gatvā na nivartante tat dhāma paramam mama

original: Bhg_15.007a mamaivāṃśo jīvaloke jīvabhūtaḥ sanātanaḥ
analyzed: mama eva aṃśaḥ jīva loke jīva bhūtaḥ sanātanaḥ

original: Bhg_15.007c manaḥṣaṣṭhānīndriyāṇi prakṛtisthāni karṣati
analyzed: manaḥ ṣaṣṭhāni indriyāṇi prakṛti sthāni karṣati

original: Bhg_15.008a śarīraṃ yad avāpnoti yac cāpy utkrāmatīśvaraḥ
analyzed: śarīram yat avāpnoti yat ca api utkrāmati īśvaraḥ

original: Bhg_15.008c gṛhītvaitāni saṃyāti vāyur gandhān ivāśayāt
analyzed: gṛhītvā etāni saṃyāti vāyuḥ gandhān iva āśayāt

original: Bhg_15.009a śrotraṃ cakṣuḥ sparśanaṃ ca rasanaṃ ghrāṇam eva ca
analyzed: śrotram cakṣuḥ sparśanam ca rasanam ghrāṇam eva ca

original: Bhg_15.009c adhiṣṭhāya manaś cāyaṃ viṣayān upasevate
analyzed: adhiṣṭhāya manaḥ ca ayam viṣayān upasevate

original: Bhg_15.010a utkrāmantaṃ sthitaṃ vāpi bhuñjānaṃ vā guṇānvitam
analyzed: utkrāmantam sthitam vā api bhuñjānam vā guṇa anvitam

original: Bhg_15.010c vimūḍhā nānupaśyanti paśyanti jñānacakṣuṣaḥ
analyzed: vimūḍhāḥ na anupaśyanti paśyanti jñāna cakṣuṣaḥ

original: Bhg_15.011a yatanto yoginaś cainaṃ paśyanty ātmany avasthitam
analyzed: yatantaḥ yoginaḥ ca enam paśyanti ātmani avasthitam

original: Bhg_15.011c yatanto 'py akṛtātmāno nainaṃ paśyanty acetasaḥ
analyzed: yatantaḥ api akṛtātmānaḥ na enam paśyanti acetasaḥ

original: Bhg_15.012a yad ādityagataṃ tejo jagad bhāsayate 'khilam
analyzed: yat āditya gatam tejaḥ jagat bhāsayate khilam

original: Bhg_15.012c yac candramasi yac cāgnau tat tejo viddhi māmakam
analyzed: yat candramasi yat ca agnau tat tejaḥ viddhi māmakam

original: Bhg_15.013a gām āviśya ca bhūtāni dhārayāmy aham ojasā
analyzed: gām āviśya ca bhūtāni dhārayāmi aham ojasā

original: Bhg_15.013c puṣṇāmi cauṣadhīḥ sarvāḥ somo bhūtvā rasātmakaḥ
analyzed: puṣṇāmi ca oṣadhīḥ sarvāḥ somaḥ bhūtvā rasa ātmakaḥ

original: Bhg_15.014a ahaṃ vaiśvānaro bhūtvā prāṇināṃ deham āśritaḥ
analyzed: aham vaiśvānaraḥ bhūtvā prāṇinām deham āśritaḥ

original: Bhg_15.014c prāṇāpānasamāyuktaḥ pacāmy annaṃ caturvidham
analyzed: prāṇa apāna samāyuktaḥ pacāmi annam caturvidham

original: Bhg_15.015a_0 sarvasya cāhaṃ hṛdi saṃniviṣṭo;
analyzed: sarvasya ca aham hṛdi saṃniviṣṭaḥ

original: Bhg_15.015a_1 mattaḥ smṛtir jñānam apohanaṃ ca
analyzed: mattaḥ smṛtiḥ jñānam apohanam ca

original: Bhg_15.015c_0 vedaiś ca sarvair aham eva vedyo;
analyzed: vedaiḥ ca sarvaiḥ aham eva vedyaḥ

original: Bhg_15.015c_1 vedāntakṛd vedavid eva cāham
analyzed: vedānta kṛt veda vid eva ca aham

original: Bhg_15.016a dvāv imau puruṣau loke kṣaraś cākṣara eva ca
analyzed: dvau imau puruṣau loke kṣaraḥ ca akṣaraḥ eva ca

original: Bhg_15.016c kṣaraḥ sarvāṇi bhūtāni kūṭastho 'kṣara ucyate
analyzed: kṣaraḥ sarvāṇi bhūtāni kūṭasthaḥ kṣaraḥ ucyate

original: Bhg_15.017a uttamaḥ puruṣas tv anyaḥ paramātmety udāhṛtaḥ
analyzed: uttamaḥ puruṣaḥ tu anyaḥ paramātmā iti udāhṛtaḥ

original: Bhg_15.017c yo lokatrayam āviśya bibharty avyaya īśvaraḥ
analyzed: yaḥ lokatrayam āviśya bibharti avyayaḥ īśvaraḥ

original: Bhg_15.018a yasmāt kṣaram atīto 'ham akṣarād api cottamaḥ
analyzed: yasmāt kṣaram atītaḥ ham akṣarāt api ca uttamaḥ

original: Bhg_15.018c ato 'smi loke vede ca prathitaḥ puruṣottamaḥ
analyzed: atas smi loke vede ca prathitaḥ puruṣottamaḥ

original: Bhg_15.019a yo mām evam asaṃmūḍho jānāti puruṣottamam
analyzed: yaḥ mām evam asaṃmūḍhaḥ jānāti puruṣottamam

original: Bhg_15.019c sa sarvavid bhajati māṃ sarvabhāvena bhārata
analyzed: sa sarva vid bhajati mām sarva bhāvena bhārata

original: Bhg_15.020a iti guhyatamaṃ śāstram idam uktaṃ mayānagha
analyzed: iti guhyatamam śāstram idam uktam mayā anagha

original: Bhg_15.020c etad buddhvā buddhimān syāt kṛtakṛtyaś ca bhārata
analyzed: etat buddhvā buddhimān syāt kṛtakṛtyaḥ ca bhārata

original: Bhg_16.001 śrībhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: Bhg_16.001a abhayaṃ sattvasaṃśuddhir jñānayogavyavasthitiḥ
Bhg_16.001c dānaṃ damaś ca yajñaś ca svādhyāyas tapa ārjavam
analyzed: dānam damaḥ ca yajñaḥ ca svādhyāyaḥ tapaḥ ārjavam

original: Bhg_16.002a ahiṃsā satyam akrodhas tyāgaḥ śāntir apaiśunam
analyzed: ahiṃsā satyam akrodhaḥ tyāgaḥ śāntiḥ apaiśunam

original: Bhg_16.002c dayā bhūteṣv aloluptvaṃ mārdavaṃ hrīr acāpalam
analyzed: dayā bhūteṣu a loluptvam mārdavam hrīḥ acāpalam

original: Bhg_16.003a tejaḥ kṣamā dhṛtiḥ śaucam adroho nātimānitā
analyzed: tejaḥ kṣamā dhṛtiḥ śaucam adrohaḥ na atimāni tā

original: Bhg_16.003c bhavanti saṃpadaṃ daivīm abhijātasya bhārata
analyzed: bhavanti saṃpadam daivīm abhijātasya bhārata

original: Bhg_16.004a dambho darpo 'timānaś ca krodhaḥ pāruṣyam eva ca
analyzed: dambhaḥ darpaḥ ti mānaḥ ca krodhaḥ pāruṣyam eva ca

original: Bhg_16.004c ajñānaṃ cābhijātasya pārtha saṃpadam āsurīm
analyzed: ajñānam ca abhijātasya pārtha saṃpadam āsurīm

original: Bhg_16.005a daivī saṃpad vimokṣāya nibandhāyāsurī matā
analyzed: daivī saṃpad vimokṣāya nibandhāya āsurī matā

original: Bhg_16.005c mā śucaḥ saṃpadaṃ daivīm abhijāto 'si pāṇḍava
analyzed: mā śucaḥ saṃpadam daivīm abhijātaḥ si pāṇḍava

original: Bhg_16.006a dvau bhūtasargau loke 'smin daiva āsura eva ca
analyzed: dvau bhūta sargau loke smin daivaḥ āsuraḥ eva ca

original: Bhg_16.006c daivo vistaraśaḥ prokta āsuraṃ pārtha me śṛṇu
analyzed: daivaḥ vistaraśaḥ proktaḥ āsuram pārtha me śṛṇu

original: Bhg_16.007a pravṛttiṃ ca nivṛttiṃ ca janā na vidur āsurāḥ
analyzed: pravṛttim ca nivṛttim ca janāḥ na viduḥ āsurāḥ

original: Bhg_16.007c na śaucaṃ nāpi cācāro na satyaṃ teṣu vidyate
analyzed: na śaucam na api ca ācāraḥ na satyam teṣu vidyate

original: Bhg_16.008a asatyam apratiṣṭhaṃ te jagad āhur anīśvaram
analyzed: asatyam apratiṣṭham te jagat āhuḥ anīśvaram

original: Bhg_16.008c aparasparasaṃbhūtaṃ kim anyat kāmahaitukam
analyzed: a paraspara saṃbhūtam kim anyat kāma haitukam

original: Bhg_16.009a etāṃ dṛṣṭim avaṣṭabhya naṣṭātmāno 'lpabuddhayaḥ
analyzed: etām dṛṣṭim avaṣṭabhya naṣṭa ātmānaḥ lpabuddhayaḥ

original: Bhg_16.009c prabhavanty ugrakarmāṇaḥ kṣayāya jagato 'hitāḥ
analyzed: prabhavanti ugra karmāṇaḥ kṣayāya jagataḥ hitāḥ

original: Bhg_16.010a kāmam āśritya duṣpūraṃ dambhamānamadānvitāḥ
analyzed: kāmam āśritya duṣpūram dambha māna mada anvitāḥ

original: Bhg_16.010c mohād gṛhītvāsadgrāhān pravartante 'śucivratāḥ
analyzed: mohāt gṛhītvā asat grāhān pravartante śuci vratāḥ

original: Bhg_16.011a cintām aparimeyāṃ ca pralayāntām upāśritāḥ
analyzed: cintām aparimeyām ca pralaya antām upāśritāḥ

original: Bhg_16.011c kāmopabhogaparamā etāvad iti niścitāḥ
analyzed: kāma upabhoga paramāḥ etāvat iti niścitāḥ

original: Bhg_16.012a āśāpāśaśatair baddhāḥ kāmakrodhaparāyaṇāḥ
analyzed: āśā pāśa śataiḥ baddhāḥ kāma krodha parāyaṇāḥ

original: Bhg_16.012c īhante kāmabhogārtham anyāyenārthasaṃcayān
analyzed: īhante kāma bhoga artham anyāyena artha saṃcayān

original: Bhg_16.013a idam adya mayā labdham idaṃ prāpsye manoratham
analyzed: idam adya mayā labdham idam prāpsye manoratham

original: Bhg_16.013c idam astīdam api me bhaviṣyati punar dhanam
analyzed: idam asti idam api me bhaviṣyati punar dhanam

original: Bhg_16.014a asau mayā hataḥ śatrur haniṣye cāparān api
analyzed: asau mayā hataḥ śatruḥ haniṣye ca aparān api

original: Bhg_16.014c īśvaro 'ham ahaṃ bhogī siddho 'haṃ balavān sukhī
analyzed: īśvaraḥ ham aham bhogī siddhaḥ ham balavān sukhī

original: Bhg_16.015a āḍhyo 'bhijanavān asmi ko 'nyo 'sti sadṛśo mayā
analyzed: āḍhyaḥ asmi kaḥ sti sadṛśaḥ mayā

original: Bhg_16.015c yakṣye dāsyāmi modiṣya ity ajñānavimohitāḥ
analyzed: yakṣye dāsyāmi modiṣye iti ajñāna vimohitāḥ

original: Bhg_16.016a anekacittavibhrāntā mohajālasamāvṛtāḥ
analyzed: aneka citta vibhrāntāḥ moha jāla samāvṛtāḥ

original: Bhg_16.016c prasaktāḥ kāmabhogeṣu patanti narake 'śucau
analyzed: prasaktāḥ kāma bhogeṣu patanti narake śucau

original: Bhg_16.017a ātmasaṃbhāvitāḥ stabdhā dhanamānamadānvitāḥ
analyzed: ātma saṃbhāvitāḥ stabdhāḥ dhana māna mada anvitāḥ

original: Bhg_16.017c yajante nāmayajñais te dambhenāvidhipūrvakam
analyzed: yajante nāma yajñaiḥ te dambhena a vidhi pūrvakam

original: Bhg_16.018a ahaṃkāraṃ balaṃ darpaṃ kāmaṃ krodhaṃ ca saṃśritāḥ
analyzed: ahaṃkāram balam darpam kāmam krodham ca saṃśritāḥ

original: Bhg_16.018c mām ātmaparadeheṣu pradviṣanto 'bhyasūyakāḥ
analyzed: mām ātma para deheṣu pradviṣantaḥ bhyasūyakāḥ

original: Bhg_16.019a tān ahaṃ dviṣataḥ krūrān saṃsāreṣu narādhamān
analyzed: tān aham dviṣataḥ krūrān saṃsāreṣu nara adhamān

original: Bhg_16.019c kṣipāmy ajasram aśubhān āsurīṣv eva yoniṣu
analyzed: kṣipāmi ajasram aśubhān āsurīṣu eva yoniṣu
