original: Bhg_16.020a āsurīṃ yonim āpannā mūḍhā janmani janmani
analyzed: āsurīm yonim āpannāḥ mūḍhāḥ janmani janmani

original: Bhg_16.020c mām aprāpyaiva kaunteya tato yānty adhamāṃ gatim
analyzed: mām a prāpya eva kaunteya tatas yānti adhamām gatim

original: Bhg_16.021a trividhaṃ narakasyedaṃ dvāraṃ nāśanam ātmanaḥ
analyzed: trividham narakasya idam dvāram nāśanam ātmanaḥ

original: Bhg_16.021c kāmaḥ krodhas tathā lobhas tasmād etat trayaṃ tyajet
analyzed: kāmaḥ krodhaḥ tathā lobhaḥ tasmāt etat trayam tyajet

original: Bhg_16.022a etair vimuktaḥ kaunteya tamodvārais tribhir naraḥ
analyzed: etaiḥ vimuktaḥ kaunteya tamaḥ dvāraiḥ tribhiḥ naraḥ

original: Bhg_16.022c ācaraty ātmanaḥ śreyas tato yāti parāṃ gatim
analyzed: ācarati ātmanaḥ śreyaḥ tatas yāti parām gatim

original: Bhg_16.023a yaḥ śāstravidhim utsṛjya vartate kāmakārataḥ
analyzed: yaḥ śāstra vidhim utsṛjya vartate kāmakārataḥ

original: Bhg_16.023c na sa siddhim avāpnoti na sukhaṃ na parāṃ gatim
analyzed: na sa siddhim avāpnoti na sukham na parām gatim

original: Bhg_16.024a tasmāc chāstraṃ pramāṇaṃ te kāryākāryavyavasthitau
analyzed: tasmāt śāstram pramāṇam te kārya akārya vyavasthitau

original: Bhg_16.024c jñātvā śāstravidhānoktaṃ karma kartum ihārhasi
analyzed: jñātvā śāstra vidhāna uktam karma kartum iha arhasi

original: Bhg_17.001 arjuna uvāca
analyzed: arjunaḥ uvāca

original: Bhg_17.001a ye śāstravidhim utsṛjya yajante śraddhayānvitāḥ
analyzed: ye śāstra vidhim utsṛjya yajante śraddhayā anvitāḥ

original: Bhg_17.001c teṣāṃ niṣṭhā tu kā kṛṣṇa sattvam āho rajas tamaḥ
analyzed: teṣām niṣṭhā tu kā kṛṣṇa sattvam āho rajaḥ tamaḥ

original: Bhg_17.002 śrībhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: Bhg_17.002a trividhā bhavati śraddhā dehināṃ sā svabhāvajā
analyzed: trividhā bhavati śraddhā dehinām sā svabhāva jā

original: Bhg_17.002c sāttvikī rājasī caiva tāmasī ceti tāṃ śṛṇu
analyzed: sāttvikī rājasī ca eva tāmasī ca iti tām śṛṇu

original: Bhg_17.003a sattvānurūpā sarvasya śraddhā bhavati bhārata
analyzed: sattva anurūpā sarvasya śraddhā bhavati bhārata

original: Bhg_17.003c śraddhāmayo 'yaṃ puruṣo yo yacchraddhaḥ sa eva saḥ
analyzed: śraddhā mayaḥ yam puruṣaḥ yaḥ yad śraddhaḥ saḥ eva saḥ

original: Bhg_17.004a yajante sāttvikā devān yakṣarakṣāṃsi rājasāḥ
analyzed: yajante sāttvikāḥ devān yakṣa rakṣāṃsi rājasāḥ

original: Bhg_17.004c pretān bhūtagaṇāṃś cānye yajante tāmasā janāḥ
analyzed: pretān bhūta gaṇān ca anye yajante tāmasāḥ janāḥ

original: Bhg_17.005a aśāstravihitaṃ ghoraṃ tapyante ye tapo janāḥ
analyzed: a śāstra vihitam ghoram tapyante ye tapaḥ janāḥ

original: Bhg_17.005c dambhāhaṃkārasaṃyuktāḥ kāmarāgabalānvitāḥ
analyzed: dambha ahaṃkāra saṃyuktāḥ kāma rāga bala anvitāḥ

original: Bhg_17.006a karśayantaḥ śarīrasthaṃ bhūtagrāmam acetasaḥ
analyzed: karśayantaḥ śarīra stham bhūta grāmam acetasaḥ

original: Bhg_17.006c māṃ caivāntaḥśarīrasthaṃ tān viddhy āsuraniścayān
analyzed: mām ca eva antar śarīra stham tān viddhi āsura niścayān

original: Bhg_17.007a āhāras tv api sarvasya trividho bhavati priyaḥ
analyzed: āhāraḥ tu api sarvasya trividhaḥ bhavati priyaḥ

original: Bhg_17.007c yajñas tapas tathā dānaṃ teṣāṃ bhedam imaṃ śṛṇu
analyzed: yajñaḥ tapaḥ tathā dānam teṣām bhedam imam śṛṇu

original: Bhg_17.008a āyuḥsattvabalārogyasukhaprītivivardhanāḥ
analyzed: āyuḥ sattva bala ārogya sukha prīti vivardhanāḥ

original: Bhg_17.008c rasyāḥ snigdhāḥ sthirā hṛdyā āhārāḥ sāttvikapriyāḥ
analyzed: rasyāḥ snigdhāḥ sthirāḥ hṛdyāḥ āhārāḥ sāttvika priyāḥ

original: Bhg_17.009a kaṭvamlalavaṇātyuṣṇatīkṣṇarūkṣavidāhinaḥ
Bhg_17.009c āhārā rājasasyeṣṭā duḥkhaśokāmayapradāḥ
analyzed: āhārāḥ rājasasya iṣṭāḥ duḥkha śoka āmaya pradāḥ

original: Bhg_17.010a yātayāmaṃ gatarasaṃ pūti paryuṣitaṃ ca yat
analyzed: yātayāmam gata rasam pūti paryuṣitam ca yat

original: Bhg_17.010c ucchiṣṭam api cāmedhyaṃ bhojanaṃ tāmasapriyam
analyzed: ucchiṣṭam api ca amedhyam bhojanam tāmasa priyam

original: Bhg_17.011a aphalākāṅkṣibhir yajño vidhidṛṣṭo ya ijyate
analyzed: a phala ākāṅkṣibhiḥ yajñaḥ vidhi dṛṣṭaḥ yaḥ ijyate

original: Bhg_17.011c yaṣṭavyam eveti manaḥ samādhāya sa sāttvikaḥ
analyzed: yaṣṭavyam eva iti manaḥ samādhāya sa sāttvikaḥ

original: Bhg_17.012a abhisaṃdhāya tu phalaṃ dambhārtham api caiva yat
analyzed: abhisaṃdhāya tu phalam dambha artham api ca eva yat

original: Bhg_17.012c ijyate bharataśreṣṭha taṃ yajñaṃ viddhi rājasam
analyzed: ijyate bharata śreṣṭha tam yajñam viddhi rājasam

original: Bhg_17.013a vidhihīnam asṛṣṭānnaṃ mantrahīnam adakṣiṇam
analyzed: vidhi hīnam a sṛṣṭa annam mantra hīnam a dakṣiṇam

original: Bhg_17.013c śraddhāvirahitaṃ yajñaṃ tāmasaṃ paricakṣate
analyzed: śraddhā virahitam yajñam tāmasam paricakṣate

original: Bhg_17.014a devadvijaguruprājñapūjanaṃ śaucam ārjavam
analyzed: deva dvija guru prājña pūjanam śaucam ārjavam

original: Bhg_17.014c brahmacaryam ahiṃsā ca śārīraṃ tapa ucyate
analyzed: brahmacaryam ahiṃsā ca śārīram tapaḥ ucyate

original: Bhg_17.015a anudvegakaraṃ vākyaṃ satyaṃ priyahitaṃ ca yat
analyzed: an udvega karam vākyam satyam priya hitam ca yat

original: Bhg_17.015c svādhyāyābhyasanaṃ caiva vāṅmayaṃ tapa ucyate
analyzed: svādhyāya abhyasanam ca eva vāc mayam tapaḥ ucyate

original: Bhg_17.016a manaḥprasādaḥ saumyatvaṃ maunam ātmavinigrahaḥ
Bhg_17.016c bhāvasaṃśuddhir ity etat tapo mānasam ucyate
analyzed: bhāva saṃśuddhiḥ iti etat tapaḥ mānasam ucyate

original: Bhg_17.017a śraddhayā parayā taptaṃ tapas tat trividhaṃ naraiḥ
analyzed: śraddhayā parayā taptam tapaḥ tat trividham naraiḥ

original: Bhg_17.017c aphalākāṅkṣibhir yuktaiḥ sāttvikaṃ paricakṣate
analyzed: a phala ākāṅkṣibhiḥ yuktaiḥ sāttvikam paricakṣate

original: Bhg_17.018a satkāramānapūjārthaṃ tapo dambhena caiva yat
analyzed: satkāra māna pūjā artham tapaḥ dambhena ca eva yat

original: Bhg_17.018c kriyate tad iha proktaṃ rājasaṃ calam adhruvam
analyzed: kriyate tat iha proktam rājasam calam adhruvam

original: Bhg_17.019a mūḍhagrāheṇātmano yat pīḍayā kriyate tapaḥ
analyzed: mūḍha grāheṇa ātmanaḥ yat pīḍayā kriyate tapaḥ

original: Bhg_17.019c parasyotsādanārthaṃ vā tat tāmasam udāhṛtam
analyzed: parasya utsādana artham vā tat tāmasam udāhṛtam

original: Bhg_17.020a dātavyam iti yad dānaṃ dīyate 'nupakāriṇe
analyzed: dātavyam iti yat dānam dīyate n upakāriṇe

original: Bhg_17.020c deśe kāle ca pātre ca tad dānaṃ sāttvikaṃ smṛtam
analyzed: deśe kāle ca pātre ca tat dānam sāttvikam smṛtam

original: Bhg_17.021a yat tu pratyupakārārthaṃ phalam uddiśya vā punaḥ
analyzed: yat tu pratyupakāra artham phalam uddiśya vā punar

original: Bhg_17.021c dīyate ca parikliṣṭaṃ tad dānaṃ rājasaṃ smṛtam
analyzed: dīyate ca parikliṣṭam tat dānam rājasam smṛtam

original: Bhg_17.022a adeśakāle yad dānam apātrebhyaś ca dīyate
analyzed: a deśa kāle yat dānam apātrebhyaḥ ca dīyate

original: Bhg_17.022c asatkṛtam avajñātaṃ tat tāmasam udāhṛtam
analyzed: asatkṛtam avajñātam tat tāmasam udāhṛtam

original: Bhg_17.023a oṃ tat sad iti nirdeśo brahmaṇas trividhaḥ smṛtaḥ
analyzed: om tat sat iti nirdeśaḥ brahmaṇaḥ trividhaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: Bhg_17.023c brāhmaṇās tena vedāś ca yajñāś ca vihitāḥ purā
analyzed: brāhmaṇāḥ tena vedāḥ ca yajñāḥ ca vihitāḥ purā

original: Bhg_17.024a tasmād om ity udāhṛtya yajñadānatapaḥkriyāḥ
analyzed: tasmāt om iti udāhṛtya yajña dāna tapaḥ kriyāḥ

original: Bhg_17.024c pravartante vidhānoktāḥ satataṃ brahmavādinām
analyzed: pravartante vidhāna uktāḥ satatam brahma vādinām

original: Bhg_17.025a tad ity anabhisaṃdhāya phalaṃ yajñatapaḥkriyāḥ
analyzed: tat iti an abhisaṃdhāya phalam yajña tapaḥ kriyāḥ

original: Bhg_17.025c dānakriyāś ca vividhāḥ kriyante mokṣakāṅkṣibhiḥ
analyzed: dāna kriyāḥ ca vividhāḥ kriyante mokṣa kāṅkṣibhiḥ

original: Bhg_17.026a sadbhāve sādhubhāve ca sad ity etat prayujyate
analyzed: sadbhāve sādhu bhāve ca sat iti etat prayujyate

original: Bhg_17.026c praśaste karmaṇi tathā sacchabdaḥ pārtha yujyate
analyzed: praśaste karmaṇi tathā sat śabdaḥ pārtha yujyate

original: Bhg_17.027a yajñe tapasi dāne ca sthitiḥ sad iti cocyate
analyzed: yajñe tapasi dāne ca sthitiḥ sat iti ca ucyate

original: Bhg_17.027c karma caiva tadarthīyaṃ sad ity evābhidhīyate
analyzed: karma ca eva tad arthīyam sat iti eva abhidhīyate

original: Bhg_17.028a aśraddhayā hutaṃ dattaṃ tapas taptaṃ kṛtaṃ ca yat
analyzed: aśraddhayā hutam dattam tapaḥ taptam kṛtam ca yat

original: Bhg_17.028c asad ity ucyate pārtha na ca tat pretya no iha
analyzed: asat iti ucyate pārtha na ca tat pretya no iha

original: Bhg_18.001 arjuna uvāca
analyzed: arjunaḥ uvāca

original: Bhg_18.001a saṃnyāsasya mahābāho tattvam icchāmi veditum
analyzed: saṃnyāsasya mahā bāho tattvam icchāmi veditum

original: Bhg_18.001c tyāgasya ca hṛṣīkeśa pṛthak keśiniṣūdana
analyzed: tyāgasya ca hṛṣīkeśa pṛthak keśiniṣūdana

original: Bhg_18.002 śrībhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: Bhg_18.002a kāmyānāṃ karmaṇāṃ nyāsaṃ saṃnyāsaṃ kavayo viduḥ
analyzed: kāmyānām karmaṇām nyāsam saṃnyāsam kavayaḥ viduḥ

original: Bhg_18.002c sarvakarmaphalatyāgaṃ prāhus tyāgaṃ vicakṣaṇāḥ
analyzed: sarva karma phala tyāgam prāhuḥ tyāgam vicakṣaṇāḥ

original: Bhg_18.003a tyājyaṃ doṣavad ity eke karma prāhur manīṣiṇaḥ
analyzed: tyājyam doṣavat iti eke karma prāhuḥ manīṣiṇaḥ

original: Bhg_18.003c yajñadānatapaḥkarma na tyājyam iti cāpare
analyzed: yajña dāna tapaḥ karma na tyājyam iti ca apare

original: Bhg_18.004a niścayaṃ śṛṇu me tatra tyāge bharatasattama
analyzed: niścayam śṛṇu me tatra tyāge bharata sattama

original: Bhg_18.004c tyāgo hi puruṣavyāghra trividhaḥ saṃprakīrtitaḥ
analyzed: tyāgaḥ hi puruṣa vyāghra trividhaḥ saṃprakīrtitaḥ

original: Bhg_18.005a yajñadānatapaḥkarma na tyājyaṃ kāryam eva tat
analyzed: yajña dāna tapaḥ karma na tyājyam kāryam eva tat

original: Bhg_18.005c yajño dānaṃ tapaś caiva pāvanāni manīṣiṇām
analyzed: yajñaḥ dānam tapaḥ ca eva pāvanāni manīṣiṇām

original: Bhg_18.006a etāny api tu karmāṇi saṅgaṃ tyaktvā phalāni ca
analyzed: etāni api tu karmāṇi saṅgam tyaktvā phalāni ca

original: Bhg_18.006c kartavyānīti me pārtha niścitaṃ matam uttamam
analyzed: kartavyāni iti me pārtha niścitam matam uttamam

original: Bhg_18.007a niyatasya tu saṃnyāsaḥ karmaṇo nopapadyate
analyzed: niyatasya tu saṃnyāsaḥ karmaṇaḥ na upapadyate

original: Bhg_18.007c mohāt tasya parityāgas tāmasaḥ parikīrtitaḥ
analyzed: mohāt tasya parityāgaḥ tāmasaḥ parikīrtitaḥ

original: Bhg_18.008a duḥkham ity eva yat karma kāyakleśabhayāt tyajet
analyzed: duḥkham iti eva yat karma kāya kleśa bhayāt tyajet

original: Bhg_18.008c sa kṛtvā rājasaṃ tyāgaṃ naiva tyāgaphalaṃ labhet
analyzed: sa kṛtvā rājasam tyāgam na eva tyāga phalam labhet

original: Bhg_18.009a kāryam ity eva yat karma niyataṃ kriyate 'rjuna
analyzed: kāryam iti eva yat karma niyatam kriyate rjuna

original: Bhg_18.009c saṅgaṃ tyaktvā phalaṃ caiva sa tyāgaḥ sāttviko mataḥ
analyzed: saṅgam tyaktvā phalam ca eva sa tyāgaḥ sāttvikaḥ mataḥ

original: Bhg_18.010a na dveṣṭy akuśalaṃ karma kuśale nānuṣajjate
analyzed: na dveṣṭi akuśalam karma kuśale na anuṣajjate

original: Bhg_18.010c tyāgī sattvasamāviṣṭo medhāvī chinnasaṃśayaḥ
analyzed: tyāgī sattva samāviṣṭaḥ medhāvī chinna saṃśayaḥ

original: Bhg_18.011a na hi dehabhṛtā śakyaṃ tyaktuṃ karmāṇy aśeṣataḥ
analyzed: na hi dehabhṛtā śakyam tyaktum karmāṇi aśeṣatas

original: Bhg_18.011c yas tu karmaphalatyāgī sa tyāgīty abhidhīyate
analyzed: yaḥ tu karma phala tyāgī sa tyāgī iti abhidhīyate

original: Bhg_18.012a aniṣṭam iṣṭaṃ miśraṃ ca trividhaṃ karmaṇaḥ phalam
analyzed: aniṣṭam iṣṭam miśram ca trividham karmaṇaḥ phalam

original: Bhg_18.012c bhavaty atyāgināṃ pretya na tu saṃnyāsināṃ kva cit
analyzed: bhavati atyāginām pretya na tu saṃnyāsinām kva cit

original: Bhg_18.013a pañcaitāni mahābāho kāraṇāni nibodha me
analyzed: pañca etāni mahā bāho kāraṇāni nibodha me

original: Bhg_18.013c sāṃkhye kṛtānte proktāni siddhaye sarvakarmaṇām
analyzed: sāṃkhye kṛtānte proktāni siddhaye sarva karmaṇām

original: Bhg_18.014a adhiṣṭhānaṃ tathā kartā karaṇaṃ ca pṛthagvidham
analyzed: adhiṣṭhānam tathā kartā karaṇam ca pṛthagvidham

original: Bhg_18.014c vividhāś ca pṛthakceṣṭā daivaṃ caivātra pañcamam
analyzed: vividhāḥ ca pṛthak ceṣṭāḥ daivam ca eva atra pañcamam

original: Bhg_18.015a śarīravāṅmanobhir yat karma prārabhate naraḥ
analyzed: śarīra vāc manobhiḥ yat karma prārabhate naraḥ

original: Bhg_18.015c nyāyyaṃ vā viparītaṃ vā pañcaite tasya hetavaḥ
analyzed: nyāyyam vā viparītam vā pañca ete tasya hetavaḥ

original: Bhg_18.016a tatraivaṃ sati kartāram ātmānaṃ kevalaṃ tu yaḥ
analyzed: tatra evam sati kartāram ātmānam kevalam tu yaḥ

original: Bhg_18.016c paśyaty akṛtabuddhitvān na sa paśyati durmatiḥ
analyzed: paśyati akṛtabuddhi tvāt na sa paśyati durmatiḥ

original: Bhg_18.017a yasya nāhaṃkṛto bhāvo buddhir yasya na lipyate
analyzed: yasya na ahaṃkṛtaḥ bhāvaḥ buddhiḥ yasya na lipyate

original: Bhg_18.017c hatvāpi sa imāṃl lokān na hanti na nibadhyate
analyzed: hatvā api saḥ imān lokān na hanti na nibadhyate

original: Bhg_18.018a jñānaṃ jñeyaṃ parijñātā trividhā karmacodanā
analyzed: jñānam jñeyam parijñātā trividhā karma codanā

original: Bhg_18.018c karaṇaṃ karma karteti trividhaḥ karmasaṃgrahaḥ
analyzed: karaṇam karma kartā iti trividhaḥ karma saṃgrahaḥ

original: Bhg_18.019a jñānaṃ karma ca kartā ca tridhaiva guṇabhedataḥ
analyzed: jñānam karma ca kartā ca tridhā eva guṇa bhedataḥ

original: Bhg_18.019c procyate guṇasaṃkhyāne yathāvac chṛṇu tāny api
analyzed: procyate guṇa saṃkhyāne yathāvat śṛṇu tāni api

original: Bhg_18.020a sarvabhūteṣu yenaikaṃ bhāvam avyayam īkṣate
analyzed: sarva bhūteṣu yena ekam bhāvam avyayam īkṣate

original: Bhg_18.020c avibhaktaṃ vibhakteṣu taj jñānaṃ viddhi sāttvikam
analyzed: avibhaktam vibhakteṣu tat jñānam viddhi sāttvikam

original: Bhg_18.021a pṛthaktvena tu yaj jñānaṃ nānābhāvān pṛthagvidhān
analyzed: pṛthaktvena tu yat jñānam nānā bhāvān pṛthagvidhān

original: Bhg_18.021c vetti sarveṣu bhūteṣu taj jñānaṃ viddhi rājasam
analyzed: vetti sarveṣu bhūteṣu tat jñānam viddhi rājasam

original: Bhg_18.022a yat tu kṛtsnavad ekasmin kārye saktam ahaitukam
analyzed: yat tu kṛtsna vat ekasmin kārye saktam ahaitukam

original: Bhg_18.022c atattvārthavad alpaṃ ca tat tāmasam udāhṛtam
analyzed: a tattva arthavat alpam ca tat tāmasam udāhṛtam

original: Bhg_18.023a niyataṃ saṅgarahitam arāgadveṣataḥ kṛtam
analyzed: niyatam saṅga rahitam a rāga dveṣataḥ kṛtam

original: Bhg_18.023c aphalaprepsunā karma yat tat sāttvikam ucyate
analyzed: a phala prepsunā karma yat tat sāttvikam ucyate

original: Bhg_18.024a yat tu kāmepsunā karma sāhaṃkāreṇa vā punaḥ
analyzed: yat tu kāma īpsunā karma sa ahaṃkāreṇa vā punar

original: Bhg_18.024c kriyate bahulāyāsaṃ tad rājasam udāhṛtam
analyzed: kriyate bahula āyāsam tat rājasam udāhṛtam

original: Bhg_18.025a anubandhaṃ kṣayaṃ hiṃsām anapekṣya ca pauruṣam
analyzed: anubandham kṣayam hiṃsām an apekṣya ca pauruṣam

original: Bhg_18.025c mohād ārabhyate karma yat tat tāmasam ucyate
analyzed: mohāt ārabhyate karma yat tat tāmasam ucyate

original: Bhg_18.026a muktasaṅgo 'nahaṃvādī dhṛtyutsāhasamanvitaḥ
analyzed: mukta saṅgaḥ na ahaṃvādī dhṛti utsāha samanvitaḥ

original: Bhg_18.026c siddhyasiddhyor nirvikāraḥ kartā sāttvika ucyate
analyzed: siddhi asiddhyoḥ nirvikāraḥ kartā sāttvikaḥ ucyate

original: Bhg_18.027a rāgī karmaphalaprepsur lubdho hiṃsātmako 'śuciḥ
analyzed: rāgī karma phala prepsuḥ lubdhaḥ śuciḥ

original: Bhg_18.027c harṣaśokānvitaḥ kartā rājasaḥ parikīrtitaḥ
analyzed: harṣa śoka anvitaḥ kartā rājasaḥ parikīrtitaḥ

original: Bhg_18.028a ayuktaḥ prākṛtaḥ stabdhaḥ śaṭho naikṛtiko 'lasaḥ
analyzed: ayuktaḥ prākṛtaḥ stabdhaḥ śaṭhaḥ naikṛtikaḥ lasaḥ

original: Bhg_18.028c viṣādī dīrghasūtrī ca kartā tāmasa ucyate
analyzed: viṣādī dīrghasūtrī ca kartā tāmasaḥ ucyate

original: Bhg_18.029a buddher bhedaṃ dhṛteś caiva guṇatas trividhaṃ śṛṇu
analyzed: buddheḥ bhedam dhṛteḥ ca eva guṇataḥ trividham śṛṇu

original: Bhg_18.029c procyamānam aśeṣeṇa pṛthaktvena dhanaṃjaya
analyzed: procyamānam aśeṣeṇa pṛthaktvena dhanaṃjaya

original: Bhg_18.030a pravṛttiṃ ca nivṛttiṃ ca kāryākārye bhayābhaye
analyzed: pravṛttim ca nivṛttim ca kārya akārye bhaya abhaye

original: Bhg_18.030c bandhaṃ mokṣaṃ ca yā vetti buddhiḥ sā pārtha sāttvikī
analyzed: bandham mokṣam ca yā vetti buddhiḥ sā pārtha sāttvikī

original: Bhg_18.031a yayā dharmam adharmaṃ ca kāryaṃ cākāryam eva ca
analyzed: yayā dharmam adharmam ca kāryam ca akāryam eva ca

original: Bhg_18.031c ayathāvat prajānāti buddhiḥ sā pārtha rājasī
analyzed: ayathāvat prajānāti buddhiḥ sā pārtha rājasī

original: Bhg_18.032a adharmaṃ dharmam iti yā manyate tamasāvṛtā
analyzed: adharmam dharmam iti yā manyate tamasā āvṛtā

original: Bhg_18.032c sarvārthān viparītāṃś ca buddhiḥ sā pārtha tāmasī
analyzed: sarva arthān viparītān ca buddhiḥ sā pārtha tāmasī

original: Bhg_18.033a dhṛtyā yayā dhārayate manaḥprāṇendriyakriyāḥ
analyzed: dhṛtyā yayā dhārayate manaḥ prāṇa indriya kriyāḥ

original: Bhg_18.033c yogenāvyabhicāriṇyā dhṛtiḥ sā pārtha sāttvikī
analyzed: yogena avyabhicāriṇyā dhṛtiḥ sā pārtha sāttvikī

original: Bhg_18.034a yayā tu dharmakāmārthān dhṛtyā dhārayate 'rjuna
analyzed: yayā tu dharma kāma arthān dhṛtyā dhārayate rjuna

original: Bhg_18.034c prasaṅgena phalākāṅkṣī dhṛtiḥ sā pārtha rājasī
analyzed: prasaṅgena phala ākāṅkṣī dhṛtiḥ sā pārtha rājasī

original: Bhg_18.035a yayā svapnaṃ bhayaṃ śokaṃ viṣādaṃ madam eva ca
analyzed: yayā svapnam bhayam śokam viṣādam madam eva ca

original: Bhg_18.035c na vimuñcati durmedhā dhṛtiḥ sā pārtha tāmasī
analyzed: na vimuñcati durmedhāḥ dhṛtiḥ sā pārtha tāmasī

original: Bhg_18.036a sukhaṃ tv idānīṃ trividhaṃ śṛṇu me bharatarṣabha
analyzed: sukham tu idānīm trividham śṛṇu me bharata ṛṣabha

original: Bhg_18.036c abhyāsād ramate yatra duḥkhāntaṃ ca nigacchati
analyzed: abhyāsāt ramate yatra duḥkha antam ca nigacchati

original: Bhg_18.037a yat tadagre viṣam iva pariṇāme 'mṛtopamam
analyzed: yat tat agre viṣam iva pariṇāme mṛta upamam

original: Bhg_18.037c tat sukhaṃ sāttvikaṃ proktam ātmabuddhiprasādajam
analyzed: tat sukham sāttvikam proktam ātma buddhi prasāda jam

original: Bhg_18.038a viṣayendriyasaṃyogād yat tadagre 'mṛtopamam
analyzed: viṣaya indriya saṃyogāt yat tat agre mṛta upamam

original: Bhg_18.038c pariṇāme viṣam iva tat sukhaṃ rājasaṃ smṛtam
analyzed: pariṇāme viṣam iva tat sukham rājasam smṛtam

original: Bhg_18.039a yad agre cānubandhe ca sukhaṃ mohanam ātmanaḥ
analyzed: yat agre ca anubandhe ca sukham mohanam ātmanaḥ

original: Bhg_18.039c nidrālasyapramādotthaṃ tat tāmasam udāhṛtam
analyzed: nidrā ālasya pramāda uttham tat tāmasam udāhṛtam

original: Bhg_18.040a na tad asti pṛthivyāṃ vā divi deveṣu vā punaḥ
analyzed: na tat asti pṛthivyām vā divi deveṣu vā punar

original: Bhg_18.040c sattvaṃ prakṛtijair muktaṃ yad ebhiḥ syāt tribhir guṇaiḥ
analyzed: sattvam prakṛti jaiḥ muktam yat ebhiḥ syāt tribhiḥ guṇaiḥ

original: Bhg_18.041a brāhmaṇakṣatriyaviśāṃ śūdrāṇāṃ ca paraṃtapa
analyzed: brāhmaṇa kṣatriya viśām śūdrāṇām ca paraṃtapa

original: Bhg_18.041c karmāṇi pravibhaktāni svabhāvaprabhavair guṇaiḥ
analyzed: karmāṇi pravibhaktāni svabhāva prabhavaiḥ guṇaiḥ

original: Bhg_18.042a śamo damas tapaḥ śaucaṃ kṣāntir ārjavam eva ca
analyzed: śamaḥ damaḥ tapaḥ śaucam kṣāntiḥ ārjavam eva ca

original: Bhg_18.042c jñānaṃ vijñānam āstikyaṃ brahmakarma svabhāvajam
analyzed: jñānam vijñānam āstikyam brahma karma svabhāva jam

original: Bhg_18.043a śauryaṃ tejo dhṛtir dākṣyaṃ yuddhe cāpy apalāyanam
analyzed: śauryam tejaḥ dhṛtiḥ dākṣyam yuddhe ca api apalāyanam

original: Bhg_18.043c dānam īśvarabhāvaś ca kṣatrakarma svabhāvajam
analyzed: dānam īśvara bhāvaḥ ca kṣatra karma svabhāva jam

original: Bhg_18.044a kṛṣigorakṣyavāṇijyaṃ vaiśyakarma svabhāvajam
analyzed: kṛṣi gorakṣya vāṇijyam vaiśya karma svabhāva jam

original: Bhg_18.044c paricaryātmakaṃ karma śūdrasyāpi svabhāvajam
analyzed: paricaryā ātmakam karma śūdrasya api svabhāva jam

original: Bhg_18.045a sve sve karmaṇy abhirataḥ saṃsiddhiṃ labhate naraḥ
analyzed: sve sve karmaṇi abhirataḥ saṃsiddhim labhate naraḥ

original: Bhg_18.045c svakarmanirataḥ siddhiṃ yathā vindati tac chṛṇu
analyzed: sva karma nirataḥ siddhim yathā vindati tat śṛṇu

original: Bhg_18.046a yataḥ pravṛttir bhūtānāṃ yena sarvam idaṃ tatam
analyzed: yatas pravṛttiḥ bhūtānām yena sarvam idam tatam

original: Bhg_18.046c svakarmaṇā tam abhyarcya siddhiṃ vindati mānavaḥ
analyzed: sva karmaṇā tam abhyarcya siddhim vindati mānavaḥ

original: Bhg_18.047a śreyān svadharmo viguṇaḥ paradharmāt svanuṣṭhitāt
analyzed: śreyān svadharmaḥ viguṇaḥ para dharmāt su anuṣṭhitāt

original: Bhg_18.047c svabhāvaniyataṃ karma kurvan nāpnoti kilbiṣam
analyzed: svabhāva niyatam karma kurvan na āpnoti kilbiṣam

original: Bhg_18.048a sahajaṃ karma kaunteya sadoṣam api na tyajet
analyzed: sahajam karma kaunteya sa doṣam api na tyajet

original: Bhg_18.048c sarvārambhā hi doṣeṇa dhūmenāgnir ivāvṛtāḥ
analyzed: sarva ārambhāḥ hi doṣeṇa dhūmena agniḥ iva āvṛtāḥ

original: Bhg_18.049a asaktabuddhiḥ sarvatra jitātmā vigataspṛhaḥ
analyzed: asakta buddhiḥ sarvatra jita ātmā vigata spṛhaḥ

original: Bhg_18.049c naiṣkarmyasiddhiṃ paramāṃ saṃnyāsenādhigacchati
analyzed: naiṣkarmya siddhim paramām saṃnyāsena adhigacchati

original: Bhg_18.050a siddhiṃ prāpto yathā brahma tathāpnoti nibodha me
analyzed: siddhim prāptaḥ yathā brahma tathā āpnoti nibodha me

original: Bhg_18.050c samāsenaiva kaunteya niṣṭhā jñānasya yā parā
analyzed: samāsena eva kaunteya niṣṭhā jñānasya yā parā

original: Bhg_18.051a buddhyā viśuddhayā yukto dhṛtyātmānaṃ niyamya ca
analyzed: buddhyā viśuddhayā yuktaḥ dhṛtya ātmānam niyamya ca

original: Bhg_18.051c śabdādīn viṣayāṃs tyaktvā rāgadveṣau vyudasya ca
analyzed: śabda ādīn viṣayān tyaktvā rāga dveṣau vyudasya ca

original: Bhg_18.052a viviktasevī laghvāśī yatavākkāyamānasaḥ
Bhg_18.052c dhyānayogaparo nityaṃ vairāgyaṃ samupāśritaḥ
analyzed: dhyāna yoga paraḥ nityam vairāgyam samupāśritaḥ

original: Bhg_18.053a ahaṃkāraṃ balaṃ darpaṃ kāmaṃ krodhaṃ parigraham
analyzed: ahaṃkāram balam darpam kāmam krodham parigraham

original: Bhg_18.053c vimucya nirmamaḥ śānto brahmabhūyāya kalpate
analyzed: vimucya nirmamaḥ śāntaḥ brahma bhūyāya kalpate

original: Bhg_18.054a brahmabhūtaḥ prasannātmā na śocati na kāṅkṣati
analyzed: brahma bhūtaḥ prasanna ātmā na śocati na kāṅkṣati

original: Bhg_18.054c samaḥ sarveṣu bhūteṣu madbhaktiṃ labhate parām
analyzed: samaḥ sarveṣu bhūteṣu mad bhaktim labhate parām

original: Bhg_18.055a bhaktyā mām abhijānāti yāvān yaś cāsmi tattvataḥ
analyzed: bhaktyā mām abhijānāti yāvān yaḥ ca asmi tattvataḥ

original: Bhg_18.055c tato māṃ tattvato jñātvā viśate tadanantaram
analyzed: tatas mām tattvataḥ jñātvā viśate tad anantaram

original: Bhg_18.056a sarvakarmāṇy api sadā kurvāṇo madvyapāśrayaḥ
analyzed: sarva karmāṇi api sadā kurvāṇaḥ mad vyapāśrayaḥ

original: Bhg_18.056c matprasādād avāpnoti śāśvataṃ padam avyayam
analyzed: mad prasādāt avāpnoti śāśvatam padam avyayam

original: Bhg_18.057a cetasā sarvakarmāṇi mayi saṃnyasya matparaḥ
analyzed: cetasā sarva karmāṇi mayi saṃnyasya mad paraḥ

original: Bhg_18.057c buddhiyogam upāśritya maccittaḥ satataṃ bhava
analyzed: buddhi yogam upāśritya mad cittaḥ satatam bhava

original: Bhg_18.058a maccittaḥ sarvadurgāṇi matprasādāt tariṣyasi
analyzed: mad cittaḥ sarva durgāṇi mad prasādāt tariṣyasi

original: Bhg_18.058c atha cet tvam ahaṃkārān na śroṣyasi vinaṅkṣyasi
analyzed: atha ced tvam ahaṃkārāt na śroṣyasi vinaṅkṣyasi

original: Bhg_18.059a yad ahaṃkāram āśritya na yotsya iti manyase
analyzed: yat ahaṃkāram āśritya na yotsye iti manyase

original: Bhg_18.059c mithyaiṣa vyavasāyas te prakṛtis tvāṃ niyokṣyati
analyzed: mithyā eṣa vyavasāyaḥ te prakṛtiḥ tvām niyokṣyati

original: Bhg_18.060a svabhāvajena kaunteya nibaddhaḥ svena karmaṇā
analyzed: svabhāva jena kaunteya nibaddhaḥ svena karmaṇā

original: Bhg_18.060c kartuṃ necchasi yan mohāt kariṣyasy avaśo 'pi tat
analyzed: kartum nā icchasi yat mohāt kariṣyasi avaśaḥ pi tat

original: Bhg_18.061a īśvaraḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ hṛddeśe 'rjuna tiṣṭhati
analyzed: īśvaraḥ sarva bhūtānām hṛd deśe rjuna tiṣṭhati

original: Bhg_18.061c bhrāmayan sarvabhūtāni yantrārūḍhāni māyayā
analyzed: bhrāmayan sarva bhūtāni yantra ārūḍhāni māyayā

original: Bhg_18.062a tam eva śaraṇaṃ gaccha sarvabhāvena bhārata
analyzed: tam eva śaraṇam gaccha sarva bhāvena bhārata

original: Bhg_18.062c tatprasādāt parāṃ śāntiṃ sthānaṃ prāpsyasi śāśvatam
analyzed: tad prasādāt parām śāntim sthānam prāpsyasi śāśvatam

original: Bhg_18.063a iti te jñānam ākhyātaṃ guhyād guhyataraṃ mayā
analyzed: iti te jñānam ākhyātam guhyāt guhyataram mayā

original: Bhg_18.063c vimṛśyaitad aśeṣeṇa yathecchasi tathā kuru
analyzed: vimṛśya etat aśeṣeṇa yathā icchasi tathā kuru

original: Bhg_18.064a sarvaguhyatamaṃ bhūyaḥ śṛṇu me paramaṃ vacaḥ
analyzed: sarva guhyatamam bhūyas śṛṇu me paramam vacaḥ

original: Bhg_18.064c iṣṭo 'si me dṛḍham iti tato vakṣyāmi te hitam
analyzed: iṣṭaḥ u si me dṛḍham iti tatas vakṣyāmi te hitam

original: Bhg_18.065a manmanā bhava madbhakto madyājī māṃ namaskuru
analyzed: mad manāḥ bhava mad bhaktaḥ mad yājī mām namaskuru

original: Bhg_18.065c mām evaiṣyasi satyaṃ te pratijāne priyo 'si me
analyzed: mām eva eṣyasi satyam te pratijāne priyaḥ si me

original: Bhg_18.066a sarvadharmān parityajya mām ekaṃ śaraṇaṃ vraja
analyzed: sarva dharmān parityajya mām ekam śaraṇam vraja

original: Bhg_18.066c ahaṃ tvā sarvapāpebhyo mokṣayiṣyāmi mā śucaḥ
analyzed: aham tvā sarva pāpebhyaḥ mokṣayiṣyāmi mā śucaḥ

original: Bhg_18.067a idaṃ te nātapaskāya nābhaktāya kadā cana
analyzed: idam te na atapaskāya na abhaktāya kadā cana

original: Bhg_18.067c na cāśuśrūṣave vācyaṃ na ca māṃ yo 'bhyasūyati
analyzed: na ca aśuśrūṣave vācyam na ca mām yaḥ bhyasūyati

original: Bhg_18.068a ya idaṃ paramaṃ guhyaṃ madbhakteṣv abhidhāsyati
analyzed: yaḥ idam paramam guhyam mad bhakteṣu abhidhāsyati

original: Bhg_18.068c bhaktiṃ mayi parāṃ kṛtvā mām evaiṣyaty asaṃśayaḥ
analyzed: bhaktim mayi parām kṛtvā mām eva eṣyati asaṃśayaḥ

original: Bhg_18.069a na ca tasmān manuṣyeṣu kaś cin me priyakṛttamaḥ
analyzed: na ca tasmāt manuṣyeṣu kaḥ cit me priya kṛttamaḥ

original: Bhg_18.069c bhavitā na ca me tasmād anyaḥ priyataro bhuvi
analyzed: bhavitā na ca me tasmāt anyaḥ priyataraḥ bhuvi

original: Bhg_18.070a adhyeṣyate ca ya imaṃ dharmyaṃ saṃvādam āvayoḥ
analyzed: adhyeṣyate ca yaḥ imam dharmyam saṃvādam āvayoḥ

original: Bhg_18.070c jñānayajñena tenāham iṣṭaḥ syām iti me matiḥ
analyzed: jñāna yajñena tena aham iṣṭaḥ syām iti me matiḥ

original: Bhg_18.071a śraddhāvān anasūyaś ca śṛṇuyād api yo naraḥ
analyzed: śraddhāvān anasūyaḥ ca śṛṇuyāt api yaḥ naraḥ

original: Bhg_18.071c so 'pi muktaḥ śubhāṃl lokān prāpnuyāt puṇyakarmaṇām
analyzed: saḥ pi muktaḥ śubhān lokān prāpnuyāt puṇya karmaṇām

original: Bhg_18.072a kaccid etac chrutaṃ pārtha tvayaikāgreṇa cetasā
analyzed: kaccit etat śrutam pārtha tvayā ekāgreṇa cetasā

original: Bhg_18.072c kaccid ajñānasaṃmohaḥ pranaṣṭas te dhanaṃjaya
analyzed: kaccit ajñāna saṃmohaḥ pranaṣṭaḥ te dhanaṃjaya

original: Bhg_18.073 arjuna uvāca
analyzed: arjunaḥ uvāca

original: Bhg_18.073a naṣṭo mohaḥ smṛtir labdhā tvatprasādān mayācyuta
analyzed: naṣṭaḥ mohaḥ smṛtiḥ labdhā tvad prasādāt mayā acyuta

original: Bhg_18.073c sthito 'smi gatasaṃdehaḥ kariṣye vacanaṃ tava
analyzed: sthitaḥ smi gata saṃdehaḥ kariṣye vacanam tava

original: Bhg_18.074 saṃjaya uvāca
analyzed: saṃjayaḥ uvāca

original: Bhg_18.074a ity ahaṃ vāsudevasya pārthasya ca mahātmanaḥ
analyzed: iti aham vāsudevasya pārthasya ca mahātmanaḥ

original: Bhg_18.074c saṃvādam imam aśrauṣam adbhutaṃ romaharṣaṇam
analyzed: saṃvādam imam aśrauṣam adbhutam roma harṣaṇam

original: Bhg_18.075a vyāsaprasādāc chrutavān etad guhyam ahaṃ param
analyzed: vyāsa prasādāt śrutavān etat guhyam aham param

original: Bhg_18.075c yogaṃ yogeśvarāt kṛṣṇāt sākṣāt kathayataḥ svayam
analyzed: yogam yogeśvarāt kṛṣṇāt sākṣāt kathayataḥ svayam

original: Bhg_18.076a rājan saṃsmṛtya saṃsmṛtya saṃvādam imam adbhutam
analyzed: rājan saṃsmṛtya saṃsmṛtya saṃvādam imam adbhutam

original: Bhg_18.076c keśavārjunayoḥ puṇyaṃ hṛṣyāmi ca muhur muhuḥ
analyzed: keśava arjunayoḥ puṇyam hṛṣyāmi ca muhur muhur

original: Bhg_18.077a tac ca saṃsmṛtya saṃsmṛtya rūpam atyadbhutaṃ hareḥ
analyzed: tat ca saṃsmṛtya saṃsmṛtya rūpam ati adbhutam hareḥ

original: Bhg_18.077c vismayo me mahān rājan hṛṣyāmi ca punaḥ punaḥ
analyzed: vismayaḥ me mahān rājan hṛṣyāmi ca punar punar

original: Bhg_18.078a yatra yogeśvaraḥ kṛṣṇo yatra pārtho dhanurdharaḥ
analyzed: yatra yogeśvaraḥ kṛṣṇaḥ yatra pārthaḥ dhanuḥ dharaḥ

original: Bhg_18.078c tatra śrīr vijayo bhūtir dhruvā nītir matir mama
analyzed: tatra śrīḥ vijayaḥ bhūtiḥ dhruvā nītiḥ matiḥ mama
